headline: Network automation software for a stronger, more reliable network. realize network assurance
about: The software used to manage networks hasn’t kept up with the dramatic expansion of networks themselves. The Forward Networks solution is designed to help network teams eliminate network outages and reduce time to remediate errors. Its platform enables engineers and operators to visualize and search complex networks, debug configuration problems, verify network-wide policy implementations, and predict network behavior prior to deploying changes. Forward Networks builds a software replica of an entire network to analyze its behavior. Using the network copy, the software traces, indexes, and stores the collected data, monitoring things like end-to-end behavior, verification of the network’s forwarding behavior and security posture, and close monitoring of configuration changes.

At Front, we equip companies to have it all — scale, efficiency, and quality, human-to-human interactions that lead to extraordinary customer experiences. And along the way, we make sure teams are working happier too. How? Front is a hub for customer communication that allows companies to offer tailor-made service at scale. Front looks and feels like your email inbox with a few very important differences: teammates collaborate in the same place where external messages are sent and received, and behind the scenes, robust workflows and integrations power the efficiency and insights typically found in a CRM. More than 6,500 businesses use Front to work together to send out the best replies faster, keep messages organized across channels, and always maintain a personal touch. headline: Instabase is a horizontal application platform designed for automating unstructured data
about: Today, on your smartphone you have an app store where you can find a dozen apps to have food delivered to your door, but we don’t have an app store where a large enterprise, like a bank, can find an app for income verification, or where an insurance company can find an app for processing claims. Every such application is custom built. We should wonder — why? The desktop computer is an important interface for business applications. Problem is, it wasn’t built to perform modern business operations. The problem lies in the operating system. Where Android and iOS were designed to allow applications to interact with one another, desktop computing simply wasn’t. This means that operations such as deal analysis and loan processing, which toggle between human data and computer data, can’t be performed without the assistance of a human being. It’s not only inefficient for businesses but utterly uninspiring for workers. Instabase is on a mission to fix that: to rethink the way we use apps and the way those apps work together to improve business processes and empower innovators to solve problems on a larger scale. Read More:

We also look ahead and understand the modernity of future classics and the responsibility of our place amongst them. We champion anyone striving to be better and are honored when we can be a part of it. We claim simple truths and keep our promises. We truly have our customers’ best interests in mind, knowing damn well the value of a hard-earned dollar. We believe we will never be perfect but know that greatness lies in the search to be so. We make clothes. We love what we do. Initially, they set up shop in a 350 square foot garage off Abbot Kinney Boulevard. Sasha built the website and Erik created the brand’s first collection of jeans and tees. Obsessed with quality, they worked closely with a local family factory to create small batch production runs, crafting each piece using old school manufacturing techniques combined with modern technology. Buck Mason makes fashion less complicated, building each piece to last beyond a single season. Each design is a riff on an iconic American staple, combining to make a useful and effortless wardrobe. Consistency in fit, fabric and quality guide this hands on approach. Much of the product is made in the USA, where you can often find Sasha and Erik on the factory floor.

We want to enable partners and creators to leverage our platform to build and deploy virtual characters for a variety of use cases. We are a team of experts that have pioneered conversational AI platforms and generative models at API.AI (Dialogflow), Google and DeepMind. We are continuing to build out our incredibly talented team, with experts in generative language models, emotions, speech synthesis, multimodal interaction, design, and 3D animation. headline: Solving large-scale financial prediction problems with statistical machine learning
about: Co-founded in 2007 by two leading scientists, The Voleon Group combines an academic approach to research with an emphasis on scalability and risk management to deliver cutting-edge technology at the forefront of the finance industry. Many of our leaders and employees hold doctorates in statistics, computer science, and mathematics, among other quantitative disciplines. We are committed to exemplary performance in all aspects of our research and operations, while maintaining a culture of intellectual curiosity and flexibility. Voleon’s CEO holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science from Stanford and previously founded and led a successful technology startup. Our Chief Investment Officer/Head of Research is a Statistics faculty member at UC Berkeley, where he earned his Ph.D. At Voleon, we approach investment management through the prism of machine learning, in which flexible statistical models are applied to the problem of financial prediction. Rather than having humans look at individual events within the marketplace, machine learning employs statistical algorithms capable of detecting persistent effects across large swaths of data. Besides financial markets, there is a wide array of other real-life applications for machine learning, from medical diagnosis to weather prediction.

In just a couple of years, Simple Habit grew mostly organically to $5M in ARR. Shortly after, we raised $10M Series A round. In 2020, based on insights & learnings, Simple Habit decided to build & launch a new product. Our mission has stayed the same; to help people live better....but our focus has shifted to solving our users #1 wellness problem, sleep! Did you know that almost 60% of adults suffer from insomnia? They struggle to fall asleep or sleep through the night, leading to inadequate sleep and a wide variety of negative symptoms during the day (anxiety, weight gain, irritability, depression). Sleep Reset is a "first of it's kind" wellness program that combines CBTI, content & 1:1 personalized sleep coaching to help adults sleep better, fast — without pills or side effects. And guess what? It works!

We're growing at breakneck speed, and recently announced our Series B round. We've raised $63M in total funding, backed by leading investors including Insight Partners, Accel, Y Combinator, Patrick and John Collision (Founders of Stripe), Nat Friedman (Former CEO of GitHub), and Daniel Gross (Entrepreneur & Investor in companies including GitHub, Uber & SpaceX). Salsify enables brands to centrally manage all of the data they need to create commerce experiences on the digital shelf in one system. With Salsify, brands can manage their core data alongside a Walmart version of the product, a D2C version of the product and so on. Salsify empowers brands to win on the digital shelf by delivering consistent and engaging commerce experiences anywhere a consumer shops. By combining PIM, DAM, syndication, analytics, GDSN, enhanced content and order and inventory management into a single unified platform, brands can improve business agility, achieve faster time to market, and increase sales and market share.

about: Nova Credit is the premier cross-border credit reporting agency. Lack of a domestic credit history keeps millions of immigrants in the United States from realizing their dreams. The award-winning fintech helps newcomers apply for financial services using their international credit history from countries including Australia, Brazil, Canada, India, Mexico, Nigeria, South Korea, and the UK. Nova Credit translates international credit data into a U.S.-equivalent score and report in a format familiar to American underwriters, who use it to evaluate applications for credit products.

headline: Grow enables therapists to launch their own in-network teletherapy practices
about: Grow is transforming mental healthcare accessibility by helping therapists launch tech-driven, in-network practices. We’re creating game-changing technology to build America’s biggest behavioral healthcare group and ensure that anyone can afford quality mental healthcare. The need for accessible mental healthcare is more important than ever. Depression and anxiety rates in America are up 300%, driven by the pandemic’s impact on parents, teachers, nurses, and frontline workers. With 70% of therapists not accepting insurance, affordable care is too expensive or tough to find, leaving too many Americans suffering without help. We believe the answer to accessibility is by supporting our incredible therapists to launch thriving, in-network private practices. The infrastructure and clinical integration in behavioral health has so much room for improvement. We’re building technology that brings practices into the 21st century and profoundly enhances the efficacy and experience of care. Our technology manages all the behind-the-scenes business obligations so therapists can focus on their clients. Everyday we feel privileged to enable and empower heroic providers to reach their full potential, knowing that our communities need heros more than ever. To achieve our lofty ambitions, we’re building an ambitious team of entrepreneurs and mission-driven go-getters. Our founders come from Harvard Medical School, Stripe, and Blackstone, and bring Grow’s mission to our internal team by promoting holistic wellness. We balance our determination with a culture that champions well-being, from unlimited PTO to Mental Health Mornings to team meditation. Since launching in 2020, Grow has raised over $15M from top VCs and angel investors, including SignalFire, Village Global, Airbnb, Nurx, PatientPing, and Blackstone. We hope you'll join us!

You can ask, show, tell and understand new consumers, anytime you need. Clients use Attest to crack their greatest growth problems and fill the most valuable gaps in their knowledge, informing real decisions with fresh new inputs every day. headline: We believe in the unconditional love of pets
about: Whether you need in-home dog boarding, pet sitting, dog walking, or day care, Rover connects pet parents with dog people who’ll treat their pets like family. Rover sitters are your rainy-day-dog-walkers. Your every-day-belly-rubbers. Your tug-of-war players. Your middle-of-the-night-pee-breakers. Because we get it—your dog is family. And when you can’t be there, you can trust us to keep your dog happy, healthy, and sweet as ever. But it’s not just about dog love. Rover is also an award-winning technology business committed to making pet care safe, easy, and affordable so that everyone can experience the unconditional love of a dog. headline: The financial identity that moves with you — web 2, web3, between, or beyond

In short, take your verified identity with you when and where you need it. Self-owned data is a must-do for the next generation of open banking and finance . That's why we're building sign up, sign in, and identity management tools that focus on user-owned and user-permissioned data, implemented through our take on W3C standards. Reshaping identity lets us simplify and automate many parts of the identity stack that currently prevent the financial system from being more cost-effective, inclusive, privacy-preserving and equitable. By leaning on new standards in decentralized identity, we will deliver a portable financial identity that works for everyone. We’re a small team of builders and tinkerers comprised of Web2 and Web3 veterans hailing from Consensys, Paypal, US Mobile, Ava Labs, and other corners of the fintech and regtech universe. headline: Saving Thousands in Legal Spend Is Just a Drag & Drop Away
about: Logikcull is a global software company disrupting an $80+ billion industry you’ve probably never heard of. As a company, we’re solving a too-serious problem. As people, we don’t take ourselves too seriously. We work hard, rib each other and start with the “why.” We put our customers first. We do impactful work. We solve problems creatively. And yes, we spell Logikcull impossibly. We live in a world where data is no longer information. It's noise. In fact, 97% of all data that gets swept up in the dragnet of disputes and investigations is completely irrelevant. Pure noise. And that noise is making discovery an expensive, complex, and insecure nightmare. That's why we built Logikcull: to cull the noise so you can quickly, affordably, and securely find the data signal. With Logikcull, corporate legal teams, law firms, and government organizations of all sizes are able to organize and cull the noise by simply dragging and dropping—for fully automated, end-to-end discovery and legal holds. That's why it's the go-to discovery platform for more than 1,500 organizations and 38,000+ users worldwide.

Our goal is to take head on the difficult work of financial, regulatory, and technical infrastrucre to give them a solution for real money in games - opening a world of possibility Life after tournaments Real time infrastructure, shared in game assets, being the financial unpinning in games will allow us to create consistent user profiles, XP, and experience across otherwise separate publishers Technical Leadership Two founders who both studied computer science at Stanford goes a long way when building a technical product Substantial Backing 14 million total raised, with a Series A lead by General Catalyst (Same partner who first invested in Discord and Snapchat) with participation folks high up at Riot, Epic Games etc., all of our rounds have been over subscribed. This is a complex space with many engaging challenges ahead with great reward. We look forward to facing them head on.

The system is currently being used by professional and collegiate athletes, Olympians, and the United States military. At WHOOP our mission is to create a product that makes individuals and teams perform at a higher level through a deeper understanding of their bodies and daily lives.

As Millennials increasingly enter the workplace, the demand for coaching will continue to grow. They are the most stressed generation and are not receiving the support they want. Over 75% of Millennials wish their manager was more of a coach. They are seeking coaching that's proven, affordable, and optimized for their busy, on-the-go lifestyle. We teamed up with behavioral scientists, psychologists, health experts, Navy SEALs, Olympic medalists, and executives to pioneer a new breed of business coaching, one rooted in evidence-based science that is highly accessible.

GoodRx is used by thousands of physicians and millions of Americans each month. We have saved Americans over $3 billion. We're not going to rest until prescriptions are affordable for all Americans. We also offer GoodRx for Benefits, which provides technology solutions for health plans, payors and PBM's in an easy-to-understand website and mobile app experience. Learn more at www.goodrx.com/benefits.

Lucidpress utilizes the drag-and-drop functionality of Lucidchart to create stunning print and digital content. Our goal at Lucid Software is to create cutting-edge web applications that transcend the experience of working on a desktop program. With our support, patients can have their care stepped up from community services or be discharged from a hospital ward to a virtual one. Unsurprisingly, both the number of Trusts we work with and the number of patients we support are constantly growing. Doccla is a young company with big aims and a lot of momentum. We raised a $3.3m seed round in Q3 2021 and are continuing to grow. We're solving real problems for patients and health systems. We were fortunate to have a front-row seat during the early days of the cloud and the beginnings of the consumption based business models and are passionate about the shift to consumption and usage-based. When business models shift, infrastructure tools must shift accordingly. Amberflo is designed from the ground up as a developer friendly software platform that first tackles accurate metering (measurement of any cloud or application resource) at scale, providing a system of record of usage and consumption data on which downstream applications (such as billing, etc.) can reside.

Interfolio operates the first holistic faculty information system to support the full lifecycle of faculty work, from job seeking to review, tenure, sabbatical, committee work, research, and beyond. headline: Vanta automates security and compliance to protect customer data build trust in businesses
about: Vanta automates security and compliance, starting with SOC 2, to protect customer data and build trust in internet businesses. Our goal is to demystify internet security to the average person, equipping beginners with sane defaults and growing them into security-savvy principals who can explain how their company protects customer data and why their business is worthy of your trust. We’re a growing team, passionate about making the internet more secure by raising the standard for security and building tools to help today’s businesses surpass that bar. We’d like your help – we can’t do this alone.

Our team of highly customer-centric individuals constantly strive to build world-class products and AI algorithms that help core industries navigate climate change, de-risk ahead of extreme weather events, and operate more sustainably. We are driven by the enthusiasm of building new technologies, inventing cutting-edge products and transforming operations & maintenance for core industries. We are growing quickly with presence in US (San Jose, Austin, Reston), India (Bengaluru, Gurugram) and United Kingdom/EU. We are growing at 400% since incorporation in 2019. We signed our first customer in early 2020 and now have over 30 customers residing in the United States, United Kingdom, and Canada within the utilities, energy, transportation, water and wastewater, mining, and construction industries. To fuel our growth and global expansion plans, we have recently secured $27M in a Series B funding led by G2 Venture Partners and joined by existing investors, BGV and National Grid Partners. This round brings the company’s total funding amount to $33 million. More details on our recent fundraise and company: -> ->

This strong collaboration with MDM application developers and security engineers makes it efficient, easy and less expensive to build secure medical devices.

What are the problems we are solving? -We are streamlining the disorganized event organizing sector by bringing affiliate networks and event organizers together on one platform to assist students to start a side business while also helping event organizers increase ticket sales. -We are utilizing AI and ML to predict user behavior and sell them an experience they would love, instead of just a ticket. Formi is a platform that curates and assists users in finding unique experiences.

At SWORD Health, we saw the opportunity to take a truly disruptive and transformative approach to this problem by creating the first digital therapy solution that addresses the growing demand for therapy while reducing costs, empowering patients with their recovery to ultimately recover faster, and providing a rich source of data for clinical teams and decision makers. headline: The fast track to peak performance
about: Guidewheel is on a mission to empower all the world’s factories to reach sustainable peak performance. Inspired by the simple, universal truth that every machine on the factory floor has a power cord, our plug-and-play FactoryOps platform makes the power of the cloud accessible to any factory. Guidewheel clips onto any machine to turn its real-time “heartbeat” into a connected, actively learning system that empowers teams to reduce lost production time, increase throughput, and perform better and better over time. At Guidewheel we work with the factories that are the backbone of our economy, and you can have a real, on-the-ground impact right away. We have strong momentum and alignment around our mission, investor support, and a culture that values diversity, growth mindset, and results. And the tight link between our mission and our business model means that reaching more of the world’s 10 million factories accelerates our positive impact on the planet. Our brand recently evolved from Safi to Guidewheel to reinforce its strength as a tool to help guide teams to manufacturing excellence.

Q Bio was founded by Jeffrey Kaditz, serial entrepreneur and Founder of Affirm, Dr Michael Snyder, Chair of Genetics and Director of Personalized Medicine and Stanford University, and Dr Garry Choy, physician, radiologist, and former Chief Medical Information Officer at Mass General Hospital. We are fortunate to be backed by some of the best venture groups in the world including: A16Z, Khosla Ventures, Founders Fund, SciFi VC, and Kevin Durant.

about: Whisper uses deep learning in hearing aids to amplify only the voices and sounds of interest - the #1 need for 360MM+ folks with hearing loss. We're supported by Peter Thiel, Marc Andreessen, and Silicon Valley's most respected VCs. The companies we’ve founded have created over $2B in enterprise value and include companies like Hims, Bungalow, Homebound, Terminal, TalkIQ (acq) & a dozen more. Come visit us in the Presidio in San Francisco. We're a company builder & venture fund all in one. At Atomic, all initial ideas are generated, incubated, & funded in-house, through a rigorous and collaborative process that brings together a dynamic team of software engineers, product designers, and business minds. Everyone on our team is a builder, whether they work with wireframes, code, or ideas. The best part? We're just getting started. Entrepreneurs. Builders. Founders. Whatever you call us, one value binds us: we care deeply about the world we live in and strive to build products that make the every day exceptional.

headline: Superblocks helps developers build custom tooling for support, sales, and ops teams
about: At Superblocks, we're reinventing the way sophisticated custom applications are built. Superblocks is the all-in-one programmable platform for developers to build beautiful, secure, enterprise-grade internal tools fast: build any internal app, automate any workflow and schedule any job. Developers use the Superblocks development environment to bind their datasources and UI components together using drag and drop or code. Many programming languages are already supported, including Javascript, Python and SQL. Superblocks apps, workflows, or jobs are then deployed onto a custom URL with permissions, SSO, audit logging, and other enterprise functionality.

about: Welcome to N3TWORK, we're creating the very best mobile games. Find out more about our company and our products at WWW.N3TWORK.COM. Join our amazing team of gamemakers! We're hiring and would love to talk with you if you have a passion for leading or creating free games of all kinds.

We believe neural networks and learnt approaches will replace hand-coded software as we know it. Our goal is to power the intelligence of 1 billion devices by 2030.

The HDVI approach combines next-generation insurance with telematics and an integrated suite of software and support—all included within the cost of a smart, competitive insurance policy.

headline: Risk mitigation for institutional investors
about: Immuna platform helps crypto investors manage their risks of investing in crypto assets. The platform monitors and proactively defends investors’ crypto investments from unexpected exploits and undesirable economic situations. It detects on-chain exploits in real-time and extracts invested assets on behalf of the investors without needing access to their private keys. For instance: Immuna would have detected anomalous events of unexpected approval and transfers, which led to the $120M BadgerDAO Hack. Web3 has opened up the opportunity to bring financial inclusion not just at a country level but at a global level. Unfortunately, the rising number of exploits/hacks and huge economic losses are preventing the possibility of this vision from becoming true. Immuna is here to play a large role in making this vision a reality by building an intelligence infra company that builds security engines for the web3 platforms. If you are passionate about Web3 and want to help secure the Web3 ecosystem, join us for a front-row seat.
industries: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

headline: Commercial Real Estate Brokerage Services
about: NAI Northern California is the full-service outpost of NAI Global, the world’s largest network of commercial real estate brokers. With three offices in San Francisco, Oakland, and San Jose, we lead commercial real estate investments throughout the Bay Area, across Northern California, and around the country and the world thanks to the far-reaching NAI platform. Here locally, our team delivers CRE services with a heightened awareness of the technology that drives our region. Our advisors are the most tech-empowered of any under the NAI brand, maximizing the value we create for our clients, the industry, and our community. But we share more than just the tech of our neighbors. We share a mindset. Here it’s not enough to just be aware of what is. We’re also keenly focused on what could be. In Northern California, entrepreneurial thinking is habitual, and it’s a built-in mentality that we bring to every transaction. Since our founding in 2004, we’ve lived through booms and busts, recessions and crises, technological and social upheaval, and have continued to grow year after year. We credit our growth to our diverse client base and the practice of solving every real estate challenge they can present. about: Aira is setting a new standard for wireless charging with FreePower®, an elegant hardware and software solution that offers complete freedom of placement across surfaces. Slate is already a key tool for social media sports teams at the NFL, NBA, NHL, MLB, MLS, NCAA, and EPL followed by several other entertainment and media brands like Comedy Central, as well as adding top brands in fitness and beauty. Slate is a completely customizable mobile content creation app for top-tier social media teams to create branded content. When creating real-time content, enterprise social teams are forced to settle for colors that are “close” and fonts that “look less than cool”. Native options for graphics, stickers and filters are limited and don’t match the brand’s voice and image. But with today's consumer and fan in constant need of more content, there is no time to send every piece of captured media back and forth with the design team. This is when Slate jumps in to provide teams with a simple app that is fully customized to your brand; any fonts, graphics, logos, animated stickers, filters and sponsored overlays you need to create recognizable, quality content that is on brand, in real time. *Fun Fact: Slate was named to Fast Company's list of the World’s Most Innovative Companies for 2022 as No. 2 in the Video category!

Using these gaming tokens, users can play fun in-house games and win rewards up to Rs.25000 every week! about: Stem’s artist-first platform is pioneering an entirely new model of distribution and monetization.

headline: Live subtitles for any conversation. enjoy 24/7 access to conversations around you
about: Every day, millions of people are excluded from conversations because they cannot hear what others say well. Ava provides a way for them to be fully included in the conversation. Our CEO Thibault grew up in a Deaf family and saw firsthand how the world was not accessible for them. Together with our CTO Skinner — deaf since age 2 — Thibault co-founded Ava to make live captioning of conversations as easy as turning on captions on TV. Our small but fast-growing team has reinvented AI-based speech recognition technology to be in service of people who need it the most. We dream of a 24/7 accessible world, without any communication barrier. In this pursuit, we're seeing how much communication skills are critical, yet very far from ideal, to unleash our collective potential. This is for us the last barrier to be lifted. Our mobile app empowers individuals to see in close to realtime, who says what in the conversation. Ava swiftly pairs smartphones in a room and picks up all the audio from the conversation, to show a color-coded transcript of the speakers. At business meetings, family dinners, social gatherings, you simply launch the app, and Ava does the rest. Our belief is that well-designed technology can help everyone communicate and connect better — much more effectively and authentically — so humanity can achieve the greatest things together. We want to make the seemingly impossible equation of communication 1 + 1 = 3, work every time. In other words, make 1 & 1 = 3 a reality. WSJ - "WSJDLive Audience Favorite" TechCrunch - "Ava gives the deaf and hard-of-hearing a more present voice in group conversations" Forbes - "How one startup figured out what could really help deaf people"

about: We're building the next generation of design tools. Conversations are part of everyday interactions and an integral part of conversation design interfaces. about: Merit’s verified identity platform brings visibility, liquidity, and trust to people-data, giving organizations the clarity to make better-informed decisions, engage with individuals effectively, and pursue their mission efficiently. Merit works with trusted private, state, and municipal organizations to solve critical real-world problems in sectors such as workforce development, emergency services, licensing, education, and defense readiness. The COVID-19 crisis has transformed workforce development and emergency services, requiring states and municipalities to innovate and streamline critical services, such as reemployment and COVID-19 vaccination programs, using solutions like Merit. More than 1,400 organizations have sent 2.5 million+ merits, engaging 250,000+ active individuals – and the verified identity network grows daily.

headline: A platform to automate and streamline interview coordination to ensure a great hiring experience
about: ModernLoop helps companies automate and streamline recruiting operations to deliver the best hiring experience. In 2022, the Department of Labor estimates a global talent shortage of 40 million workers, which is expected to grow to over 85 million by 2030. For companies to win the war for talent, they need to provide a best-in-class candidate experience to recruit top talent, and our product aims at doing just that! Our founders, Lydia Han (CEO) and Chris Triolo (CTO) founded ModernLoop in December of 2020 after they saw the challenges recruiting teams had when coordinating virtual interviews. Recruiting teams are coordinating hundreds of interviews across various teams, departments, and time zones, all while working to ensure an excellent hiring experience in a dynamic and fast-paced labor market. After spending 15+ years at companies such as Facebook, Brex, Slack, and Salesforce, they understood what it took for recruiting teams to grow their organizations successfully! Lydia and Chris have built ModernLoop to serve companies of all industries and sizes to help recruiting teams interview candidates quicker, easier, and more efficiently! By creating a platform that caters to an excellent hiring experience, we’ve partnered with recruiting teams at companies like Benchling, Ramp, and Chainalysis to scale their teams and are continuing to partner with more companies to improve their team’s recruiting process.

This full-stack technology platform is the backbone of family financial health. Ethos has raised over $400 million from Sequoia Capital, SoftBank Vision Fund 2, Accel, and Google Ventures (GV). We are listed in Forbes’ Top 50 Fintechs of 2020, and as one of Built In's "Best Places to Work" of 2022. Come join us on our mission to protect the next million families.

headline: For teens, Copper is the digital bank that helps them establish financial freedom

headline: Social Trip Planner - Discover, plan, book and relive trips with friends
about: For travelers looking to have an awesome time and make memories, Pilot is a Social Trip Planner that brings everything they need to discover, plan, book and relive trips with friends in one place. It’s a collaborative platform that helps them stress less and have more fun, while saving time & money. We created Pilot to help +1 billion people have an awesome time and make memories. Forced to interact online only, COVID made the world miss travel and feel alone and unfulfilled. As big travelers ourselves, we know how travel has the power to help people connect through amazing experiences offline. But when we looked for a platform that brought everything people needed to discover, plan, book, treasure and share trips with friends into one place, we were at a loss. Instead we found marketplaces that just try to get as much of your money as possible, or apps that just do one thing (like packing). All this despite the fact that people want all their travel ideas, plans, bookings, and memories organized in one place, shareable with friends, not scattered across the web like they are today. So we decided to build Pilot. Today we’re in public beta, being used by travelers around the world. The way we see it, the future of technology should be to help people live happier lives through shared experiences offline, not doing everything possible to keep them online (like Meta). We intend to be around for as long as enough people agree.

Coalition is addressing this gap by providing no-cost cybersecurity tools to prevent losses, security and incident response services to contain them, and comprehensive insurance to help organizations recover from failures and breaches. Founded in 2017, Coalition has raised $300M from leading global technology investors, including Index Ventures, General Atlantic, Ribbit Capital, Vy Capital, Hillhouse Capital, and Valor Equity Partners, among others. headline: Changing How Businesses Around the World Connect With Nearby Consumers
about: We’re a mighty team of more than 300 creative thinkers, experienced leaders, passionate innovators and some of the friendliest folks you’ll ever meet. We work remotely and in-person at six offices around the globe, with headquarters in Berlin. We like to refer to ourselves as Uberallers, too. In 2013, Uberall was born out of the vision by longtime friends and business partners David Federhen and Florian Hübner. They wanted to bridge the online and offline world more effectively, so companies could generate new customers, build customer relationships and increase their sales. They created a platform that would connect companies with local customers through search and discovery, engagement and conversion. Our SaaS platform enables multi-location brands and businesses to boost their online presence. Our customers are as large as KFC, BP and DHL (and others whose names are not entirely made of capital letters!) and as small as your local independent coffee shop or record store. Some customers work directly with us, and many more engage with our platform via Reseller Partners around the world. More than one million business locations trust the Uberall platform to manage the connections with their customers and prospects on the search engines, platforms and directories that matter. Learn more at www.uberall.com.

headline: At RealSelf, the people are authentic and our work is inspiring

Since 2006 our authentic reviews, unbiased ratings, and expert answers from board-certified doctors have helped tens of millions of people explore their options, from skincare to laser skin resurfacing to highly considered cosmetic surgery. Millions of people from around the world visit RealSelf each month to browse patient reviews, before and after photos, and medical experts’ answers to discover which treatments and doctors live up to their promise of being "Worth It." From skincare and emerging nonsurgical technologies to highly considered cosmetic surgeries, RealSelf makes it easy to get the insights consumers need to make smart, confident decisions and find the right doctor. With the backing of world-class investors, we’re growing RealSelf into a global business with a broad range of services. Join us and put your creative and problem-solving skills to work at www.realself.com/jobs.

headline: Empowering the healthcare workforce
about: Trusted, Inc. is the leading labor marketplace and workforce management solution for the healthcare industry. Trusted was founded in 2017 with a focus on the largest profession in healthcare: nursing. Since then, they’ve taken a process dominated by recruiters and phone calls and converted it to a fully digital experience, connecting nurses directly to job opportunities and handling benefits, payroll, onboarding, and compliance. Over 10,000,000 hours of care have been managed through their platform, across all 50 states and the District of Colombia. In just a few short years, Trusted has become one of the fastest-growing companies in the history of the healthcare staffing industry, recognized in 2020 as one of Forbes’ “Next Billion Dollar Companies.” Trusted has support from top institutional investors such as Craft Ventures, Felicis Ventures, StepStone Group, and Founder Collective, as well as healthcare innovators like Texas Medical Center, Mercy Health, Intermountain Ventures, Town Hall Ventures, and Healthbox. They have raised over $150mm to date.

headline: 101 helps anyone launch their own web3-powered learning hub
about: 101 helps anyone launch their own web3-powered learning hub, complete with NFT badges, crypto rewards, token-gating, and more. We’ve built the only no-code course builder that autonomously issues NFT badges as proof of learning. Since launch earlier this year, over 200 communities have launched a course, issuing over 150,000 badges to over 100,000 users. We believe that web3 completely changes the landscape of what's possible in the world of education. Here's some of the things we're thinking about: For the first time, learning credentials can be default compatible. That means that everything being learned becomes a portable skillset that students can take with them across the internet. Web3 credentials contribute to a in a way that traditional certifications simply cannot. With a web3 architecture, content is composable, meaning anyone can make a cirriculum with other people's content and the original creators can still be credited. Want to sell courses to your audience without having to make content? Now you can. Want to issue credentials based off of someone else's cirriculum? You can do that. A web3 architecture allows educators to truly own their relationship to their community. You don't need anyone's permission to access our tools. If you find a better tool, you can take your community with you when you leave. All the data you need is on-chain.

about: The Org is the world’s biggest network of public org charts. We empower start-up leaders to show off their team, attract more talent, and build a better organization. Our mission is to make organizations more transparent and we hope you want to join us!

Using Podium’s technology, local businesses are able to simplify the way they build their business and modernize the way they communicate with their customers – from collecting payments, facilitating online reviews, launching marketing campaigns, and much more. Our work and focus on local business and helping them to build thriving businesses has been recognized across the industry, including Forbes’ Next Billion Dollar Startups, Forbes’ Cloud 100, the Inc. 5000 (#13), and Fast Company’s World’s Most Innovative Companies. For more about our product, watch this video. Podium has a positive, inclusive, and supportive culture and was recently named one of Inc. Magazine’s Best Workplaces for 2021 (4 years in a row). headline: Embedded Credit for India

We provide users with the full credit limit they deserve using access to new Data sources that provide access to the full financial profile of the individual, proprietary algorithms that make our solutions applicable to those who do not have the required documents as well as an Ecosystem that provides cheap access to Credit for consumers while lowering Default rates.

headline: Deliver learning in the flow of work
about: Inspired by Stanford research, Arist helps leading companies deliver learning, training, and nudges in the flow of work via Teams, Slack, and text message-based courses. Used by over 10% of the Fortune 500, Arist is a pioneer in meeting learners where they are. Message-based courses consist of 1,200-character concept or case study "blocks" texted to the user every morning over the course of 5-30 days. Each block can include images, GIFs, and assessments. By utilizing cutting-edge research from Stanford and UPenn, message-based courses have completion and satisfaction rates of over 90% (vs. ~5% for video courses). In fact, we view message-based courses as a brand-new content medium, with a variety of impactful use cases ranging from preventing misinformation to COVID-19 training in refugee camps to DEI training for startups. Arist is backed by Y Combinator, Craft Ventures, and a number of leading learning executives. If you'd like to learn more, check out our deck:

headline: The only modern B2B operating system for the grocery industry
about: Vori is the only modern B2B operating system for the grocery industry (think Instacart or DoorDash but for grocery retailers and their wholesale suppliers). Our customers include everyone from Safeway and CVS properties on down to local corner stores.

headline: Big questions need wise answers. We help millions make crucial life choices
about: Done it a few times. We’re doing it again. Now, we’re aiming higher. Our story and brands Fueled by over 100 million visitors a year, our first three brands—Zety, InterviewMe, and ResumeLab—are one of the biggest career websites in the world. After we’ve sold them to strategic investors, we want to make an impact in other industries. Our mission We help millions navigate through crucial life choices. What should I do now to live to see my grandkids graduate from college? Will this mortgage secure my future or make it miserable? How can I create a loving bond with my kids? All these decisions havelife-changing consequences. We help our users find reliable advice. The world doesn’t need more content—it needs high-quality and trustworthy content. We’re only interested in the most important topics in people’s lives. For now, it’s wellness, finance, and parenthood. To succeed and build some of the largest online brands in the world, we need a special kind of team. See who we’re looking for: How do we do that? Explore First, we identify the biggest markets in organic search. By responding to people’s needs in these areas, we reach huge audiences. We hire smart people, who care about others, to join us. Build We make an impact through large scale and growing our business. We deliver carefully researched content and world-class products that make a difference in the world. Grow As we gain traction, we keep refining our products and growing the business. And we want our team members to grow as fast as the company does.

As accounting teams worked remotely, the demand for tools to streamline their virtual processes spiked. At FloQast, business development reps watched controllers go from calling it “FloQuest” to blocking an hour of their CFO’s calendar for a demo in less than 15 minutes. In multiple instances, sales closed within the same day. Headed into 2023, FloQast has no plans to slow down. FloQast is fast growing and fueled by the success and passion of our employees. Our company values are defined and driven by employees, and we are fanatic about creating and maintaining a fabulous culture of support and success for everyone. Our headquarters and production facility are in Hayward, CA. We have also have a co-working space in San Francisco. headline: Making recycling affordable for businesses and profitable for recyclers
about: Semifinalist in the ongoing IBM Watson AI XPrize Our first and flagship product, TrashBot, is a "smart" trash can that combines next-generation robotics and sensor technology that allows it to differentiate between recyclable materials and non-recyclable waste. Simply place your garbage in a Trashbot and walk away. TrashBot automatically sorts recyclables such as metals, plastics, and glass from landfill waste, while simultaneously gathering information about the type of waste generated. TrashBots continuously save facilities and waste hauler's time through our waste management platform and continuous access to on-demand, high-level waste audits. TrashBot has the potential to replace all of the conventional, space-consuming trash and recycling bins we currently use. From corporate workplaces to stadiums and ballparks, to universities, schools, and airports, the practical applications for TrashBot are endless.

We solve $1.25T problem of access to affordable safe drugs. Our tech stack includes a proprietary instant drug testing platform- RxScanner™- that helps our sellers authenticate the medicines they sell. We also have the RxPOS™ that helps our sellers manage and sell inventory in store and online through our RxDelivered™ marketplace. Further, we have our embedded fintech RxPay™ that helps finance invoices for buyers on our platform ensuring availability and affordability of high quality medicines from our pharma company and wholesaler partners to our B2B2C customers. Our vision is to enable universal access to high quality medicines at the lowest prices to all humans across the world - starting with Africa.

headline: Sales Acceleration Tool

Orum integrates with Salesforce, Outreach, and Salesloft and is deployed in a Software-as-a-Service model. Their target market is high growth B2B technology companies as well as outsourced service providers that specialize in sales development.
industries: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

headline: A single API to send a payment - no onboarding/signup/app download required by recipient!
about: We are solving a huge problem in financial services that has been lying unsolved for decades. All major payment systems (including wallets ) require two sided onboarding i.e. Payor and Payee need to onboard before they can transact. We have built a way to generate and transmit Digital Payments without onboarding the Payee/Recipient. This is huge in terms of bringing traditional paper and cash payments online. Add to that, we've figured out a clever way to monetize from both sides thereby changing the financial equation from Customers paying us to us paying our customers cash back from card fees! Our investors, whom we call our "believers," include Tim Draper, Adam Draper (Tim Draper's family), Naval Ravikabt through his AngelList Maiden Fund, co-founder of Intuit and more! Institutional investors include a top 4 bank and top 5 insurance company. Checkbook lets businesses move away from paper to deliver Digital Checks directly to a recipients email. This allows businesses to keep all their existing Accounts Payable (or Accounts Receivable processes) in place while moving to a completely online solution. All you need to send a check is the name and email of the recipient along with the amount you are sending. Recipients do not need to sign up for any service, download any app or pay any fees to receive payments. Digital Checks can be deposited and cashed online after instantly verifying banking credentials. No more paying high % based transaction fees on credit and debit cards or sharing sensitive bank account and routing numbers to payor.

We are on a mission to remove the largest barriers for anyone to deepen their compassion for the world’s animals, and to shape a biodiverse future for our planet. headline: Using healthcare data to analyze workflows and drive clinical outcomes
about: Doctors and nurses are presented with a number of "nudges" while they're at their workstations to help drive better care for patients. For example, they might receive an alert saying, "Don't prescribe this patient penicillin because of an allergy." Behind the scenes, there is a team of informatics and quality teams at a hospital that manage the systems that provide this information. This team has a challenge, however. On one hand, these processes can lead to better patient health and safety. On the other, doctors and nurses feel so overwhelmed by the constant stream of information to them that some are quitting their professions altogether. These hospital administrators don't have the tools to quickly access data so that they can better understand these tradeoffs. Phrase Health provide analytics and management tools for behind-the-scenes hospital operational teams to review the workflows that doctors, nurses, and other clinical teams work in. These insights drive improvements that lead to happier clinicians and healthier patients.

headline: A mental health benefit for every employee
about: Tava Health is a full-stack mental health platform, giving employers the opportunity to offer the unique benefit of comprehensive mental health care to their employees. Employees are matched with world-class therapists and psychiatrists without needing to navigate the complexities of the health insurance system. This model enables all employees to receive the care they require.

headline: Bloomberg for DAOs with Marketplace layer
about: DAOstruct is an end-to-end DAO creation, governance, and research platform. Our mission is to facilitate mass adoption of DAOs and build systems & frameworks to that end. We are building a platform which allows people to cover every aspect of their interaction with DAOs in their entirety - This will firstly include a marketplace which enables the discovery of more than 4000 DAOs. We want to abstract the entire process of joining or exiting these organisations, via ERC20/ERC721 tokens, that is coins or NFTs. The discovery aspect will include all the information a person might need to make informed decisions on investing, by providing exhaustive data points around their financials, treasuries, their use cases, past proposals, team doxxing and information, and roadmaps.

headline: We 10x healthcare analytics by providing real-time compliance
about: At Integral, we're working hard to revolutionize how analysis happens in healthcare. The entire healthcare industry is facing an inflection point and doubling down on data driven decision making. However, when you're working with healthcare data, everything starts with compliance. And compliance today is outdated, slow, painful, expensive, and delays insights that affect people's everyday lives. Drug development, insurance pricing, and clinical trial recruitment are just a few areas that are affected by outdated compliance processes. We're creating a future where connecting health related datasets is as simple as checking a box.

headline: Biotech company specializing in early cancer diagnoses
about: Freenome is on a mission to empower everyone with the tools they need to detect, treat, and ultimately prevent diseases. If you crave challenges, understudied problems, and the chance to see your work impact the millions of lives touched by cancer, there’s no better place to be. We are committed to our core values of empathy, integrity, and trust enable us to push through challenges, learn from mistakes, and support one another to reach our fullest potential. By applying advanced ML techniques to recent breakthroughs in genomic science, Freenome is developing simple blood tests to detect early-stage cancer and make treatments more effective. The company has raised $238M from investors such as RA Capital, Polaris Partners, Perceptive Advisors, a16z, funds/accounts advised by T. Rowe Price Associates, Inc., GV (fka Google Ventures), Roche Venture Fund, Kaiser Permanente Ventures, American Cancer Society’s BrightEdge Ventures, Data Collective Venture Capital, & Verily Life Sciences.

headline: Building the future of multiplayer
about: At Improbable, we believe that simulations as large and complex as the real world are the next fundamental breakthrough technology. Like in the real world, objects in these simulations will change in response to their environment, and their interactions will combine to form massive, complex systems. We are building the platform to make these simulations possible. New worlds for gaming and entertainment can now be created using our product, SpatialOS. Our technology creates permanent, persistent and engaging experiences: worlds where your actions really matter. The same technology that makes imaginary worlds feel real can also illuminate complex systems at work in reality. We use insight acquired through simulation to solve real world problems. You can find out more about our technology on our website - improbable.io

headline: Gather. Collaborate. Play
about: We envision a future where employees work in VR and AR headsets instead of using old-fashioned monitors. By slipping on a headset, knowledge workers would be able to transport themselves into a beautiful virtual office where they could sit and work right next to their colleagues or in private spaces. What's even better is that they could jump into adjacent rooms with their colleagues and play fun games ranging from table tennis to zombie shooters. At the moment we send a headset to each team member of distributed teams and host them for a few fun games and collaborative sessions. We have more demand than we can handle and need some Unity experts to help us create more magic!

headline: Helping non-technical founders build SaaS product with no code platform
about: FUZEN is a low code software development platform, which uses other popular apps as building blocks to build customized business process automation workflows. FUZEN partners with SaaS entrepreneurs and domain experts, to build business solutions based on their expertise. FUZEN facilitates fast tracked development of highly customized, niche SaaS apps, at ZERO upfront cost. FUZEN takes care of product, hosting, payments for a share of the app revenue. It minimizes the risk for our partners going into the SaaS business. It also allows them to focus their time and resources on educating end users and selling the app. For the end users, FUZEN becomes the marketplaces for highly niche solutions developed by the domain experts, which connect with their favorite tools.

Our mission is to develop a large-scale IoT network that allows public and private forest owners to monitor, analyze and protect the world’s largest, most remote forests. Our goal is to build and deploy a robust and reliable ultra-early fire detection system to prevent the spread of forest fires as well as a monitoring platform to ensure the health of forests.

headline: Cloud platform for spatial multi-omics data management and analysis
about: We develop a cloud platform to manage and analyze spatial omics data, and integrate across different platforms. This brings various challenges, ranging from biology, bioinformatics and machine learning, up to scalable software engineering (HPC, DevOps, deep learning). Our web stack is built in Clojure, whereas our computation engine is Python-based.

headline: Build Trust

Ockam empowers developers to build applications that can Trust Data-in-Motion across complex, variable, and hostile networks. Ockam has a simple developer experience and powerful primitives that orchestrate end-to-end encryption, key management, authorization policy enforcement, and mutual authentication. Visit Ockam.io for open roles on our Team.

about: Kipsi is a venture-backed, accounting software company. We are passionate about using technology to improve the accounting profession and make the lives of accountants easier. Kipsi is based in the Bay Area but we are a remote-first company.

headline: Credit investing made global
about: Credix is rethinking and rebuilding how debt capital markets should work. It combines the most scalable web3 infrastructure including proprietary, highly scalable algorithms and innovative smart contract logic to provide institutional investors the experience and opportunities they’ve been looking for. Credix enables high quality loan originators around the world to access previously untapped capital in a matter of days, in a digital and regulatory compliant platform. Credix was founded in 2021 by an experienced crypto and blockchain team looking to combine their expertise and passion with the desire to change how debt financing works today. Credix is backed by Motive Partners, ParaFi, Valor Capital, MGG Invesement Group, Victory Park Capital, Abra, Circle Ventures, Fuse, Solana Ventures and DRW Cumberland.

headline: We're like Khan Academy meets TikTok
about: At Edily, we start with why: we are building Edily in order to address the epidemic of low high school engagement. While 75% of 5th graders report that they are engaged in school, by 12th grade that number drops to 32%. However we know that high schoolers are engaged and inspired by education-focused creators like @chemicalkim, a chemistry educator who has over 1 Million followers on TikTok, so we want to build a place where these educators have all the tools necessary to inspire kids online. Edily is a mobile app combining the engagement of social platforms with focus and organization of educational platformws. We enable educators and students to be participants rather than passengers in the edtech ecosystem, helping them create educational videos that are fun in a TikTok-like format that appeals to the way kids want to be engaged. Our platform not only features creators and influencers, but also tags videos to curriculum, has discovery algorithms that emphasizes learning (not time spent online), has video creation tools that enable educators to build videos quickly and even earn money, and personalizes which of the many videos a student may learn from on a specific topic.

headline: Grandstage uses AI to generate social media insights for influencers and brands
about: Grandstage makes it easier for you as an influencer to know what resonates with their fans, so you can make more engaging content and more revenue. Gone are the days of wasting time throwing spaghetti at the wall to see what sticks, which costs you time and money. Our fan insights app uses AI to analyze your audience and content to give you plain language, bite-sized insights and recommendations to guide your content creation process. All for a small monthly fee between $5 and $100, depending on the size of your audience.

headline: Technology for large-scale human coordination
about: Governments and companies have failed to move the needle against many of humanity’s most important challenges and opportunities. We need new organizational structures. At Tephra Labs, we believe that decentralized human networks have the potential to be the right meta-coordinating structures for these large-scale problems. These networks can engage diverse participants and grow to unprecedented sizes (hundreds of millions of people). Further, they do not rely on the same kind of centralized direction-setting that is characteristic of governments and companies – making them lower overhead organizational structures overall. Tephra Labs’ mission is to enable large-scale human coordination to address humanity’s most important challenges and opportunities. We aim to build the infrastructure to scale decentralized networks to billions of people, and to support network participants in leading consistent, purposeful, and fulfilling lives. Our hypothesis is that hyper-scale decentralized networks will grow by engaging people as independent workers, rather than employees. So, we are building the necessary products, tooling, and services to help independent workers thrive. Our first product is Radius ( ). Radius is a decentralized network that connects independent workers and teams to the best projects in web3. As part of the Radius project, we are building decentralized reputation systems, skills attestation protocols, and a user-owned and value accretive economy. In accordance with our mission, we will also build educational curricula and programs to help train Radius workers and onboard them successfully into web3 work opportunities. We are excited to build the necessary infrastructure to enable the first billion-person organizations in human history. If this mission also inspires you, consider joining us.

about: We are creating the plant-based ecosystem in India to provide better values of health & sustainability to all.

Founded by alumnus of IIT Kharagpur, we are an early-stage funded start-up serving customers in 100+ countries. We like to stay informal, structurally flat and fun to work with. We love our customers, and obsess about their needs round the clock. If that sounds like a mix you would fit into, we would love to know you better.

about: Modulate, recognized by TIME as one of the 100 Most Influential Companies 2022, is unlocking deeper and more inclusive social interactions online. We partner with apps and games to deliver a variety of unique services through a single SDK - including VoiceWear, a real-time voice replacement system that allows you to sound like a favorite character while retaining the emotion and nuance in your voice, and ToxMod, a voice-native AI reporting and moderation tool which helps human moderators more efficiently identify and react to bad behavior on their platforms. The common theme at Modulate is using our combination of cutting-edge technical talent, thoughtful design approach to safety and community-building, and appreciation for the balance between technology and humanity, to build a completely unprecedented toolkit that gives each platform what it needs to manage their unique communities.

headline: Banking for College Students
about: We are building banking that helps students save money so they can pursue their academic and professional goals without worrying about their finances. With Firstcard, you automatically receive discounts on everyday purchases. Firstcard is based in Silicon Valley and has raised $3M from VCs such as AngelList Quants Fund. We launched a debit card that gives students up to 15% instant student discount cashback.

headline: The Most Fun Streaming Service on Earth: Netflix meets Patreon meets Disneyland
about: Cideshow is a streaming service that's an alternative to all other streaming services. Instead of just being another Netflix/Hulu clone, we are a streaming service geared towards creative people and focused on being an active rather than a passive experience. We're doing this, first of all, by showcasing series and movies that are taking chances and wouldn't necessarily be distributed on other platforms because, while they're great ideas, they're unproven. Our audience wants unproven concepts and to be the first to discover them. We remove algorithms and instead let our audience directly decide on our content, which can often be described as artistic, edgy, experimental, fun, interactive, and, above all, not mainstream. We also doing this by imbuing Cideshow with crowdfunding and gamification. Viewers directly renew their favorite shows with virtual currency, and they are incentivized with rewards for doing so. Viewers can also ascend to higher statuses by watching/supporting/participating in shows, which unlock more privilegies and powers for them, making Cideshow the only gamified streaming service and an engaging, addictive experience. We created Cideshow in 2017, and we have been using that time to get a working prototype up. We now have this prototype up and running, and we're ready to make Cideshow everything it can be. With a lot more content on its way, we're about to enter the Angel/Seed round of funding to build out the content, the main site, and the marketing. Now that we're at this stage, we're looking to establish a solid team that can help bring Cideshow to its full potential. We are set on creating a more imaginative, fun, and active television experience for the world. We're looking for those who are inspired by this goal and who are ready to join us on the journey. Step right up...

headline: The Leading Communication Hub
about: Rocket.Chat is an enterprise communication hub that offers numerous solutions: Omnichannel Customer Experience, Team Collaboration, and DevOps. Companies can control their communication and user data with a GDPR/HIPAA/CCPA compliant tool. Workspaces can be self-managed or hosted in Rocket.Chat’s cloud. The main benefit is to centralize organizational communication and boost productivity by bringing messages, video calls, file sharing, and all team communication into one place. A reliable open source communication platform for the enterprise world, trusted by 12 Million users in 150 countries for high-private team chatting and collaboration. Built-in JavaScript, using the Meteor full-stack framework, the tool offers omnichannel customer engagement through LiveChat widget and integrations with Whatsapp, Twilio, Messenger, SMS, Emails, among others. Team collaboration can be improved by chat messaging, video conferences, audio messages, file sharing, threads, discussion groups, direct or group messages, real-time translation, audit messaging panel, and custom user permissions. DevOps can be accelerated with native integrations offered in Rocket.Chat`s marketplace, real-time LDAP, webhooks, and powerful APIs.

headline: The modern HQ where every company can thrive, on their terms

Codi is solving this problem with private offices built for the way people work today. With easy move-ins, turnkey spaces, and no long-term leases, every company can find a space where their team can thrive. More than a space provider, Codi becomes companies' long-term growth partners, adapting their spaces to the team culture and growth needs.

headline: Discovering hidden talents and turning them into globally successful authors
about: At Inkitt, we believe that every author should have an equal chance to succeed. Our mission is to discover hidden talents from all around the world and turn them into globally successful authors. Inkitt is a pioneer at the forefront of Data Driven Publishing. Using an analytic and objective approach, we’ve discovered hundreds of talented authors around the world with over 50% of our published authors achieving $100,000+ in sales. We have forever changed the traditional publishing model by inventing an algorithm which analyzes users' reading behavior to identify hits, in turn removing subjectivity from the equation. This gives Inkitt the unique ability to discover hidden talents that might otherwise have gone unnoticed. At present, we are an international team of 85 passionate and dedicated inventors and entrepreneurs and we are growing quickly. We invent new solutions to problems we encounter, as opposed to simply iterating upon existing solutions. Join us to build the Disney of the 21st Century!

headline: Transforming Dentistry using Artificial Intelligence
about: Variation of diagnosis is a challenge in dentistry. Going to 10 different dentists can result in 10 very different diagnoses. This variation adversely affects the quality of patient care and results in reduced profitability for practices and insurance companies. Overjet was founded by leading experts from MIT and Harvard School of Dental Medicine who are dedicated to solving the most challenging problems in $130B dental industry to improve care for millions of patients. Overjet's Intelligence Platform analyzes dental data to determine what treatments are necessary for the patient. This helps automate claim review process for dental insurance companies saving them millions of dollars spent on hiring dental reviewers. It also helps increase practice profitability and standardize patient care for group dental practices by identifying necessary but missed treatments by dentists.

Starburst queries data across any database, making it instantly actionable for data-driven organizations. With Starburst, teams can lower the total cost of their infrastructure and analytics investments, prevent vendor lock-in, and use the existing tools that work for their business. Trusted by companies like Comcast, FINRA, and Condé Nast, Starburst helps companies make better decisions faster on all data.

headline: Aquaculture meets machine learning
about: Aquabyte ( , backed by NEA and Costanoa) is on a mission to revolutionize the ocean sustainability and efficiency of aquaculture. It is an audacious, and incredibly rewarding mission. By making fish farming cheaper and more viable than livestock production, we aim to mitigate one of the biggest causes of climate change and help prepare our planet for impending population growth. Aquaculture is the single fastest growing food-production sector in the world, and now is the time to define how technology is used to harvest the ocean for generations to come. Through custom underwater cameras, computer vision, and machine learning we are able to quantify fish weights, detect sea lice infestations, and generate optimal feeding plans in real time. Our product operates at three levels: on-site hardware for image capture, cloud pipelines for data processing, and a user-facing web application. As a result, there are hundreds of moving pieces and no shortage of fascinating challenges across all levels of the stack. If interested, please apply at or email: jobs@aquabyte.ai

headline: Empowering product-led sales

In this new world, HeadsUp enables product-led sales by providing visibility into user behaviors that sales reps care about. It tells them which customers to focus on, when to reach out, and the best playbook for any scenario.

At Persona, what brings our team together is our desire to help our fellow teammates succeed and our motivation to make the internet a safer place. We are starting with the $131 billion US parking real estate market because it is one of the most offline and mismanaged commercial real estate asset types. As a full-stack parking operator, we automate the operation of parking lots and parking garages. We handle everything from advertising to collecting payments from drivers and enforcing against illegal parking. We already operate 150+ parking lots and parking garages across 30 US states and we are growing quickly. We are backed by top tier investors including Andreessen Horowitz, Floodgate, Founders Fund, and angel investors who have founded or worked at companies like Uber, Opendoor, Flexport, and more.

headline: Virta helps people reverse type 2 diabetes and other chronic conditions
about: Virta is the first clinically-proven treatment to safely and sustainably reverse type 2 diabetes and other chronic metabolic diseases without the use of medications or surgery. Just a few short years ago, type 2 diabetes reversal wasn’t considered possible. Fast forward to today, and Virta’s pioneering efforts have made it mainstream, while revolutionizing healthcare delivery in the process. Still, there’s so much more to be done! If you’re ready to redefine what’s possible, transform our industry, and reinvent healthcare for good, we invite you to join our cause at Virta! We have opportunities for software engineers, health coaches, scientists, clinicians, and more. Visit to see our full list of open roles. See how Virta is transforming healthcare by developing the next generation of healthcare technology. Check out our technical blog at .

headline: Making work meetings more effective and incluisve
about: Equal time is a smart teamwork platform that makes it easy and fun to save time and create inclusive teams. Our tools enable companies to hire, promote and retain employees equitably by creating fair and welcoming work environments. Virtual meeting participants can view speaking time, interruptions, and monologues, and learn how their language impacts others. They get notifications and supportive recommendations in real-time. Teams, managers and companies benefit by being able to spot trends and coach their employees. We want to create a world where employees get more time back in their day, enjoy their meetings, and have a fair chance to succeed no matter their identity or location.

headline: APIs to make your app multiplayer, just like Figma
about: With Snippyly APIs, developers can make their apps multiplayer & collaborative, just like Figma. Today, 99% of all online tools we use are siloed and not collaborative. They are not built collaboration-first. With Snippyly, we will fix this. Join us to build the future of every shared experience on the web - like working together, booking trips together, learning together, watching content, shopping etc. Like Stripe built the payments infrastructure for the internet, we are building the collaboration infrastructure for the internet. We imagine a future where you can collaborate with anyone from anywhere like they were there. Snippyly will make the world more collaborative & enable everyone to build more great things together.

headline: Polycam develops the leading 3D capture apps for mobile and web
about: Polycam lets people capture and share their world in 3D as easily as taking a photo or video! Using the LiDAR, video and motion data available on smartphones, together with cutting-edge computer vision and AI, Polycam's 3D capture app is bringing an entirely new form of reality capture to the masses. Polycam is used by hundreds of thousands of people to scan spaces and objects for uses cases that range form architecture and interior design to VfX and video game creation. By democratizing 3D capture and creation we believe we will enable everyone to participate in building the metaverse. Why join Polycam?

Founded by IIT Kanpur, Stanford, and INSEAD Alumni and backed by Sequoia Capital, we are on a mission to help millions of Indian youth launch a successful career. Seekho, which is a product of Seekify, is your very own playground to learn, mentor and hire. If you are a learner, Seekho enables you to get expert knowledge through snackable, 1-minute learning videos, quizzes, competitive learning streaks and more. If you are an expert, Seekho enables you to share your expert knowledge and spread your influence. headline: The smartest way to evaluate risk in any relationship

This number will rise dramatically over the next 10 years as technology trends like public clouds, enterprise mobility and IoT make our businesses and lives more vulnerable to attackers. So who will meet these security demands? Bugcrowd is the premier marketplace for security testing on web, mobile, source code and client-side applications. Taking the leads of Facebook, Paypal and Google's crowdsourced bug bounty programs, we've developed a platform and community that combines a proprietary vulnerability reporting platform with the largest crowd of security researchers on the planet.

about: At Amie, we’re building the joyful productivity app. A new way to look at productivity. By combining to-dos and calendar in one, and simplifying every step until we can create an app that truly . Think of all the to-do lists you’ve written in your life. How many different tools did you use to write them? Paper, post-its, planners, the Notes app, the Reminders app, an email draft, a calendar event, Evernote, Wunderlist to name a few. This doesn’t sound very productive to us. You might have noticed the word “joyful” above. We’re pretty bullish about that: using your calendar app doesn't need to feel boring, and it sure doesn't need to feel like work. We achieve this feeling of joyfulness by taking the time to focus on each detail of our product. Every little interaction should be smoother than ever before.

But choosing the right Medicare coverage is tremendously important — traditional Medicare leaves seniors responsible for at least 20% of medical costs and doesn't cover prescription drugs, dental, hearing, or vision care. And more than 10,000 coverage options exist nationwide, with each senior often facing 50+ options in their location alone.
