We do this by helping brands store inventory closer to their customers using our platform connected to a nationwide network of fulfillment centers and last-mile couriers - billed entirely on usage We work with leading retail & eCommerce brands in India across the industry verticals and have been a market leader in the eCommerce fulfillment space in India. We're backed by prominent VC funds and supply chain leaders like Y Combinator, Funders Club, Flexport, Soma Cap, Pioneer Fund, and Elmes VP. Our leadership team comes from Delhivery & Pitney Bowes with credentials from prestigious tech institutes.

headline: We help video creators grow online faster with the help of AI
about: We are building the modern infrastructure stack for online video creators. Video creators waste hours in doing manual and unfulfilling work when creating content. With vidyo.ai, we help creators automate their workflow and focus on creating more content. Refer to vidyo.ai for more

headline: We’re making a bank you can build on
about: Griffin is building an API-first bank that will dramatically lower the barrier to entry when it comes to launching new financial products and services. We're a new Banking as a Service provider (BaaS), based in London. We are currently seeking authorisation to become a fully regulated bank, so that we can provide safeguarding and client money bank accounts to our customers. About half of the leadership team has prior experience setting up a new bank in the UK and the process is well underway. We're heading towards a future where people and firms get most of their financial services and products from technology companies and other non-bank firms, rather than high street banks. But firms that handle their customers' money will still need to partner with a bank to safeguard and securely manage access to these funds. That's where we come in. We're aiming to be a world leader in this space, offering financial products built by technology experts with all the security and robust controls of a fully regulated bank.

headline: Customer-facing analytics for any platform
about: Explo provides a powerful embedded dashboard and reporting solution, enabling companies to securely share customizable product analytics, project reports, and KPIs with each of their end-users all while seamlessly matching the product's design. If you're interested in joining our team, please reach out to recruiting@explo.co or visit www.explo.co/careers/.

headline: Paying the world's independent workforce
about: The world of work is changing. Rapidly and drastically. As much as 50% of the workforce will be contingent in the next few years. That's $800 billion in spend. And the ecosystem is fragmented, inefficient and old school. We are changing that through automation, AI, digitizing workflows and building beautiful, intuitive tools. We work some of the world's leading brands and many of the most distruptive online staffing platforms and human marketplaces: we make it easy for them to onboard and pay contract/freelance/gig workers. GreenLight makes it safe and easy for companies to organize and pay their freelance and contract workers. We are the API compliance layer powering The Future of Work. GreenLight: Paying the world's independent workforce.

At Home Made we are on a mission to develop the trusted rental ecosystem that works for both landlords and renters. We believe that renting and letting a home should be easy, fair and cost-effective. We developed brilliant technology and brought together a hardworking and talented team. Together, we are making the process of renting a property better for thousands of people, and this is just the beginning. We have just raised $5M in our Seed rounds and are now looking to triple in size before our next round of VC funding. We are proud to be listed as one of the UK’s Top-100 startups in 2020 (by Startups.co.uk and Seedtable), and we are the grateful recipients and nominees of various awards including the Amazon Growing Business awards, the RESI awards and The Europas. Do you think you have what it takes to be part of Home Made? We'd love to hear from you.

headline: Data academies on demand
about: Enki makes it simple and cost-effective for companies to run and manage an internal data academy. The platform works by combining customized training exercises with a managed marketplace of data experts and software-enabled operational processes that guarantee engagement and results. Enki are a team of growth and data experts that have built companies with over $100m in revenues before. Enki has also built a community of millions of professionals through a bite-sized mobile technical-training learning app and open-source learning curriculum. These have helped inform Enki's training algorithms, learner experience, and curriculum used across the platform.

headline: Helping people learn STEM with fun and challenging interactive explorations
about: Brilliant is a tight-knit team of scientists, educators, engineers, storytellers, and illustrators who are redesigning education at scale. We’re hiring! You can see all open roles and learn more about our team culture on our Careers page: brilliant.org/careers/ We believe that math and science are fascinating and beautiful, but that the tools widely used to teach it are dry and ineffective. Brilliant makes a web and mobile app that makes learning a variety of topics fun -- through problem solving and fun interactive explorations. Our courses are written by leading instructors and researchers to guide members through an exploration of deep concepts and principles – from foundational math and science to cutting-edge computer science and professional topics. Brilliant currently helps over 9 million members around the world cultivate problem solving skills, build intuition, and master concepts rather than memorize them. To understand more about our approach, see our learning principles: brilliant.org/principles/

Right now, more than 150 million music fans across the globe use Songkick to track their favorite artists, discover awesome concerts and never ever miss out. With over 7.5 million event listings, we’re the biggest concert service on the planet. Across web, iPhone, Android, and through rich partnerships with Spotify, Pandora, Facebook and more, Songkick is the definitive and trusted home for live music online. We’ve always put fans first. We’re a small, fast-moving team packed to the brim with digital expertise, committed to solving real problems for our users. Live music is for everyone, and we work hard to empower our community, add meaningful value and cut out the BS along the way.

about: Our mission is to empower anyone to achieve financial freedom by merging entertainment and fintech into a simple, but powerful social experience. The platform supports creators who craft daily news and actionable education clips by seamlessly linking to financial tools for saving, spending, investing, and beyond.

headline: Vacation Rentals, Designed For Success
about: Showplace, the modern infrastructure powering Airbnb hosts, provides the highest-quality products at wholesale prices in addition to expert guidance on building a listing that books up with satisfied guests. The platform for smarter Airbnb hosting.

headline: Moment is a global marketplace for creatives
about: We exist to inspire the creative in everyone. To get the right gear, learn new skills, take epic trips, and make new friends along the way. The community makes Moment possible. From the brands who sell their gear in the shop to the Pros who publish their online classes with us to the gear guides who answer your questions 24x7, Moment wouldn’t exist without this amazing community of creatives. Supporting and empowering one another to chase their creative pursuits. We are Moment. You in?

headline: On a mission to accelerate DeFi Adoption
about: Today there are too many products and services which are scattered across the DeFi and Web3 ecosystem. This overwhelms a lot of new users and prevents them from entering the DeFi ecosystem. Platter, therefore, will be building a curated marketplace for DeFi investment and Web3 products. Platter’s platform will allow its users to learn about the DeFi and Web3 ecosystem, invest and track in different types of DeFi products and use various Web3 products on its Platform. Platter aspires to be a Web3 Network State! Platter will be a community-owned, community-governed and community-evolved organisation. The community will choose and bring on new projects to Platter’s platform and take decisions about Platter’s roadmap through governance. At Platter, our focus is to create a delightful user experience and remove all frictions which today prevent users to invest in DeFi and adopt Web3. We are still in the initial development phase and will be publicly releasing our alpha version very soon. Stay tuned by following us here to get an update on our progress!

headline: Fintech meets betting
about: Smarkets is an exchange platform for betting and trading on sport and politics. We operate two main consumer products - the Smarkets exchange and SBK sportsbook app - in the UK, US, and other global markets. Being a Software Engineer at Smarkets means working in high-performing teams that have control over the features they ship and the code they write. We have built a modern tech stack around Linux, Kafka, Postgres, and Kubernetes using Python 3, C++20, Rust, and React. The Smarkets platform is used by tens of thousands daily through the app, website or REST API. We are continuously developing new features for these platforms, or improving performance, scalability and usability in the backend.

We connect writers to data, upgrade their monetization, and give them the tools to create new storytelling formats. Think Roblox for fiction writers. We’re supported by great investors such as Founder Collective, John Riccitiello (Unity), Scott Belsky (Behance), Chris Carvalho (Roblox), Jake Paul, Patrick Lee (Rotten Tomatoes), Baron Davis, Sam Parr (The Hustle), Hyphen Capital, Super Capital Group, Hustle Fund, and more. Join us and together we’ll connect storytellers with consumers, cut out the gatekeepers, and build the next Netflix powered by creators in the process.

headline: The future of marketing to multicultural customers
about: Neufluence is a SaaS-based, creator marketplace that provides brands and diverse micro-creators tools, inclusive data, and partnerships to drive sales from multicultural customers. Our software tools include our brand-focused multilevel diversity and recommender search tools that target diverse creators and measures trust from multicultural customers with 5 trillion dollars in buying power in the US.

headline: Democratizing data for teams around the world ✨
about: Atlan is a data democratization platform that helps data teams collaborate frictionlessly. We are creating a home for data teams—allowing them to truly democratize both internal and external data, while automating repetitive tasks. Data can be chaos, work shouldn't be! We’re proud to be working with teams ranging from startups to Fortune 500 companies, including Milkbasket, Unilever, WPP & GroupM, Mahindra Group, Kotak Mahindra Bank, United Nations and the Government of India. We are headquartered in Singapore, with teams in New Delhi and Bengaluru (India), San Francisco (US) and Nairobi (Kenya).

headline: Our mission is to democratize access to logistics
about: Saltbox solves the hardest parts of running an ecommerce business with human-centric logistic solutions. With a purpose-built network of flexible warehouses in major metropolitan areas, fulfillment centers and on-site services across the country, Saltbox addresses the most critical challenges ecommerce entrepreneurs face when starting, growing, and scaling their businesses.

headline: The easiest way to get structured data out of documents
about: Sensible connects software to the messy, unstructured data that businesses encounter every day. Our goal is to bring about a world where computers do the work that computers are best at (processing large volumes of data) so that humans can do what humans are best at (critical thinking and empathy). The first piece of this problem that we're tackling is document parsing. Even as software is eating the world, so many business workflows still rely on two entities sending PDFs to each other. In a single afternoon with Sensible, developers can ship a production-ready API endpoint that turns documents into useful data. Today, we have happy customers across insurance, logistics, proptech, and financial services using Sensible to process thousands of different types of documents. Sensible was founded in 2020 and is backed by some of the top investors in Silicon Valley.

headline: Decarbonizing the physical world
Restaurant finance and marketing that help grow your business
about: We work alongside our restaurant partners every day, sharing in the ebbs and flows of their business while helping them achieve their dreams. We provide marketing and financing that work with their business and are truly pay-for-performance. We help them increase revenue, traffic, and customer engagement. Importantly, our services do not require the merchant to discount or give away their products.

about: Equi is a web and mobile app that provides individual investors their first opportunity to invest into a “family office style” portfolio of alternative investments (e.g. private credit, private equity, real estate, volatility, collateralized lending, secondary offerings, etc) with superior risk-adjusted returns relative to the S&P 500 and a fraction of the volatility you see in public markets.

headline: The leading earthworks management platform
about: Our product is a web based SaaS tool used by construction teams in the field and the back office. We ran a PHP-based MVP for 3-years which we rebuilt from the ground-up in React in mid 2020. We pride ourselves on SoilFLO’s simplicity and the fact that we’ve had countless foremen refer to it as ‘slick’: • 2 button clicks to add a truck for the day • 2-clicks to log a load As we add new features, our goals are to continuously ensure that: 1. Each foreman and operator can use SoilFLO with their eyes closed 2. There is minimal burden placed on the administrative team when implementing and ensuring consistent usage of SoilFLO

headline: India's 1st Managed Living Platform for communities

With our stores located within the community complexes offering retail (grocery, dairy, fruits, vegetables & household items) and mobile app for delivery and all other home services (via subscription and group buying), we are redefining the modern urban living by providing hotel-like convenience at home.

headline: The first and final word in digital assets
about: The on-ramp to the world of programmable money, distributed ledgers and decentralized applications for 10s of millions of people. headline: Closing the tech skills gap by enabling an accessible alternative to traditional education

headline: Get ownership of your data back

As an initial step, Mobius is developing a “data wallet” which is accessed using a personal key and gives users the ability to share as well as monetize their own data. In addition, we’re also developing Mango, an encrypted messaging app that rewards users for texting their friends. This is just the beginning, and we would love to have you be part of the journey to decentralize the internet.

As Donors are giving products instead of money, there is 100% transparency and Donors even get updates on how their donated supplies are being used. Donatekart is working with over 1500+ NGOs and 5,00,000+ Donors have used our platform to donate in excess of $10M of products. headline: AI & IoT enabled AgriTech platform that helps increase farmers income by up to 30%
about: We are an AI enabled Agri IOT platform. Supported by Qualcomm. Raised Series B from Mahindra & Whiteboard capital. AI & IoT enabled AgriTech platform that helps increase tractor owners' income by up to 30% Our flagship product is the Simha Kit – a business management tool for the rental tractor entrepreneur. Our customers typically improve their tractor income by up to 30%, making Simha's payback period less than 2 months. But do farmers need Telematics? YES. India has 70 L tractors of which over 35L are used for rentals. There is a significant challenge in this process- how do you measure acres of work done to the bill? Our patented AI engine solves this. What Google Maps solved in one dimension for the distance between points a and b, we are solving in two dimensions for the area of a field. Typically, fields are under-reported in size during rentals and customers lose 15-20% of revenue.

headline: Do More with Less. A New Approach to Kitchen Operations

We have assembled a team that shares a passion for helping foodservice businesses and has great insight into how the challenges of food production can be solved with artificial intelligence. Metafoodx helps foodservice businesses prevent food waste and optimize production planning through an AI-powered software service. We remove the data gap between back-kitchen production and true consumption through industry-first real-time consumption tracking. We deliver customers value by providing planning tools with actionable insights and by generating automatic alerts and reminders to help staff streamline actions. Metafoodx delivers business impact by reducing food waste, lowering COGS, and increasing operational efficiency. Our product consists of a data analytics cloud and a set of consumption tracking devices. The tracking devices deploy seamlessly to service environments and collect granular consumption data. The cloud service discovers consumption trends, generates production guidance, and delivers timely alerts and insightful reports.

headline: A carbon negative plastic replacement, made from sustainably farmed seaweed
about: Plastic pollution and climate change are two pressing global issues. Consumers are demanding brands reduce their carbon and plastic footprints – and businesses are desperate for solutions that do not undermine technical performance. ULUU allows brands to differentiate themselves by adopting the world’s most sustainable material without compromising on performance. For instance, even though ULUU is a natural material (like cotton), it has “plastic like” properties (eg strong oxygen and moisture barriers) so it allows businesses to replace plastic across rigid, film, foam and textile applications, while maintaining key functionalities (eg shelf life, waterproof and windproof).

headline: Optimity is building the world’s largest network of people who are measurably healthier
about: We apply behavioral science through gamification, incentives, and the power of communities to nudge consumers in making better, healthier choices. As a B2B platform, our large health community becomes a cost-effective lead-gen funnel. Our first set of clients are life insurance companies: Acquisition economics in life insurance are painfully wasteful: 70% of their total cost is spent on acquiring new policyholders. Our products help them acquire high-quality leads at the lowest cost, dramatically improving their acquisition economics. Huge TAM: The top 10 US life insurance companies spend ~$6B each per year on customer acquisition (marketing awareness, lead generation, and sales conversion). They rely on traditional channels (TV, stadium sponsorships, google/Facebook ads) that are experiencing a decline in effectiveness as they are not focused on finding health-conscious consumers. Insurance companies know they need to innovate and find alternatives to these undifferentiated advertisements, and are looking for insurtech technologies and services to help with their ability to engage their most valuable leads more cost-effectively. How: Optimity helps insurance companies attract healthy customers, and keep them healthy, happy and engaged in a useful way to increase their lifetime value. Moat: The scale of our user base is exploding (we have over 1.3M users with verified emails). We are gathering a rich and unique set of longitudinal data on consumers and are training ML models with this data to uncover propositions for our customers to sell more insurance, virally generate leads, and advance underwriting.

headline: We're re-imagining what last-mile fulfilment can be
about: At Quiver we're re-imagining what last-mile fulfilment can be - we want it to be faster, emission-less, more customer-centric, more transparent and more responsive. And that's what we're making. Quiver enables your favourite retailers to provide a range of faster delivery options, including immediate delivery, to their customers at the point of checkout via our proprietary suite of APIs. Much like we're used to seeing different payment options at checkout, we're providing more customer-centric delivery options. To do this, Quiver's vertically integrated fulfilment network utilises our client's stores and our own micro-fulfilment centres to provide a delightful delivery experience.

headline: Smart Local Data for Smart Cities and Intelligent Transport
about: We are implementing transport-focused smart cities, using cameras with on-board machine learning in order to quantify movement of pedestrians, vehicles and cyclists, and then building advanced predictive AI systems around this data. Our main customers are local governments, infrastructure owners and transport providers. Real-time data from a network of video feeds enable them to react to demand, improve safety and improve the utilisation of their assets; and prediction gives them the foresight to pre-empt problems in their network, rather than simply reacting. Our systems use the latest machine learning and computer vision techniques, run on bespoke, low-cost, easy-to-install hardware. All the edge intelligence is in the software, enabling remote updating and reducing hardware obsolescence and cost.

about: We believe that the key to solving the grand challenges that humanity is facing is in: 1) science, 2) translating science to innovation on the market, 3) and intense collaboration between all ecosystem stakeholders. We believe this requires bringing transparency to the scientific ecosystem, so no one is limited by whom one happens to know. We believe this requires unlocking access to advanced scientific intelligence for the 99%s. We believe that anyone should be able to reach for the stars, with minimal friction in their journey from ideation to innovation. That’s why we took action. In the past five years, we built a scientific landscaping platform that unites all scientific experts, research groups, biotech startups, pharma companies, publications, ongoing projects, patents, clinical trials, funding calls... all in one place. This empowers scientists, business developers and intelligence professionals in making better data-driven decisions, faster. From leading academic institutions, startups, and biotech companies up to top 10 pharma anywhere in the world. With customers mentioning at every demo how impressed they are with our platform, we are now changing gears to accelerate our go-to-market. Some of our customers call us a "google for science". headline: Decentralizing cloud infrastructure through computesharing. #PayWithYourPC
about: Salad activates latent compute resources from idle gaming PCs on the web’s most trusted computesharing network. Our users (the mighty “Salad Chefs”) turn a wealth of underutilized processing power and bandwidth into games, gift cards, subscriptions for streaming and audio services, and more epic loot. Every year, Salad Chefs use the power of their PCs to redeem over 3,000,000 digital and real-world items from the Salad Storefront. Our recently introduced PayPal integration allows our users to spend their Salad Balance anywhere PayPal is accepted. Forthcoming SaladPay checkout options will give everyday webizens like you even more ways to #PayWithYourPC. With over 100,000 users earning every month, we’ve made inroads into a mostly untapped global market. Now we’re ready to unveil SaladCloud, an entirely people-powered cloud computing solution for enterprises. SaladCloud services are equally performant and far more affordable than conventional cloud solutions, and our workload-agnostic infrastructure allows us to deploy nearly any task to our user-side marketplace. Whether the job’s P2P bandwidth sharing, AI inference training, applied edge computing—or anything else that takes hard crunching—it’s no match for our infinite Kitchen.

headline: e-commerce brands install WAIR to help their shoppers purchase the best fitting products
tags: 35% of all abandoned carts are because the shopper doesn't know which size will fit them best
70% of returns are due to size and fit reasons
82% of all support / chat requests are "What's my size"
Apparel brands do not know the body dimensions of their shoppers and therefore cannot appropriately design, manage inventory, merchandise, or support their shoppers with respect to size and fit
about: PROBLEMS SOLUTION WAIR personalizes the e-commerce experience to help shoppers know which products and sizes will fit them best. In 4 questions, WAIR predicts 11 body dimensions and recommends the best fitting sizes across the entire product catalog. WAIR then enriches data about the shopper journey with the shoppers' body data to help apparel brands operate more profitably. WAIR only takes 2 hours to setup and exhibits a 25X ROI for its customers. Shopping sessions that use WAIR are 50% more profitable than those that do not as WAIR.

headline: Transforming how care is accessed, measured and delivered
about: Greenspace (greenspacehealth.com) is transforming mental health systems by improving the way that care is accessed, measured and delivered. Greenspace is a growth stage technology startup with offices in Toronto and Kelowna. Since launching in 2016, the platform has been deployed across thousands of mental health practices and organizations and expanding across Canada and the US. Mental illness has passed HIV/Aids, malaria and diabetes as the leading cause of disability in the world. While there is no cure, psychotherapy is the most cost and clinically effective form of treatment. Greenspace has developed solutions that draw on technology and clinical research to improve patient outcomes within this traditional psychotherapy model. Our Measurement Platform enables mental health providers and organizations to implement consistent evidence-based measurement into their practice. Our Intake Module facilitates a more effective referral into mental health and addictions services. Our Self-Guided Module is a population health solution that provides mental health support directly to individuals in various settings. We recently helped develop and launch Wellness Together Canada (ca.portal.gs) – a major initiative funded and launched by Health Canada to provide virtual mental health and substance use support for all Canadians through COVID-19.

headline: Discovering and enacting the path to safe artificial general intelligence

To achieve our mission, we must encompass and value the many different perspectives, voices, and experiences that form the full spectrum of humanity. Our investment in diversity, equity, and inclusion is ongoing, executed through a wide range of initiatives, and championed and supported by leadership. At OpenAI, we believe artificial intelligence has the potential to help people solve immense global challenges, and we want the upside of AI to be widely shared. Join us in shaping the future of technology.

headline: Empowering Food Brands to reach Consumers through Product Transparency
about: Eatiquette rides on the mega trend that consumers are growing increasingly conscious about the food they put in their bodies, concerns that are often linked to the ingredients in these foods. We have previously built a mobile app that helps health- and sustainability- conscious consumers easily compare products through understandable ingredients and nutrition. We've now pivoted to take a B2B approach. Our mission is still to bring food brands and consumers closer to each other, but we are restarting on the B2B side. We’re building a platform called EatQ (www.eatq.io), empowering food brands to take control of their data and get discovered. The consumer app is still available, just not our focus. Did you know that 84% of food brands fail to claim the attributes they qualify for and that consumers search for?? We’re going to help food manufacturers get discovered; especially those emerging food brands focused on health & sustainability. At Eatiquette our north star is total transparency and traceability from the producer to the consumer for food products (from farm to fork). Food brands that take this to heart, will be the CPG leaders of tomorrow.

While families with means can opt for private schools, move to neighbourhoods with the best state-run schools, or pay for expensive elite tutoring, those are options 99% of the population simply can’t afford. By combining top instructors and proven learning methods in a digital platform, Studeo is making it possible for more students to learn from the best.

headline: SWiiFT is an app that enables anyone to form connections abroad
about: You’ve just landed in a new country, you’re filled with excitement for adventure, but you have so many questions. “Where do I start? What do the locals do? How do I tap into the culture? Before you know it, it’s time to go back home! Do you ever end a trip feeling like you didn't have the chance to fully get to know the city or place you were in? If so, you're one of the many people that relates to "travel FOMO". At SWiiFT, we personally understand this problem so we're designing a solution that connects travellers with locals for them to gain unique and culturally-immersive experiences. After all, what better way to experience a new city and what it has to offer than from the perspective of a local? Our ultimate goal at SWiiFT is to spark genuine connections between people from different cities, backgrounds and cultures. To that end, the SWiiFT app matches users based on an extensive profile, personality and compatibility assessment. We want our travellers to experience the true essence of any place they decide to head to through their connections; and to provide our locals with the opportunity to share the wonders of their home-cities with the rest of the world.

Currently, physical menus are limited to brief descriptions of meals with few visuals, not to mention the increased risk of spreading COVID-19. While PDFs and web-hosted options reduce the use of high-touch areas, they can be more difficult to navigate than traditional menus, and can be confusing for those who are less tech savvy. Foodi solves all these issues by reimagining the restaurant experience. With our menu design platform restaurants can design intuitive, visually pleasing, mobile menus without the need for a programmer or graphic design expert, then print off associated QR codes or embed their menu on their website. Our goal was to enable a whole generation to express themselves through partying, socialising and exploring a town’s possibilities. We aimed to provide a mobility solution allowing people to move around the city in an affordable yet reliable way by turning a moment as simple as a ride into an unexpectedly positive experience. 6 years later, a few things have changed: we are now operating in 3 different countries and count more than 2 million users… Nevertheless, making each ride experience unique for passengers and fairer for drivers is still our daily challenge.

Headquartered in New York, the company has been partnering with insurance carriers and reinsurers since 2018 to bring new innovative products to market. All of Afficiency’s life insurance products are completely digital, provide instant coverage and are accessible via the many platforms with whom we partner. Many of today's artists continue to prove mainstream success does not require signing everything away to a label, but it does require an experienced team. PennyFly represents a vast network of relationships with the industry’s top producers, PR firms, playlist curators, digital marketers, radio promotors, distributors, and more - our marketing strategists have worked with the worlds top selling artists, formulating and executing countless successful campaigns for major labels. We have spent years combining our relationships and experience to offer the same high-caliber services to artists under much fairer deal structures. PennyFly has been named a semi-finalist in Pepperdine's renowned "Most Fundable Companies" competition, the first record label platform to be recognized in this capacity.

We provide population-level insights back to the company organizations, helping them drive health savings downstream by improving their employees’ overall wellness. BetterYou is the only Healthy Habits Companion that makes it easy to take control of your time, achieve your goals, and improve your life. Founded in 2018, Argyle’s coverage of U.S. consumers is superior to the three largest credit bureaus and delivers hit rates 4 to 5x higher than all other data providers at a fraction of the cost.

RTR offers designer apparel, accessories and home decor from 700+ brand partners and has built in-house proprietary technology and a one-of-a-kind reverse logistics operation. Under CEO and Co-Founder Jennifer Hyman’s leadership, RTR has been named to CNBC’s “Disruptor 50” five times in ten years, and has been placed on Fast Company’s Most Innovative Companies list multiple times, while Hyman herself has been named to the “TIME 100” most influential people in the world and as one of People magazine’s “Women Changing the World.”

headline: Build web apps in your browser without code

We're building a platform that makes it easy for anyone to build software to empower their teammates, partners, and customers with unprecedented speed and ease. Users simply connect their existing business data, configure their Stacker app's look and functionality using a drag and drop user interface, and securely share access with those who need it. So far, we've empowered hundreds of customers ranging from local business owners and venture-backed startup founders to Fortune 500 company leaders and non-profit administrators. They've incorporated Stacker into their core business, transforming their organizations with custom CRMs, client portals, directory apps, workflow tools, and field worker apps built on Stacker...without writing a single line of code. Stacker is fully remote and backed by top-tier global investors, including Y-Combinator and Initialized Capital.

headline: A shared educational layer for higher education

By allowing colleges to add new online courses taught by other institutions, Rize provides non-profit, accredited colleges & universities with skills-based majors & minors for college credit at a fraction of the cost of traditional programs Traction: working with 135+ private colleges. ~350 college programs already fully adopted across 90 colleges, with many more in the pipeline. Google and Unity Technologies partnerships Funding: raised Series A from top VCs Team: 20 person team that includes a College President, 2 former Blackstone, Decoded’s former Head of Product, a former VP at Cadre, a Y Combinator alum, and eight Harvard/Yale/Princeton/UPenn/MIT grads

The key to a FightCamp workout lies in our Punch Tracking technology — we allow you to measure every strike, deliver real-time stats and fuel your competitive side. This technology was first developed for the world's top athletes such as the US Olympic Boxing team and fighters such as Cris Cyborg & Daniel Cormier. Today, more than 5,000 members use FightCamp's technology to reach their fitness goals and unleash the fighter within. We believe we have the passion and drive to take at-home fitness to another level. Come join us in our fight for a healthier and fitter world.

headline: Metaintro is the professional resume wallet for web3
about: Metaintro is a professional resume wallet for web3. The multi-chain custodial wallet holds proof-of-employment, proof-of-skill, and proof-of-education, replacing the PDF resume. Job seekers can access their wallet through a browser extension, which can then be used to interact with web3 job applications. Adjacent to the product, Metaintro also runs the largest Discord community dedicated to web3 jobs with over 4,000 opportunities posted a month.

headline: When you can't /hear/ what someone's saying, now you can /see/ what they're saying
about: Xander is a Boston-based startup using AR to improve interpersonal communication and mitigate the debilitating effects of hearing loss. Our first product is XanderGlasses—smart glasses that provide captions for conversations in real-time. When ambient noise or hearing loss prevents a person from hearing and understanding speech, the glasses display captions to the wearer in real-time, enabling the wearer to look at the people speaking and participate fully in the conversation. Xander is positioned to help the 1.5 billion people with hearing loss who seek alternatives to hearing aids and other assistive devices. After wearing XanderGlasses, people reported feeling more confident and relaxed during conversations and described a decrease in cognitive load and improved mental state. Xander’s founding team has deep experience in audio technology from industry leaders like the MIT Media Lab, Gibson, Mitsubishi Research Labs, and iZotope. In October 2022, Xander earned a Catalyst Award from the National Academy of Medicine and won the CTA Foundation Eureka Park Accessibility Contest. The team is now preparing to pilot prototypes with the Veteran’s Health Administration in 4 sites across the U.S.

headline: India's Property renting app to help owners rent & manage their properties remotely
about: We have a simple mission - make renting a happy choice from being a forced one for both owners & tenants India runs on renting... Hostels, PGs, Flats, Homestays, Shops, Godowns, Warehouses, Offices, Cloud spaces... 200 million Indians staying or doing business in rented properties and over 10 million owners actively renting out their properties. That's $400 billion of rent changing hands every year. And yet renting is tedious. We are making renting digital... We make it simple for owners to share their property details as a custom webpage, respond to bookings online, and accept digital payments easily. We are digitizing the tenant joining process. Digital KYC saves everyone's time of physically visiting the police station, lawyer, or notary to sign documents. We help owners collect their rent and bill dues on time by sending automatic reminders, tracking the late payees, and rewarding tenants who pay on time. How we started? What have we achieved? Being unhappy tenants in their school & college life, Srijan, Nimit & Manish built a 2 Cr/200 beds PG business while in college. Seeing the struggles of untimely rent collection, and inefficient rental processes, they launched an MVP in June 2019. Since then, we have scaled to over 1000 properties and 30000 tenants across India. We were one of the top 10 startups in Lightspeed Extreme Entrepreneur 2019. Backed by India Quotient and other prominent investors, now we are looking for core team members to join our mission of making renting simple for everyone.

headline: We're building the Photoshop for long-form writing
about: Today Sudowrite is an AI assistant used by novelists, screenwriters, essayists, and more. It helps writers get unstuck and suggests language, character backstories, and plot points, all while following the tone and narrative arc of the manuscript. Tomorrow, Sudowrite will be the writer's most-trusted collaborator, always available to brainstorm and co-write their best possible story. In ten years, we imagine a suite of AI-powered tools to augment and accelerate human creativity. We believe all creative work will eventually be a collaboration between human and AI. That said, Sudowrite will be our focus for quite some time.

headline: Building Commercial companies to tackle worlds biggest challenges
about: We focus on specific ‘missions’, which we believe unite, mobilise and organise the best talent, knowledge and capital that are needed to break through at scale. Within each of our missions, we run Venture Builder programmes that help individuals to have impact. We have 3 criteria for choosing a Zinc mission: 1. It must tackle one of the great unmet needs in the developed world; 2. The target addressable market must exceed 100m people in the developed world alone; 3. There must be lots of unexploited opportunities to disrupt, extend and improve existing services through new technologies and insights from research. Since we launched in 2017, we have been developing a unique ecosystem of diverse talent across many sectors, disciplines and countries - mobilising people around a common mission and building scalable solutions to social problems. Each of our programmes provide unique opportunities for R&D. We are committed to building a new commercial innovation system for the social sciences, to increase the impact of existing research and to generate new R&D opportunities through our ventures.

Our platform has been used by tens of thousands of physicians who in turn have provided care to millions of patients. About DrChrono and our Product ✅ We serve tens of thousands of healthcare providers and over 27.7 million patients ? ✅ DrChrono was the first EHR to build a native app for the iPad and iPhone ? ✅ First mobile and cloud-based ambulatory EHR / EMR to be an Apple Mobility Partner ✅ The youngest company to be included in the US Government Precision Medicine Initiative ✅ The #1 EHR as voted by doctors, and the #1 mobile EHR as voted by Black Book for the last 9 years! ? ✅ We were just awarded the MedTech Breakthrough Award 2021 for Best Electronic Health Record Service ?? ✅ During Apple's recent worldwide developer conference, it was announced that DrChrono will be among the first to support iOS 15 feature allowing patients to share Apple Health App data with providers! ? Our products can be completely tailored to any medical practice—small, large, or specialty—and are open to third-party innovation via a robust API. Our people and the enthusiasm for healthcare are contagious. We’re one of the most tech-forward healthcare players in the EHR industry and our philosophy “more time with patients, less time doing paperwork” drives constant innovation throughout the company. The qualities we look for in our people include: ✦ Never settle. ✦ Passion, be inspired. ✦ Entrepreneurs, risk failure. ✦ The drive to put a dent in the universe through healthcare. We want to make a difference in the world. If this sounds like you, come join our team! For more information about DrChrono, visit www.drchrono.com

headline: Casa is the secure home for your Bitcoin. Never worry about Bitcoin security again
about: Casa is the secure home for your Bitcoin. One of the greatest promises of Bitcoin is the ability to give people back control of their own money - to "be their own bank". However, individuals today don't have the necessary tools to shoulder the responsibility that comes with the promise of fully owning their money. The largest barrier to adoption of Bitcoin is the ability for people to feel safe using it, and we're tackling that problem head-on. At Casa, we're developing secure personal key management systems that help you keep your Bitcoin safe. We're at the forefront of security and UX for private keys, and we're striving to give people the tools for securing their digital lives. If you want to join us on our mission, drop us a line: jobs team.casa.

headline: Deep learning in hours and minutes, not days and weeks
about: Determined AI is dramatically simplifying the process of building deep learning models. Our open-source platform supports state-of-the-art hyperparameter tuning, seamless distributed training, and automatic checkpointing and resource scheduling, allowing scientists to focus on their research instead of infrastructure and boilerplate. Come help us build the future of deep learning at Determined AI! Our customers are scientists and engineers working on the latest in autonomous driving, pharmaceutical research, and automated video analysis, among other things. We’re solving problems across high-performance computing, integrating deep learning frameworks, and data visualization. We have a tight feedback loop with customers and open-source users, allowing us to build software that lets them do science more efficiently.

At Trace, we believe financial discipline is a core principle of business and employees should trust in how their company manages its finances. Trace's products instill trust by helping people make faster and smarter financial decisions, ensuring compliance, and providing efficient and scalable operations. Our solution is the first Finance Service Management platform – powering how Finance teams work with their business partners. With Trace, teams can manage their budgets, make purchases, plan new hires and track their performance. We help leading Finance teams scale more efficiently and become better business partners. We're building the future of Finance with people who are friendly, bright, and passionate.

about: Our mission: to connect every system in the world! Tyk is an open-source API Gateway that is fast, scalable and modern. API Gateways require low latency, scalability, performance and reliability whilst minimising your total cost of ownership. We have designed Tyk Platform to work for your services, your team and your budget. With Tyk, you can focus on creating services instead of implementing management infrastructure. From completely isolated, on-premises installations to SaaS and Multi-Cloud deployments,m we have API gateway options that match your needs. With Tyk, you can focus on creating services instead of implementing management infrastructure.

headline: Subscription Commerce Platform
about: Limio is a fast growing enterprise SaaS startup that is on a mission to improve the state of subscriber experiences online. Our no-code Subscription Commerce Platform enables these companies to up their game and deliver better subscriber experiences. Our goal is to be the Shopify for subscriptions used by large media and software brands such as the Economist, Which? and Palisade. Limio was founded by Amaury de Closset and Daniel Morton, formerly of GoCardless (YC S11), Zuora, BCG and Three. Together, they have a track record of 15 years in subscriptions.

headline: The next generation CRM
about: Our mission is to offer teams a way to leverage their biggest asset — their contacts — with a productivity tool enjoyable to use, customizable on-the-go, and powered with data. Our ambition is to become the reference both for individuals looking for a personal CRM and for large teams whose job revolves around managing contacts (HRs, Salespeople, PR people, Investors, NGOs, etc). Current CRMs are too rigid, hardly customizable, and not enjoyable to use. And they are specifically built for salespeople, leaving out other teams that manage contacts. This is why we're building folk as a highly customizable software to make it easy for any team to leverage contacts according to their own workflows. It's not a better CRM, it's a new type of software we call xRM. In xRM, the "x" stands for anyone: you can use it not only for managing clients but also for journalists, suppliers, partners, for example. Thibaud Elziere, CEO @ folk

headline: Transform your one-time customers into lifelong brand ambassadors thanks to your post-purchase exp

Their idea was to address the paradox of e-commerce: retailers spend billions to acquire new customers while 80% of their business comes from former consumers. The loyalty of e-commerce brands is strongly correlated to the security and speed of delivery: that's why Shipup comes in. Shipup raised over 7 million funds to accelerate its international development (Europe & USA). Based in New York and Paris, the company has over 50 employees. headline: The cryptocurrency for the common good
about: Neco is the cryptocurrency for the common good. We generate profits, provide universal basic income and protect the climate. Our vision is to build a sustainable financial system that serves the people and the planet. Neco is positive money without inflation, interest and transaction fees. Its value is backed by a reserve and regulated collectively by all members. Our system is free of debt, low in volatility and protected against bankruptcy and bank runs. Our crypto platform runs on Stackchain - a faster, more efficient and more secure version of Blockchain technology. Stackchain is climate-neutral and supports data privacy requirements. Our vision is to build a powerful crypto platform for decentralization and tokenization. We are a decentralized collective organization (DCO) and cooperative non-profit with strong values and high moral standards. Radical transparency and honesty are core elements of our corporate culture. Our community can participate in the decision-making process through Collexa, a system of collective intelligence (CI). We are a virtual organization of geographically dispersed teammates collaborating via the internet. With our flexible working model TTT (“triple T”), we offer good payment, great flexibility, unlimited vacation, exciting projects, lifelong universal basic income (pension) and the opportunity to profit from Neco's success. TTT stands for time, task and team. We pay you for the time you work, the tasks you complete and for good teamwork. Neco was founded in 2017 by Flo Goette, a serial entrepreneur, impact investor and visionary with a track history of four successful startups. As an expert in Blockchain, cryptocurrencies and cloud computing, Flo has been featured in “The Top 100 People in Finance” (Top 100 Magazine) and “The 10 Most Inspiring Entrepreneurs of the Year 2021” (The CIO Times) while Neco has been selected for the “50 Most Admired Companies of the year 2021” (The Silicon Review).

headline: Helping photographers do more with their time!
about: Aftershoot is the fastest and easiest way for photographers to select, rate, and edit their photos automatically. Many photographers take hundreds or even thousands of photos in a day’s work. Selecting photos one-by-one to find the best of the series and removing duplicates, blinks, blurred pictures, or images with poor composition is usually the most monotonous, tedious, and time-consuming part of the workflow. Once those perfect photos have been selected, Aftershoot edits the images in the user's style in a matter of minutes, eliminating the need for thousands of tiny adjustments during the editing process. Aftershoot saves photographers hundred of hours of painstaking culling and editing. By automating the post-shoot workflow of photographers, they get spare time to focus on what really matters - engaging with clients, building portfolios, and recharging away from the computer.

headline: Builders of the interoperable data management layer for Web3 - Source Network
about: Source is a data management layer built for the decentralized web, a fast-growing market expected to reach $40B by 2025. To get there, and beyond, decentralized storage networks can't rely on centralized standards of data management. Source brings data management into the fold and unlocks the true potential of decentralized networks. With it, data become interoperable; empowering developers to make apps and devices that talk to each other, users truly own their data, and information is cryptographically secured to ensure trust.

headline: Antiartificial scientific research and development
about: Hexagon Lavish® is an antiartificial scientific R&D startup based in Atlanta, Georgia that heralds itself as the "world premier antiartificial influence". "antiartificial" is not a field of study, rather it is a term used by Hexagon Lavish® to differentiate from AI-oriented startups. The prefix "anti-" in the Greek etymology implies "instead of" rather than the American tongue ("against"). So, instead of artificial intelligence, Hexagon Lavish® has developed technology known as "informational interpretation" (not to be confused with the convoluted "information interpretation" associated with the "quantum" orientation of physics). PIR: Premier Information Retrieval exemplifies informational interpretation as a technology designed to perform immediate detection of potential harmful substances in from a consumer's convenient of their very own smartphone . The technology is designed to perform the "natural course" of information retrieval about a particular material (e.g., food item).

headline: Turning online shoppers into in-store customers
about: Hi! We're NearSt - a retail tech startup on a mission to get people back into high street shops. Our technology shows online shoppers what’s in local stores by making the products in those stores visible in places like Google and Facebook. If you search for a product in Google, and it pops up showing you it’s available nearby, there’s a good chance we’re the ones behind the scenes making that possible for Google (who trust our tech globally to make this all possible). We believe the future of the high street is one where every product in every shop is connected directly to the web, making it genuinely faster and easier to get something from a real shop nearby than ordering it for delivery online. The high street has incredible value that’s currently hidden from the internet, and we see it as our job to unlock it.

headline: Making on-demand napping easy, convenient and affordable
about: Nappr is like Airbnb, but for short-term occupancy instead of multi-day lodging and it is changing how people rest on the go. We provide a vast mobile/web marketplace that people can use to find and book nap spaces from wherever they are, whenever they want to and at the venues of their choice, which can either be homes or businesses. Initially we are targeting medical workers who have 24-hour shifts, a consistent lack of sleep and a large dependency on caffeine, but we plan to expand this to gig economy workers, commuter students, airport layover travelers and other workers in high stress industries like finance and legal. Pricing is set by the hosts, who can generate extra income in their unfilled spaces with convenient hourly scheduling. Our revenues are generated from two channels: a 20% commission from each one-off transaction (10% from each side), and recurring monthly memberships for users who want to use this more often and get extra perks and discounts.

headline: Building the most advanced DNA sequencing Sample prep machine
about: Volta Labs was spun out of MIT in 2018 with the simple mission of building biological automation from the ground up. Volta is in the proximity of Kendall Square, known as "the most innovative square mile on the planet". Being part of the open biotech culture in Kendall Square made us realize that today’s biologists are held back by the limitations of existing automation tools. With DNA sequencing in particular, we observed that the advances in DNA readout technologies had moved further along than the advances in the upstream steps of preparing samples for sequencing (sample prep). ‍ What started out as a simple printed circuit board to manipulate colored droplets at the MIT Media Lab during co-founder Udayan Umapathi’s graduate work was quickly directed toward solving the “sample prep bottleneck”. The company raised Seed Funding from top VCs in 2019 and later that year added Will Langford as a co-founder and Head of Engineering. ‍ Since then, we have been heads down in the lab inventing and building novel fluidic and sample manipulation technologies. We take an anti-disciplinary approach to solve very hard problems and weave together instrumentation, fluidics, software, biology and chemistry. While our current focus is on sequencing sample prep, we envision a new approach where a single universal machine automates most biological workflows in genomics, proteomics and synthetic biology.

headline: Global network making creative talent discovery in media & entertainment more efficient and diverse
about: Who We Are: Founded in 2021, HUSSLUP is a Techstars Comcast Ventures backed company building a disruptive, category-leading business. We are a small, creative, collaborative team. We believe in a flat org where everyone contributes to building our success and to transforming Hollywood. We embrace diversity of people and ideas on our team. Our product is in demand at the largest media companies in the world. We're a fully remote team and pride ourselves on offering competitive compensation, base salary, and equity compensation. The company is based in Los Angeles, CA. What We Are Building: We live in a digital world where content is being streamed everywhere, yet networking and staffing in media and entertainment haven’t changed for decades. The current system is still based on one-to-one relationships and personal cliques. Reps search for new clients through nightly outings and a lot of legwork, and execs make lots of calls and manage lots of spreadsheets to staff a single freelance creator. On the other side, new and diverse creatives really struggle to break into the business. Enter HUSSLUP. Using robust data and an elegant interface, our networked marketplace offers an end-to-end solution to make the discovery and staffing process more efficient. Our searchable community is built on professional profiles that connect 50M creatives of all kinds and at all levels (eg; producers, writers, directors, editors, production designers, etc) to each other and to the reps and execs who need them. Our mission is to diversify and democratize Hollywood's old clique with one click.

headline: Our review environment makes ethical hackers 2x faster in security code review
about: Software is getting more complex, the amount of criminal hackers is growing, and automatic tools for software engineers are not good enough. Human software security experts are just irreplaceable. But… they could use a hand. That is why we built our 'review environment'. ​The review environment supersedes the IDE for security experts: because it is optimized for security code review. We help security experts work 2x faster; up to 10x for specific tasks. Codean review environment: Our review environment is a SaaS solution for whitebox pentesters, security auditors, and everyone else who wants to deliver higher review quality in less time. Features range from keeping track what is reviewed while doing delta's, to symbiotic taint analysis, to easy report composition. The result: less mundane work, more fun. Pentest 2.0: We also have a team of security analysts ourselves, who help software developers with pentests and security review. With the review environment we are able to deliver higher quality for a lower budget. And we can easily perform continuous security review, which fits way better with with your agile workflow: see it as a security engineer who (parttime) joins your team.

We provide a service that people really want and do so far more efficiently and affordably than anyone else, so we have great unit economics and extraordinary recurring revenue growth. headline: The world's fastest analytics engine, improve price performance by 200x

Our vision is for e6data to power every analytical workload in the world. Our core team has 100+ years of combined experience and 10+ patents across diverse yet complementary disciplines like real-time databases, time-series databases, SQL OLAP engines, distributed computing platforms, stream processing, and log analytics. headline: Refining the world's data. Quant technologies to accelerate data-driven investing
about: Join one of the Fastest growing FinTech's in the UK & NYC We are one of the UK’s fastest-growing FinTech startup companies, with huge growth planned across the UK and USA in 2022. We aren’t exaggerating when we say we are the global leaders in quant trading technologies. Investors with a combined $5 trillion of assets under management (AUM) are using SigTech and we were recently recognized as the Best Quant Technology Provider in the annual Hedgeweek awards. Our vision We believe that the right information given to the right people at the right time can change lives. This is fundamentally one of the hardest problems in the world to solve, and we love the challenge. The problem we are solving Everyone, every business, produces data. However, this data is exhausted in a raw format. It can take hours/days/weeks/months/years to extrapolate the value from this raw data. SigTech technology is the refinery that provides businesses and individuals with the tools to quickly and easily find that data. Quant trading? Quantitative investing consists of trading strategies that rely on mathematical computations and analysis to identify trading opportunities. In a data-driven world, the time and efficiency saved by deploying our software is game-changing for our clients. Don’t worry if you don’t understand technical stuff from the outset, not all our roles need a familiar understanding of quant trading. Why our tech is special! Our tech enables our customers to backtest their trading strategies, gives them instant access to clean and validated data and allows them to customize 300+ pre-built investment strategies, then seamlessly deploy and trade. Wow.

headline: What if you could invest in social media influencers just like you do in cryptocurrencies
tags: Have greater success rates than us
Essentially a better Asset class than us startups
about: What are we doing? We fund creators, just like startups & in return, they share a portion of their future incomes with us. How are we doing this? By creating the world's first creator syndicate to invest in creators, leading to creating an Angelist for creators and eventually a stock exchange where individuals get funded in exchange for pledging their future incomes Why are we doing it? If you look closely, human potential/effort is the only true scarce resource on this planet, to the extent that everything on this planet is valued in terms of the human effort that has gone in building/acquiring that thing. Yet the fact that most of us can’t directly invest in the humans we believe in makes absolutely no sense to us. So we are trying to fix this… by starting with social media creators. Why Social Media Creators? To summarise We are democratising access to capital for (non-tech) individuals and giving the masses, for the first time ever, an asset class they truly understand.

headline: Our mission is to make hiring win-win for everyone through a talent intelligence platform
about: Searchlight is a people-centered Talent Intelligence Platform that helps companies hire with science to build and retain winning teams. We built our platform because the demand for talent is at an all-time high, while the difficulty for people to switch jobs is at an all-time low. Not only is it harder to attract talent, it’s harder to retain them if the match isn’t there - which leads to costly backfills, a demoralized team, and bad business. The building blocks to a good match between people and a role are ‘soft skills’ - a person’s culture alignment, strengths & gaps, and career interests. We specialize in measuring these soft skills, which we call Behavioral data. This data is very hard to get in a typical resume and interview based hiring process. We use this behavioral data to align teams up front when launching a role, assess candidates quickly and accurately, and then to set people up for success so that they can not only perform but stay for the long term.
industries: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

Domain Driven Design as main principle to domain modeling and keep focus on the product.
Test Driven Development to encourage the Outside-In design and improve the quality of our code.

Notion for project management and documentation.

about: ALiCE offers a frictionless user’s identity verification in a two-step process: user takes a selfie and captures his ID card, ALiCE does the rest. headline: Waymark seeks to improve healthcare access and outcomes for people receiving Medicaid

When we looked at the universe of effective interventions for improving outcomes in Medicaid, we saw very little overlap with what is covered by fee-for-service healthcare payment systems. In contrast, the Waymark team will earn payment based on how well we keep patients healthy – not based on how many patients visit our office each day, or how many tests and procedures we perform. Nothing simplifies a business model quite like this does. When we improve outcomes for our patients, our business works. When we do not, we fail. We are building an inclusive company. We design our products and our service delivery specifically for communities that have been historically excluded, because of language, race, poverty, substance use, or sexual identity.

Telio belongs to one of first investments of Sequoia Capital in Vietnam‘s soil, and has raised total of USD 26.5 million from Tiger Global Management, Sequoia Capita India, GGV Capital and RTP Global in two financing rounds. Telio is on course to become Vietnam’s largest B2B trading platform. We are deeply passionate about B2B commerce and are eager to leverage the power of technology and data to create Vietnam’s biggest B2B trading platform. We just raised a round of funding, led by Moxxie Ventures and Capital T. Other investors include: Pale Blue Dot, Omidyar Technology Ventures, Toba Capital, Overwater Ventures, Climate Capital and Techstars. If you want to have a real impact by working in climate tech, come join our talented, passionate team.

UpGuard's BreachSight continuously monitors businesses for data exposures, enabling them to prevent breaches, protect their reputation and avoid regulatory fines. Companies in regulated industries such as financial services, energy and health count on UpGuard daily to guarantee their systems. www.UpGuard.com

headline: An integrated practice management experience tailored for diabetes education programs
about: 50% of diabetes education programs are not profitable today. Lack of consistent referrals, confusion on billing processes, and resource constraints are the main drivers to why many diabetes education struggle. Palisaid's pEDIT is trying to make it easier for diabetes education programs to become financially successful, and manage the essential activities in one connected experience. pEDIT is a practice management solution that integrates within a clinic's EMR system. pEDIT is used by a diabetes educator during the entire patient visit, and guides the diabetes educator to the appropriate maximum reimbursement figure based upon the patients insurance status. pEDIT also makes it easy for a diabetes program to track program performance analytics essential for performance-based care initiatives, and compliance. Palisaid was founded by a patient living with diabetes, and team that all have been personally impacted by diabetes. We are taking a unique approach to our go-to-market focused on building a passionate team first to ensure we drive the best possible customer experience. Our current team brings over 50 years of diabetes education experience, EMR product development, and healthcare strategy with a proven advisory team supporting our growth. We are actively looking for capital to build pEDIT in order to pilot, and commercialize. If there is interest in learning more please reach out to sean.finn@palisaid.com.

headline: Pocus is the Product-Led Sales platform that turns product data into revenue
about: We’re on a mission to equip product-led sales teams with the data, insights, and automations they need to close bigger deals faster. Growth for today’s highest performing SaaS business is no longer sales-led, but driven by a self-serve, product-led motion. In this new world, companies have an abundance of data about their customers - including firmographic data (industry, geography, company size, title) and product usage data (who signed up, how many teammates they invited, what features are used, who the product champions are). But, this data lives in multiple different places - the data warehouse, CRM, marketing tools, and more - and the sales teams don't have the tools to access and analyze this data to inform their sales strategy. Simply put, the traditional enterprise sales tech stack is broken. Sales teams spend an overwhelming amount of time digging through data and switching between various tools to do their job. Pocus was founded to make data actionable for sales teams so they can work smarter. With Pocus, sales teams can focus on adding value to their customers, instead of digging through data. As the first ever platform to combine product engagement data with customer demographic data, we are giving sales reps access to insights that have never been available before. With this unique data, we enable sales teams to convert free / self-serve users to large paid customer contracts more efficiently and effectively. Through analytics and automations, Pocus identifies top opportunities / power users, alerts sales reps of product usage changes, and recommends the next best action so that sales teams can close bigger deals faster.

headline: Helping organizations communicate more securely over email and other cloud office applications
about: Hi, we’re Armorblox! We help organizations communicate more securely over email and other cloud office applications with the power of Natural Language Understanding (NLU). The Armorblox platform connects over APIs and analyzes thousands of signals to understand who users are, what they do, and how they communicate. With this context, Armorblox can stop advanced email attacks like business email compromise, and also help organizations stay compliant by protecting their sensitive data from falling into the wrong hands. Security teams also become more proactive after using Armorblox because the platform automates away most of the manual and repetitive tasks involved in responding to user-reported email threats. We create the VERY BEST People-first Company Culture through thoughtful programs that elevate and engage our People. We are proud to have an industry-leading product, a gender score that ranks in the top 20%, and a diversity score that ranks in the top 30%. We are honored Armorblox was awarded Great Place to Work, Omni Award for Outstanding Wellbeing and Benefits, Best Company Leadership, Best CEOs for Diversity, Best Company Compensation, and was featured in the 2019 Forbes AI 50 list and was named a 2020 Gartner Cool Vendor in Cloud Office Security. Founded in 2017, Armorblox is headquartered in Sunnyvale, CA and backed by the very best investors in Silicon Valley including General Catalyst and Next47.

We are strong believers in our internship program as we have already found a few diamonds in the rough, and it is important to give people with little experience opportunities to shine. The company is pre-seed and is beginning fundraising in April. When we hire people, we are looking for talented people who believe in our mission and the product we are building to solve it. It is important to us to find people who are invested in what we are doing and want to grow with the company. headline: Koyfin is a financial data and analytics platform for researching stocks & market trends

Our data coverage includes stocks, ETFs, mutual funds, FX, bonds, economics, news, and Twitter so you can have a god-like view of the markets. Koyfin is free, so go and try it! ☑️ Our MissionTo equip every investor in the world, no matter their size, with the best data and tools; empowering them to achieve more. ☑️ Our visionKoyfn will be the world’s most successful investor-focused platform and the ‘home base’ dashboard for financial data. ☑️ Why we started Koyfin?Built for investors by former Wall St tradersKoyfin was started by two former Wall Street veterans who were frustrated with the professional tools available to investors without access to Bloomberg or other high-priced platforms. They built all of Koyfin charting and dashboard tools from scratch to give investors the ultimate functionality to turn data into information.Rob Koyfman and Rich Meatto previously worked on Wall Street analyzing stocks and macro trends. Rob brings a deep financial background within equities, options and macro strategies. Rich’s expertise is centered around fixed income, distressed securities, and special situations. Together they lead a team of developers and designers who are passionate about creating the best investment analytics platform in the market. ☑️ Koyfin Product— Customizable — A fully customizable dashboard allows investors to tailor the platform to how they invest. — Curated data — Currently, we connect to 12 data sources and have plans to add many more in the future.— Intuitive — Our laser focus on user experience means our product is incredibly easy to use by even inexperienced investors.— Prosumer — A freemium pricing strategy allows customers to fall in love with the product before they purchase additional data and functionality.

headline: Noninvasive Imaging of the Heart's Natural Magnetic Field
about: Our flagship product, the CardioFlux Magnetocardiograph, is primed to be the most cost-effective solution to the global challenge of chest pain triage in the observation unit/emergency room. The technology is an imaging platform based on the concept of 45 years of research in magnetocardiography (MCG), in which the weak magnetic fields generated by the heart can be passively (without the use of any radiation or stress) measured. Using our patented data science and visualization methods, we have developed an intuitive backend for both the ER physician and the cardiologist who would usually interpret stress test results when considering percutaneous coronary intervention. A scan can be completed at rest (as opposed to a stress test) in 60-90 seconds and requires very minimal training.

The product creates an engaging experience that increases sales by entertaining customers, driving traffic and extending dwell time. We have three distinct revenue streams: Subscription SaaS revenue. Customers range from SMBs to national chains like Lucky Strike Lanes, The Melt, and Buffalo Wild Wings. Credit purchases (like a jukebox, users pay to request songs). New deployments - including JetBlue's JFK terminal & 20 casinos - bring millions new listeners. Location-based advertising. Brands want to reach consumers at the point of purchase. headline: Automating FDA compliance and approval
about: Think TurboTax, but for FDA compliance. We’re building a software platform to handle the compliance aspects of running a drug or medical device company. Compliance is an ongoing activity for companies in this space, and annual costs per company range anywhere from $100K to $100M. Being deemed not compliant can be devastating, preventing a company from selling any new product for months and sometimes years. In lieu of hiring costly consultants or employees to address this problem, customers provide our platform access to their data, and the platform outputs documentation in the manner that FDA and other regulatory agencies are looking for. By using our software platform, customers will cut their annual regulatory costs by 50% (on average) and reduce the risk that their products will not get approved for sale.

What’s the big deal? Many services are infrequent and there’s no real use for a “cashback” on something you book once a year. Well, now car owners can gain reward coins that can be immediately redeemed for exclusive partner offers, discounts, or products! We are now looking for rock stars to join our close-knit, fun-loving team, and take charge of the driver partner app and make the world a better (and more rewarding) place for car owners!

headline: A leading digital health platform that's rehumanizing healthcare
about: Augmedix (Nasdaq: AUGX) delivers industry-leading, ambient medical documentation and data solutions to healthcare systems, physician practices, hospitals, and telemedicine practitioners. Augmedix is on a mission to help clinicians and patients form a human connection at the point of care without the intrusion of technology. Augmedix’s solutions extract data from natural physician-patient conversations and convert it to medical notes in real time, which are seamlessly transferred to the EHR. To achieve this, the company’s Ambient Automation Platform uses Automated Speech Recognition and Natural Language Processing, supported by medical documentation specialists. Leveraging this platform, Augmedix’s solutions relieve clinicians of administrative burden, in turn, reducing burnout and increasing both clinician and patient satisfaction. Augmedix is also leading the revolution in leveraging point-of-care data by making connections between millions of physician-patient interactions and analyzing them to deliver actionable insights that elevate patient care.

headline: Intelligent baby cribs that soothe the baby to sleep - just like how a mother would!
about: The Cradlewise smart crib is the first product to learn from babies' sleep patterns, spot early signs of wake-up and bounce the baby to sleep along with soothing music. The crib has an integrated baby monitoring system. Our patented monitor can detect changes in breath-rate, movements and baby sounds and predict a wake-up. The crib keeps track of the baby's weekly sleep patterns to judge if it is an unscheduled wake-up. And if it is still sleeping time, it bounces and plays soothing music to put the baby back to sleep. The product is a sleep coach through the baby’s journey from a new-born to a 2-yr old. The crib even comes with a sleep training mode that helps parents transition from co-sleeping to putting the baby in it’s own nursery.

These include family and reproductive health – trying to start a family, becoming a parent and going through the menopause – and specialist support for men’s health and women’s health. When an employer gives its people Peppy, it connects them to support and trusted information delivered by real, human experts over chat, live events and virtual consultations. Users can also access a wealth of on-demand, expert-created content, including videos, audios, articles and multi-week programmes. Peppy helps employees take control of their health by giving them the information, answers and personalised support they need, at the touch of a button. Over 250 leading UK employers and over one million individuals have access to life-changing support with Peppy, including Clifford Chance, Marsh McLennan, Santander, the University of Sheffield and Wickes.
