The average renter spends over 80 hours finding an apartment and planning their move. With the help of VeryApt, renters can secure an apartment, facilitate their move, and set up their new homes in less than half the time of the typical renter, saving them dozens of hours of stress and frustration. VeryApt’s property search algorithm analyzes thousands of listing, amenity, geographic, and review data points, and uses that information along with real-time pricing and availability to help renters identify their perfect apartment at the best price.

headline: fiat-to-crypto payment rails
about: The centralized architecture of today’s exchanges is just not compatible with the irreversible nature of cryptocurrencies and needs to get redesigned. This is why we are creating an open exchange protocol instead of a centralized platform. Our protocol allows for connecting directly to banks to clear blockchain transaction. You can pay in fiat for cryptoassets using a regular wire transfer and be sure to receive your crypto in turn. Ramp is here to make decentralized apps accessible for everyone. To unleash the full potential of blockchain. And to democratize finance like never before. As a fast-growing, pioneering on-ramp provider, we’re uniquely placed to do just that. Our collaborative strategies and innovative technologies mean cryptocurrency can be bought using cash, bridging the gap between fiat and the future. Our commitment to embracing both the established and the emerging worlds of finance has seen us become the first crypto on-ramp to receive open banking registration. And as we continue to work with regulatory bodies around the world, we’re all set to connect the world’s existing financial infrastructure with an exciting, empowering, decentralized future.

Pearl's proprietary certification system and software platform capture investment grade data on homes’ high-performing features to increase home value—by 5% on average. Pearl makes value "visible" in the real estate transaction and drives sales of home upgrades with our third-party certification, Home Investment Plan, appraisal addendum, and MLS reports. Pearl’s app collects high-quality data on energy efficiency, smart home technology, indoor air quality, renewables, and other home features. The app assigns points, a score, and a certification tier to certify a home. The Pearl marketing platform includes: • Home data collection and certification software• UX/UI for contractor and consumer facing websites• Data handshakes with other contractor software and with real estate listing services • Robust database capable of handling multiple user accounts and permissions • CRM functionalities that help contractors re-market to their own customers.

Whether moving across the country for a new job opportunity or moving on after a family death or divorce, self-storage tenants find tremendous value from a high-quality renting experience. So much value, in fact, that self-storage is the fastest growing asset class in commercial real estate by value, surpassing $50 billion annually in the U.S. last year. The lending market in this asset class is growing as well, with over $10 billion trading hands annually. Additional investor interest is pouring in, and with it, tremendous pressure to compete at the highest level. If you want to build technology that’s valued by more than 1 in 10 Americans renting a storage unit, the near minimum wage managers looking for a way to earn their bonus, and the independent owners, lenders, and investors that make up this industry, we'd love to chat. We’re a seed-stage team of 18 experienced software professionals already closing significant customers. lucky enough to be backed by a phenomenal group of investors and 28+ of the industry’s most influential advisors, giving us the access and resources to build things right and think for the long term. Our platform is designed to be immediately scalable and infinitely extendible. Initially, the Enertiv App digitizes equipment documentation and streamlines manual workflows. Finally, Enertiv AI runs your data against the 9 billion hours of building data we've collected to date as well as the industry's largest library of insights to deliver actionable prescriptions to the right people at the right time. headline: Enterprise supply chain software helping food brands manage unsold inventory

While we care deeply about our customers’ financial and operational improvements, our team’s hearts and minds are motivated by the impact our work has in addressing some of the largest environmental and social opportunities of our generation - at the intersection of food waste, resource deficiency, climate change, affordable nutrition, and hunger. We couldn’t be more excited to be combining critical technology breakthroughs - including workflow automation, augmented intelligence, wholesale ecommerce, traceability, and supply chain management - to an industry that is so critical for daily life. Born out of MIT in 2015, Spoiler Alert is headquartered in Boston's Back Bay neighborhood and is backed by some of the nation's leading food, agriculture, and supply chain investors. headline: We're making it easy to save for retirement
about: We’re on a mission to make saving for retirement easy. Our platform helps people digitally locate their old 401k and transfer it seamlessly into a new account at any financial institution – without the paperwork, phone calls, and faxes of the past. In doing so, we’re automating the process by which $500 billion in 401k assets is rolled over each year. We’re also making sure that the 15 million 401k account holders who change jobs annually don’t do the wrong thing with their assets – like cash them out, leave them behind, or pay excessive fees that erode their savings over time. But that’s not where we’re stopping. We believe all Americans should retire with enough money for a life of dignity. Over time, we intend to eliminate all of the friction in the retirement savings system that stops them from doing so. We’re a well-funded, early stage company backed by leading venture capital investors in New York (Greycroft, RRE), the Bay Area (Bling Capital) and Los Angeles (Walkabout).

SOE tackles a wide range of projects in the aerospace, automotive, industrial, and commercial sectors. We design and build flight control systems, wireless communication devices, power electronics, analog sensor interfaces, mixed-signal circuits, motor drivers, system controllers, video cameras, embedded computers, and optical and RF amplifiers, sensors, and antennas. Our designs have gone into rocket engines, satellites, self-driving cars, automated systems, and household/retail consumer electronics.

headline: A messenger that turns screen time into family time

We believe that technology hasn’t yet met the unique needs of children—who represent the world’s fastest-growing group of Internet users. All of this makes it difficult for families to find the right technology balance in their homes. But, we’re here to help make that easier. If we can give kids trusted technology—something that helps them learn, connect and cultivate new interests in a safe environment, we unlock worlds of potential for them. We believe in a future where digital interactions strengthen real-world relationships, and we are building a messaging app to empower kids to freely express themselves with those that matter most in their lives, without compromising on safety.

At TruckSmarter, we believe that to transform the industry, we must focus first on truck drivers. Trucks move 71% of freight in America & represent nearly 6% of the American workforce. headline: On-orbit telecommunications

Put simply, we are building cell phone towers in space. This infrastructure will resolve the problem of intermittent connectivity for non-geostationary satellites, will open new business opportunities that necessitate real-time connectivity to satellites, and will reduce reliance on costly and difficult to deploy ground infrastructure. An infrastructure venture is no simple feat, particularly true for space-based infrastructure. To reach this long-term objective, tangible shorter-term milestones are planned in order to incrementally develop the technologies and deploy the infrastructure necessary to execute on this vision. Each milestone towards this vision represents a viable business opportunity, enabling Kepler to sustainably realize this vision.

headline: Building high-quality radiology programs for payers, rooted in data science and analytics
about: At Covera, we’re committed to ensuring high-quality healthcare is more than just a promise. That’s why we’re leading the way in the emerging science of quality, and connecting providers and payers in their shared quest to improve patient outcomes and care quality. By tackling this challenge, we have the ability to impact millions of lives by raising the standard of care nationwide. Our initial focus is radiology, where an early and accurate diagnosis has a profound impact on the rest of a patient’s care journey. Through our work, which uses clinically-validated science-based tools, we’re helping doctors enhance their care, ensuring patients get the right diagnosis, and enabling the healthcare system to support quality improvement at scale. Through our clinical intelligence platform, we have launched programs that help people access the most effective care and provide doctors with AI-powered quality insights and tools to enhance their care. Today, Covera is partnered with leading employers, payers and healthcare organizations across the US, including Walmart and Microsoft. And, with a pipeline representing over 25% of insured Americans, we are in the early stages of improving care quality for all patients across the globe. In August 2021, we raised a $25M Series C financing round with Insight Partners, a leading global venture capital and private equity firm investing in high-growth companies driving transformative change in their industries.

headline: Indoor Gunshot Detection | Recruiting in San Francisco and Nashville
about: There were 345 mass shootings in the US in 2017, killing 434 people and wounding 1,801 more. 5 minutes is the average time taken to call the police following a gunshot, leading to substantial loss of life, injury and destruction. AmberBox leads the way in developing groundbreaking gunshot detection technology for indoor use. AmberBox Gunshot Detection automates the emergency process, removing human error and delivering split second information to protect lives. Through our patented tri-fractor authentication system, AmberBox detectors identify gunshots with a near-zero false alarm rate, automatically notifying law enforcement and building security. The cloud based AmberBox Response Platform delivers real-time data on rapidly evolving active shooter incidents. Users can monitor locations, track perpetrator movement and respond immediately with integrated security features anytime, anywhere. AmberBox protects medical, educational and commercial institutions across the US today.

headline: Zocdoc is the beginning of a better healthcare experience for millions of patients
about: Zocdoc is the tech company at the beginning of a better healthcare experience. Each month, millions of patients use Zocdoc to find in-network neighborhood doctors, instantly book appointments online, see what other real patients have to say, get reminders for upcoming appointments and preventive check-ups, fill out their paperwork online, and more. With a mission to give power to the patient, Zocdoc’s online marketplace delivers the accessible, seamless, and simple experience patients expect and deserve.

headline: Operating Platform for Businesses
about: Moka is a business platform that aims to help small and medium business owners run their business better. We do this by giving them powerful tools. From a Point of Sale system, inventory management, loyalty program, and a complete back-office for reporting and analytics, to business capital, and cashless payment acceptance.

headline: Price Optimization SaaS platform
about: Founded by IIT and Top US University graduates, Sciative Solutions is a leader in helping companies find right prices for every product, every market, every customer, every transaction. We are leading the Dynamic Pricing Revolution with our award winning machine learning and artificial intelligence powered technology tools. Sciative is powering price optimization of +100 Million prices globally across industries - such as retail, ecommerce, hospitality, travel, entertainment, technology services, CPG, and industrial products. For example our product in Retail is called BRIO. BRIO leverages big data architecture and applies cutting edge machine learning algorithms to help users find optimal prices for their products and services. A rich set of analytics features - Sales analytics dashboards, scenario planning with, a/b testing, 2nd margin estimation - allows users to make informed decisions and stay on top of business dynamics at play. This SaaS platform is live with more than 200 retailers in the country in electronics, fashion, cosmetics, and furniture domains. Our clients are getting 20% to 40% improvements in margins.
industries: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

headline: Elevating Japan's cross-border eCommerce industry
about: Join a Japan-based fast-growing international ecommerce team. Together we're building next generation solutions that fill a crucial missing piece between Japanese sellers and buyers around the world. We also run Blackship.com

headline: Helping Companies Prevent Toxic Behavior & Reduce Brand Risk
about: Fama is an AI-based software solution that identifies problematic behavior among potential hires and current employees by analyzing publicly available online information. Enterprise HR and talent acquisition leaders trust Fama to identify abusive behaviors, such as bigotry and harassment, that are often missed in the hiring and management process. We believe that becoming an increasingly diverse, equitable, and inclusive workplace makes us a more successful and resilient organization. We embrace equal opportunity for all applicants and seek to foster and preserve a culture of belonging for our employees. We recognize and appreciate that the more inclusive we are, the better we will function as a team. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or family status, disability, military veteran status, and any other status or background With Fama, organizations can now proactively protect their cultures and brands from a range of risky behaviors that can draw down on innovation and expose a brand to liability. Founded in 2015, Fama is backed by some of the world’s leading venture capitalists and institutional investors and is headquartered in Los Angeles, CA.

headline: Make Things. Better
about: We are on the brink of the next industrial revolution and Oden is using our technologies to usher in the new era of manufacturing. We’re on a mission to eliminate waste in manufacturing. Manufacturing has long been an analog world, but this has changed. By introducing machines to the digital world, there’s a staggering opportunity for efficiency and production leaps. We empower engineering and operations leaders to automatically solve and prevent quality and performance issues through our pre-built ML models. Through our manufacturing analytics platform, efficiency, sustainability, and competitiveness are democratized. Why We Do It: We like to enable those who make things - to make more, to waste less, to serve their customers, and to thrive in a competitive world. Help enough makers, and the world can give us all the abundance we want for less cost and environmental impact. We’re on the verge of a 4th industrial revolution that begs for absolute efficiency in all factors of life. We plan to deliver that to everyone who makes things.

We plan to then grow distribution of this solution to the entire care continuum, altering the care experience of providers and patients everywhere.

about: The Cambly app gives English learners instant 1-on-1 access to friendly native speakers over video chat 24/7. Students get an affordable and convenient way to practice their English and gain confidence. Tutors get to make money helping people from around the world practice English.

Imaginate is incorporated in 2016 in USA with headquarters in San Jose, California and has a wholly owned subsidiary in Hyderabad, India.

headline: Social Networking Application for Travelers
about: Jetzy is the world's first geo-location based, user-to-user social app to connect travelers to travelers and locals in real time and give free travel rewards. Chat with fellow travelers or locals to get travel recommendations, share inspiring travel images and make new friends all over the world. Using the app gives you JetPoints that can be redeemed for exciting rewards ranging from spa vouchers or dinners for two to free trips to Tahiti.

headline: Premium product discovery and trial
about: Smytten is currently available on iOS and android platform as an invitation only platform and on the web (www.smytten.com) for all. Deep profiling of consumer is done based on a proprietary algorithm before allowing them to access the app. Once in, consumer has the luxury to discover and try premium products. In addition, can buy the products as well. Hence offering seamless pre-purchase to purchase journey to the consumer. The product is equipped with an intelligent predictive behavioral model that decides the user’s interest and affinity continuously and curated the products in the feed accordingly. There is work in progress on machine learning algorithms and AI enabled chat bots for a more immersive consumer experience on the platform. Also the platform is integrated with native advertising engine that pushes ads in the user feed in a non intrusive way.

headline: We build technology to trade on the blockchain
about: AlphaLab Capital Group is a technology-driven trading group that transacts over $2B daily in cryptoassets on 40+ exchanges, both centralized and decentralized. Since 2017, we have consistently generated exceptional returns (aka alpha). We were one of the first movers in quantitative trading on the blockchain, and today we operate thousands of algorithms 24/7 on a globally distributed network of trading servers. We see blockchain as the foundational technology of our generation. Just as ship-building innovations in the 1450s launched the Age of Exploration or TCP/IP in the 1970s launched the internet as we know it, blockchain now opens up new worlds of possibility. Much of the infrastructure, applications, and software that we will all take for granted in a few decades are only glimmers in someone’s imagination today. We founded AlphaLab because there is huge potential in building that future. It’s also going to be a lot of fun.

headline: The community for selling & buying live event tickets

We want to be the first true C2C marketplace where users can buy and sell tickets in an efficient and transparent way, whether they are sold out or not, whether big or small events, run by professional artists or private people. By stepping out of the transaction and allowing our users to interact with each other, Ticombo makes the whole process more efficient while creating a better experience for our users.

headline: Know Who You're Paying
about: Walrus keeps push payments safe by developing and deploying novel authentication technology in a low friction platform. Walrus DoubleCheck is a platform that allows funds, banks, companies, and others to safely exchange payment details for wires, crypto transfers, stock distributions, and more. DoubleCheck is a unique solution that combines novel multifactor authentication, an innovative UX, and advanced AI. Not only does it keep transfers secure, but it also makes them more efficient.

headline: The Ultimate Urban Mobility Solution
about: Mozio is building the ultimate city mobility app: one app to book public transit, shuttles, limos, taxis, express trains and express buses. The world is bigger than Uber: of the $450 billion spent on local transportation every year, the majority are on other options like public transit. And each city has it's own transportation stack: you move around SF differently than you move around London, Munich or Oslo. Each one of those different transportation options in each city are on completely different technology stacks with different ticket redemption choices. Very often their fare structures are arcane, making you choose between "Tariff AB, BC or ABC." Mozio seeks to plug into all these sources and build your ultimate city mobility solution: we want you to be able to book a Supershuttle in Dallas, the Heathrow Express train in London, the U-Bahn in Germany, and Lyft when you get back home to SF.

headline: Social token infrastructure for the internet, built on Ethereum
about: Roll is a financial operating system for social tokens. It provides infrastructure and APIs that allow online communities to create and integrate social tokens into both financial systems and social platforms. Our mission is to upgrade human economic connection across the internet. Social tokens create units of value for your community that exist independent of the platforms you are currently using. Roll provides the tooling to grow markets for social tokens in the DeFi space while connecting each social token to the traditional social and fintech platforms we use everyday. Roll is designed for anyone with a loyal following that wants to interact with their community across the web. We recently raised a $10M Series A led by IOSG Ventures and have raised from other luminaries across the blockchain space. Roll is growing rapidly and actively hiring. You can get in touch through our AngelList job opportunities or shoot us an email anytime at hi@tryroll.com

about: Divvy Homes is a tech-enabled real estate platform that facilitates rent-to-own home purchases. Divvy is backed by GIC, Lennar, Caffeinated Capital, a16z, SciFi VC. Divvy was incubated in Max Levchin's startup studio HVF by Adena Hefets, previously of Square, and Brian Ma, previously of Zillow - along with cofounders Nick Clark and Alex Klarfeld. We founded Divvy to make homeownership, and all the power that comes with it, accessible to everyone. Because a home of your own isn’t just a resting place. It’s freedom, and it’s security. It’s a legacy—and a chance to build wealth for everyone who comes after you.

Our mission is to transform the energy industry into an efficient, highly effective landscape where buyers and service-providers connect effortlessly to get the job done—whenever, wherever. We are rapidly building the strongest network of service providers in the industry by offering unparalleled opportunities. RigUp’s exclusive technology enables us to eliminate the wasteful underutilization of the traditional energy workforce by better managing supply and demand. We’ve become a proven, trusted player in our space, and we’re not slowing down—we have great opportunities for further growth, with a very interesting product and technical challenges and ample room for career development.

headline: Sell courses online securely from your own branded website & mobile apps
about: Learnyst is an LMS Software Company based out in Bangalore, India. We help educators to sell their courses online from their own branded website & mobile apps. We are a "SHOPIFY for education". Our focus is to make technology simple for educators & to help them grow. Using simple drag & drop interface, educators can create courses, mock-tests & sell it to their students across the world. With our powerful test engine, educators can schedule CAT, GATE, IIT-JEE, GMAT, IAS & Banking Exams online. Our software also lets them track student performances with our indepth test analytics reports. Lastly, educators get 100% course sales credited to their bank account. We don't charge them any transaction fees. To summarize, we offer them an end-to end solution that helps them teach online without worrying about the technology or maintanence costs of apps. So far, Learnyst has helped 1000+ educators to generate 10X revenue over investment and save at least 80% on online teaching platform maintenance. On Learnyst educators have launched 50000+ courses with course sales of more than $40 million and more than 300,000 students are using Learnyst branded apps.

headline: The Next Generation Platform for Identity and Authentication
tags: SXSW Security & Privacy Winner (#1 in 50 finalists, 400 applicants):
RSA Innovation Sandbox Unanimous 2017 Winner (#1 in 50):
TechCrunch Disrupt SF Battlefield Runner-Up (#2 in 1000):
about: Hate passwords? So do we. We believe that within five years, passwords will no longer be the predominant method of authentication. We are UnifyID, a company that is building a revolutionary identity platform based on implicit authentication. headline: A wellbeing coalition to support women + people who menstruate in their healthcare journey
about: We are Favor: A wellbeing coalition committed to supporting women and people who menstruate in their health journey. We’re bringing together doctors, nurses, dermatologists, pharmacists, patient care advocates, and policy experts to ensure our members feel seen and supported while getting the care they need whenever they want, wherever they are. Six years ago we started by solving the inherent, unnecessary hassle tied to birth control. We built a new system, because the current one failed us. By creating an accessible, affordable, and convenient experience, we’ve served more than two million patients nationwide and counting. Women and people who menstruate have long been dismissed, talked over and often ignored by health providers. At Favor, we know this because many of us have lived it. We’re evolving from a single-point solution focused on birth control delivery & reproductive healthcare to a digital health platform that offers prescription skin care, over-the-counter skin care, period care, and other sexual wellness items. We accept most major forms of insurance, Medicaid in select states, and offer affordable out-of-pocket options too. Favor is the place to go when you want to get treated right.

headline: We are a strategy and innovation consultancy. Thorny problems are our strong suit
about: We are energized by complex, multistakeholder spaces where the solutions are not obvious and the potential for impact is high. Our work spans a broad cross-section of topics across four focus areas: education and the future of work, scientific breakthroughs, future of health, and infrastructure. We are agile, “no surprises” consultants who work hand-in-hand with government, foundation, and private-sector clients. To help organizations “make it real,” we convene multidisciplinary stakeholders, facilitate alignment among partners, map ecosystems, create frameworks for thoughtful and considered decision-making, build scenarios around opportunity areas, select pathways, design strategic programs — and ultimately, operationalize and launch new initiatives. When the bets are big and the stakes are high, our clients come to us for rapid alignment, smart strategies, and agile execution. We deliberately design pilots and incentive programs for both short-term and long-term ambitions. When Osso VR won the EdSim Challenge, it was a newly established company. Since then, the company has deployed its solution in more than 20 global hospital residency programs and now employs over 100 people. Last year, the winner of the Opioid Detection Challenge was awarded a Customs and Border Protection (CBP) contract to conduct the first phase of a pilot program; its advanced threat algorithms detect narcotics and opioids that are shipped and concealed in mail and other packages. And the results of MagQuest will inform the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency’s acquisition strategy for a World Magnetic Model data collection capability, with an expected procurement that can provide operational capacity by 2027. We also design pilot programs to validate and refine concepts: CTE CyberNet, initially a three-location pilot, is now set to expand into additional locations.

Who We AreThe Time Doctor team is fully remote team made up of more than 130 people in 30+ countries.Since we first launched in 2012, our goal has been to empower people to work productively no matter where they are. We all work from home and love having the freedom to choose when and where we want to work while being able to spend more time with our families or travelling. Remote Business Is the FutureThere has been an evolution in the workplace over the last few years. Remote work has stopped being simply the cheap option for companies and has started becoming the right option, not just to reduce costs, but also to hire the best talent. A growing number of companies are choosing to be distributed instead of in-person and even without physical offices are growing to valuations of more than a billion dollars. At Time Doctor, our focus is on allowing customers to build distributed teams that can work wherever and whenever they want, so the business can focus on allocating their office-running costs elsewhere. headline: We help manufacturing teams drive efficiency by making knowledge processes collaborative
about: The biggest waste in manufacturing today is not on the shop floor. It's in the meetings, emails, and data transfer that overwhelm knowledge processes (eg quality assurance, vendor management, engineering, R&D, and sales). That's because traditional enterprise tools split collaboration and processes into disparate systems, resulting in up to 85% of time and effort being wasted. Unifize solves this problem by bringing collaboration and process into one place. By creating a conversation for every process record, Unifize measurably reduces waste in knowledge processes by up to 95%.

Improved accuracy, by utilising data from multiple sources and expert annotations while building models
Better tackle cases with high inter-observer variability
Improved efficiency, by automating manual tasks performed by physicians
Improved healthcare delivery, by making advanced diagnostics available through low cost medical devices
about: Vision: To disrupt the medical diagnostic space by data driven intelligence Mission: Impact:

headline: Smart people who love hard problems and elegant solutions
about: LeafLabs was founded in 2009 by a group of friends from MIT on the premise that science happens not just in shiny labs, but also on cluttered workbenches in musty basements everywhere. We're a small, eclectic team with a variety of backgrounds and skill sets, but we all love solving hard problems and building cool stuff. We pride ourselves on our flat organization structure, the ethics and quality of our work, and the intelligence, expertise, and culture of our team. We have worked with companies ranging from Google and Facebook, to small startups, to government organizations like the NIH and DARPA. At LeafLabs you'll have unmatched input and self-determination on your projects and the work that you do. We will never work on destructive military or financial applications, preferring to work on projects and research that directly betters humanity. The working environment at LeafLabs is friendly and flexible, and we strive to support good work/life balance for everyone on our team. At LeafLabs you will be working as part of a highly collaborative and tightly knit group. Our offices are located at the Industry Lab co-working space in the heart of Inman Square (Cambridge, MA). Employee growth and education is an important part of LeafLabs culture, whether it is professional development to expand our collective knowledge or an art installation at Firefly. What’s the point of having a company if we can’t do cool stuff?

That means using a tailored approach to student’s diverse personalities, skills, and problems; customizing and iterating our approach to ensure success. about: Our product vision is to turn dashcams into smart detectors by powering them with vision AI to alert the driver to prevent cars colliding with animals on the road.We are at prototype stage, tuning edge AI models to detect different animal species accurately & timely.Our product may be software only, licensed to dashcam manufacturers, or a full solution (our own dashcam + mobile App + web portal for users). B2C or B2B (car damages are $8 billion/year in the USA).We target the 1.5 billion "normal" cars that have zero vision AI. Not the Teslas & other ultra fancy expensive cars.

headline: Last Mile Wearable Medical Passport
about: At Khushi Baby (KB) we seek to motivate and monitor community health care at the last mile. We build and implement community-inspired digital health solutions to empower frontline health workers to deliver informed care for pregnant women, children, and other vulnerable groups. Khushi Baby is the Nodal Technical Support Partner to the Government of Rajasthan’s Department of Medical, Health, and Family Welfare, responsible for designing, developing, and implementing the State’s integrated community health platform out of the Rajasthan State Data Center. Collectively, Khushi Baby’s solutions have been used by over 70,000 community health workers in the last year, with independent modules for COVID-19 active surveillance and longitudinal reproductive, maternal, neonatal, and child health tracking. These solutions have been used to track the health of over 17 million beneficiaries, making Khushi Baby’s m-health platform for government-employed community health workers, the second largest in the world. Beyond Rajasthan, we also have current solutions deployed in Maharashtra and Haryana. Our solutions have included a variety of novel technology implementations and integrations including Near Field Communication, facial biometrics, and AI/ML for fraud detection. These solutions have emerged from over 5 years of experience working closely with health workers in the field in 400 villages of Udaipur.

Evolution uses cutting edge advances in Natural Language Processing, transfer learning and unstructured data extraction to read and understand insurance claims like a human investigator would, but find anomalies and inconsistencies as only a computer can. As social content has become more image and video based, social media sponsorship activations have become more creative. It is not longer relevant to analyze only text in social media. Blinkfire Analytics uses computer vision to analyze multimedia resources and generate reports for Teams, Players, Agents and Brands so they can better engage their fans and sponsors. Brands can now manage their brand lift on the "visual web", first in the sports channel, and later, beyond.

headline: Unifying the DevOps Universe
about: Modern DevOps tools have evolved from the ground-up – one data silo and disconnected use case at a time. As a result, modern DevOps is a fragmented pile of tools that don’t really talk to each other and require a ton of extra effort from developers – some data here, some actions there, with inefficient coordination all over. We’re unifying DevOps from the other side – starting from the actual workflows and then solving backwards to the enabling data and technologies to make DevOps faster, easier, and safer. Early users of our software have said it’s “orders of magnitude better” than what’s on the market right now, and “solves a problem that every DevOps engineer faces”. Our founder is coming off a 9-figure acquisition (just four years post-founding) with his last company. Our team hails from Google, Facebook, Microsoft, and the fastest-growing tech companies in history. We hold dozens of patents in machine learning and have published academic papers in computational modeling as well as human-computer interaction. Our investors are widely considered to be amongst the top in Silicon Valley — for investing early in the biggest tech companies in history (Google, Apple, YouTube, WhatsApp, Cisco), not just for thought leadership. But we’re just getting started, and we need you to help make this vision a reality.

headline: Wearable device shown in clinical trials to solve pain 2x better than Vicodin
about: 1.5 billion people worldwide live with chronic pain, and the best option they have are drugs like Vicodin that have terrible side effects and make people feel sick. Enso has developed the first opioid-free, wearable device clinically proven to solve pain better than Vicodin. It works by delivering a patented electrical stimulation treatment that relaxes the muscles and calms the nerves wherever it is applied, and it's all controlled via an app on your smartphone. Enso is being used to solve chronic and acute pain at over 100 medical centers in the US such as Stanford, Harvard and Cedars-Sinai. The device is covered by the VA Hospitals and workers compensation insurance plans and is expected to be covered by other major insurance plans by 2020.

Imagine earning 10% off at your favorite sports brand as you complete a workout on a fitness app or receiving 20% off on beauty products as you browse articles online; these are the moments of happiness we power everyday, reimagining the online advertising experience by turning user engagement into performance revenue. The experience behind digital advertising hasn't changed since 1994. It's about time. Yes, we do feel like super heroes. Backed by some of North America's largest web and mobile publishers, Goloot has raised over 5M$ USD in 2 years, kicking off a much needed revolution in one of the world's largest industries.

headline: We're fixing anti-money laundering & compliance with smart tech and better data
about: ComplyAdvantage is helping firms rethink how they combat financial crime and comply with regulations (specifically around Sanctions, AML and CTF). The team is on a personal mission to combat the rising threat of terrorism and fight the negative impact on society of money laundering. ComplyAdvantage's proprietary, dynamic global database of individuals, organisations and all their connections, provides fresh insight into financial crime risks (e.g. Sanctions, Watchlists, Politically Exposed Persons, Adverse Media). ComplyAdvantage's screening platform helps to safely automate the risk assessment of customers and transactions, and their real-time analytics enable firms to monitor customer activity and spot suspicious behaviours. ComplyAdvantage uses machine learning and big data coupled with a tailored risk-based approach to help a wide range of insurance companies and financial institutions improve automation, reduce manual work (‘false positives’) and make decisions faster.

Founded by ex-Rocket Lab engineers, we utilise bleeding-edge technology to solve challenging but exciting problems that make a huge impact in a $1.9 trillion industry. headline: High Functioning, Highly Accessible Bionic Prosthetic Devices For Those With Limb Loss

about: Alt-Bionics is a medical device company that aims to tackle the problem of high-cost prosthetic devices by delivering affordable alternatives to the artificial limbs market. Our goal is to apply new, advanced, and low-cost technology to medical devices in order to display the capabilities that are similar in both form and function to higher-priced devices. Initially, Alt-Bionics will be manufacturing bionic hands for those with below elbow amputations or congenital disorders. Later, the company plans to expand to other areas of prosthetics. Alt-Bionics is currently developing a below elbow bionic arm / hand prosthetic device. This device is able to restore basic and essential mobility to below elbow amputees and those with congenital disorders for up to 95% less than the cost of current products. Our target market is hundreds of thousands strong and unfortunately, many are unable to afford quality of life devices like this without expansive medical insurance. We believe that paying $150,000 for something as vital as a hand is abhorrent given a team of college students created something similar for 99% cheaper. We are well underway with our R&D and are already making waves within the industry. Some achievements are as follows:

headline: Elumicate is building the World's largest decentralized outdoor data capture network
about: The Elumicate Network is fully decentralized and owned by all who participate, yet owned by no single entity. Utilizing advanced technologies, the network’s purpose is to capture real world events and digitize them into the form of data that can then be accessed with ease.A token model is used to encourage and reward participants for their efforts. The token can be converted into data credits in order to gain access to the accumulated data. This creates a loop where the work put in to accumulate the data is rewarded with tokens that can then be used to gain access to the accumulated data. Token owners may transfer their holdings to allow others to gain access to the network’s data if they choose.With a strong focus on security and anonymity, the network employs a governance model that ensures relevant decisions are voted upon by its participants who are also the owners. The network holds immense potential beyond it’s initial purpose of tracking traffic. More on our website.

With an ambitious aim, we founded this company to simplify the complex process of study abroad by removing human bias and enhancing its quality of guidance for study abroad aspirants. We know that this industry had never been transformed but just dragged with biases and is thus fragmented and non standardised making it harder for students to trust people and companies. Thus we never get into becoming India's Best Consultant, but an unbiased platform that helps you connect you to authentic folks - Mentors & Counsellors to achieve your study abroad goals. At ForeignAdmits, we are simplifying the complex processes of study abroad preparations to enable studying abroad opportunities equally available to any deserving candidate. We are a 100% digital platform that provided complete study abroad and career support to study abroad aspirants. Thus top Organizations like ETS TOEFL and JIO had partnered with us to spread the value we are creating. ForeignAdmits is a global platform built by international graduates only (Nikhil, IIT BHU & Monash Alumni; Ashwini Jain, IITBHU & Purdue), to help students aspiring to study abroad. Over 200k users have explored their study abroad or career needs on our platform to discover study abroad mentorship, universities, scholarships, visa, applications and also connect with peers, alumni and university officials from around the world. If you have a passion for Career, Education & believe in Mentorship Methods for success, join us in changing the way students make their decisions about education. Thanks to over 200,000 users who have tried our platform for their study abroad journey.

headline: Solving payment needs for the next decade
about: SumUp is the leading financial technology company that is set to become the first ever global card acceptance brand. SumUp is the only company to offer an end-to-end EMV card acceptance solution built on proprietary hardware and mobile apps with a full suite of SDKs and APIs for third parties to integrate card payments into their mobile apps. The SumUp product suite also provides each business with a Virtual Terminal and SumUp’s state-of-the-art SMS (text message) payment application. This unique offering enabled SumUp to rapidly expand into 31 markets, including the U.S., Brazil and Germany.

After a set period, the bidding process ends and bid analysis is carried out through a proprietary algorithm. The final three bids selected presented in a user friendly format to allow a homeowner to understand the advantages of each bid. The homeowner then has the opportunity to select a bid on the site and e-sign a contract directly with the installer.

Nested is built for movers, the first estate agent to support both the selling and buying process, for no extra fee. We can even make sellers chain-free, with our groundbreaking cash advance securing their ideal home before they sell. We are a wildly ambitious team, backed by Europe’s leading VCs and led by an experienced, hands-on founding team. In our buzzing Farringdon offices you’ll find a crew of friendly and collaborative problem-solvers each contributing to a new era for home movers. Our vision is to use connected data and automation to transform risk management to make it more transparent and responsive, similar to how the internet and mobile changed commerce and advertising. We do this by infusing data-enabled intelligence and automation technology into everything we build, all the while delivering a customer experience that is second to none. headline: We connect the unemployed with their benefits - a lifeline for millions of Americans
about: Claimyr is a FinTech company helping the unbanked. Why unemployment? Unemployment is an inflection point in the financial, career, and person life of a person. Yet, shockingly little services exist to help the unemployed. The assumption is that startups cannot help the unemployed - it's the realm of the public and non-profit sector. Our customers disagree. We believe the world needs Claimyr, it won’t happen any time soon if we don’t do it, and we are much less likely to succeed if you don’t join. Claimyr takes the claim process from weeks and months to minutes or days. We automate communication channels with state unemployment agencies through custom telecom APIs. We also give unemployed people access to a quickly growing network of others to crowdsource problems, Q&A, and other critical support. We have helped 100,000 people receive more than $700,000,000 in benefits. We are a profitable bootstrapped company and growing faster than we can handle.

headline: Event Booking Platform which can bring People and Service Providers on a single platform
about: Bookeventz.com (prev Urbanrestro) in its current avatar is a Venue booking platform, helping people book venues for their events, online. Organizing a party involves so many things, right from shortlisting venues to getting negotiated packages from them, from inviting people to do coordination between all party related vendors (Event planners, Caterers, Artists). It is so tedious that people think twice or more before hosting any event or do events at the same venue over and over again. We at BookEventz, have taken this problem as our motto to build a product which can provide people a convenient tool to manage their whole event at a click of a button or on their mobile. They can view all the venues, get customised packages and have access to all other service providers on a single platform. We have started our journey and determined to reach to our goals. Interested people who share our vision and can relate to our ideas, are more than welcome to join us in our pursuit.

headline: Bodyport develops biomarker-guided digital therapeutics for complex chronic conditions
about: Our mission is to eliminate the leading cause of death worldwide - heart disease. We are bridging the gap between hospital grade medical devices and the health tools presently available in the home. Our first product uses a novel sensor technology to rapidly screen for the major risk factors of heart disease in under fifteen seconds. The clinical grade data measured by our system fuels algorithms aimed at predicting and preventing the onset of cardiovascular disease. Chronic disease accounts for over 80% of all healthcare spending. Body weight and cardiovascular health are key indicators in the onset and progression of the leading causes of preventable illness: heart disease and diabetes. Having worked at a large resuscitation company, we’ve seen firsthand the outcome when these conditions are left unmonitored.

headline: The app where women and non-binary creators make money
about: Sunroom a less restrictive safe space, where a new set of rules and norms make women and non-binary creators feel proud to create and monetize their content. We occupy the space that exists between OnlyFans and Instagram/TikTok, giving a previously unserved group of creators a way to monetize their content and connect with their audiences more intimately. We started this company because existing monetization products are either too restrictive or too stigmatized. A growing group of women and non-binary creators didn’t have a safe, credible, and progressive space to directly monetize their audiences. And until Sunroom, these creators were missing out on this income stream. Sunroom users say that the safety features, respectful conversations, authentic content, and high-touch support is what sets the platform apart. Sunroom was founded by women who were leaders at Hinge and Bumble. We have a small but talented LA based team, who care deeply about the safety of our creators, how much money they're earning, and changing the perceptions people have towards women monetizing themselves online. We're backed by several top women angel investors, including Whitney Wolfe Herd, Cyan Bannister, and Li Jin, as well as funds like Blackbird and Red Swan. Prolific creators like Mimi Elashiry, Chantelle Otten, and Riley Reid have joined Sunroom.

headline: A pre-employment assessment platform that gets people in dream jobs
about: At TestGorilla, we envision a world where everyone has their dream job. To achieve this, employers and employees need to have the right information about each other. We started in 2020 by building a screening platform that enables employers to evaluate candidates in the skills that matter most for success in a role. Our product replaces subjective, incomplete, and often inflated CVs with objective, reliable, and fair test results measuring aptitude, practical job skills, motivation, and culture add. Improving and expanding this platform is currently our core focus, but it’s only the beginning of our journey to get everyone their dream job. Over time, we will launch more products that support this mission. We have procured $70m in Series A funding from the venture-capital firms Atomico and Balderton Capital, and our growth is on target to continue exponentially. Chances are you’re familiar with some of our biggest customers, like Sony, PepsiCo, H&M, Deloitte, Bain & Company, Oracle, Revolut, and the UK’s National Health Service. We work remotely, spread across the Americas, Europe, Asia, and Africa.

headline: No Code Data Pipeline
about: At Hevo, we are building the world’s most secure and scalable data platform as a service (PaaS). There has been a fundamental change in the amount of data companies are generating these days. More and more users in an organization are looking at data now. Data is no more a second-class citizen and companies are seeing data as a competitive advantage rather than as a geek’s obsession. We see this change and we are here change the way companies analyze their data. We believe that users should be able to talk to data rather than looking at a barrage of reports and dashboards. More importantly, users should be only looking at data that matters and not everything that is thrown at them. We are looking for people who believe in challenging the status quo and are ready to be a part of this change. If you are the one who is looking to take a leap of faith and work on technologies of the future, then we are looking for you.

headline: Advance the crypto-economy by building best-in-class tools for developers
about: Center is building the NFT infrastructure for the internet. We make it easy for builders to build NFT-enabled apps. Today, building NFT apps is incredibly time consuming. Imagine if in order to put up a personal website, you first had to crawl the entire internet. That would make launching a website pretty hard, right? That's exactly the case with NFTs today. We eliminate all this complexity for builders. Instead of spending months of engineering time building NFT infrastructure, developers use Center's APIs to search, show, and interact with NFTs on 14 blockchains.

headline: Modern Lease Management for commercial tenants and tenant-rep brokers
about: Occupier is making it radically easier for businesses to make real estate decisions with our deal and portfolio management software. For traditional office tenants and growing retailers, real estate is typically the second largest expense for a business next to payroll, yet the technology used to manage it is no more sophisticated than antiquated accounting software, spreadsheets and email. This leaves companies vulnerable to existential risk due to missed lease obligations, slow decision making and misinformed real estate strategy. Occupier is set to change all of this with intuitive, automated workflow, enabling companies to utilize data and make more informed decisions that align with key business initiatives.

headline: Vokal is giving answers to a billion multilingual Indians
about: Vokal is a knowledge sharing platform in regional languages designed for the next billion users. India is the only country with a high language diversity of 100+ languages. India is expected to rise from 400 million internet users to about 800 million users. Most of whom will be with vernacular preferences. Unfortunately there's a dearth of content to cater to these users in a largely English dominated internet. If they search for basic questions / queries on Google, they get irrelevant search results. Most of their search queries are in voice but the search results are web links - something many aren't used to. These vernacular internet users don't enjoy the same level of information and knowledge that english internet users do. Vokal bridges that gap by giving vernacular Indians the easiest way to ask questions using voice. These questions are then answered by subject matter experts in voice or video, in their native language. Vokal is a small team of 30 people that's poised to cater to 250+ million monthly users in the next few years thanks to the ever-growing network of contributors that create more vernacular content on the internet everyday than anyone else on the planet!

headline: We're pioneering a new form of lending in a large, unique, and vastly underserved market
about: We’re not crypto-based, point-of-sale financing, or a hot new banking platform. In the world of Fintech we’re a bit contrarian and we like it that way. We’re introducing technology to an industry stuck in the stone age, delivering value to everyone involved: borrowers, lenders, and partners - while at the same time building a great enduring business. We're a well-funded seed stage start-up founded by industry veterans from finance and software, including the co-founder of Strava and Guidewire.

headline: We are on a mission to reinvent the ways technical talent and technical teams align

We are in a time where jobs being filled mean poor relationship management, over-promising and keyword matching that creates a frustrating experience for candidates and inaccurate process for employers, piled up with high turnover. Sprout has set out to shake things up and add a true human element. Our comprehensive talent profiles, rigorous technical vetting process, and machine learning team dynamic assessments guarantee you find the right environment to succeed in and/or the proper talent to grow your organization adequately. Sprout provides a strategic partnership focused solely on creating dynamic teams & effective scaling solutions. Follow us at:www.sprout.hr

headline: Building all-in-one digital onboarding platform for a billion people using cutting edge AI
about: We (friends at frslabs) are an award-winning company specialising in identity verification and fraud prevention solutions. Established a decade ago in 2010, with Bangalore as our home, we proudly serve over 125 global customers, with over a million transactions flowing through our systems every month. As a team, we try to keep things simple. We don’t follow rigid methodologies, exhaustive specs, ridiculous approval cycles or get-my-permission-first bosses. This is not to say that we do not have coding best practices, style guides, wikis or quality guides. We do, like every good company should. We take our work seriously as clients put us on their critical path to success. And if we mess things up, it hurts them badly. Each of us understands that the best software is made through a flexible, iterative process, keeping the end-user in mind, with a keen eye for detail, and collaborating and keeping the team updated every step of the way. We don’t crave for monthly appreciations or badges to motivate us. Instead, we crave the best in each of us to make a lasting impact. We strive for craftsmanship, the likes of beautiful prose, poem, music or art. We work hard to create an environment where good ideas are nurtured and rewarded (five patents pending is a testament to our innovation culture). We are pretty sure that if you look beyond the veneer of a gravity-defying salary, shiny office or fancy chairs, you will have a blast at frslabs in terms of intellectual stimulation and interesting work. We are a healthy and profitable company and we value good old hard work over easy money. And that's one reason we are not venture funded and believe in our own creation, abilities and profits to succeed (just the way nature intended humans to work and succeed). You can read more about frslabs here:

headline: The College Learning Marketplace
about: PROBLEMCurrent academic supplementary services are disjointed, and have failed to transition smoothly to an online environment (eg. Kaplan $2Bn+ revenue). When you Google Search an academic question you get spammy responses with low credibility like Yahoo Answers. Students need a trusted resource they can turn to online to get the Academic Help. SOLUTIONStudySoup helps struggling students get the content they need to succeed. Top students make money by providing notes, study guides, and flashcards (beta) for their peers. StudySoup is your University Academic Resource center brought online. Highlights: Top students can make a $1000+ per month on StudySoup. Over half a million college students use StudySoup today.

headline: The Smart Tire Management Platform
about: Revvo is committed to making the entire experience about tires easy and informative. We are a team passionate about tires and great customer experience. Our technology was created to minimize the guess work and stress that comes with tire management in order to keep operators and drivers on the road. We know most operators are not tire experts nor do they want to be, so we developed an automated way to monitor and inform owners on the status and predicted life of their tires. Our belief is simple, make the best solutions that help our customers manage their tires. Revvo's mission is to monitor and safely maximize the life of every tire on the road.We believe that tires need to join the digital age and our platform is enabling this to happen. "If a tire could speak, what would it say?" Our founding principle is that data is the key that unlocks actionable insight. Our technology combines cutting edge IoT sensors, AI and machine learning models, and tire research to create a unique tire data platform. This platform helps operators, owners, and drivers know the status and predicted remaining life of each tire. Tire management should be stress-free, objective, and trustworthy.

headline: Fena - Seamless access to Open Banking payments
about: Fena - Seamless access to Open Banking payments We believe that costly card payments and outdated infrastructure shouldn’t hamper businesses, and with Fena, they don’t. Fena (formerly Faizpay) is rapidly growing, using new regulations to enable seamless access to Open Banking. London based, but with staff across the globe, we are building products for customers across multiple geographies. Our solutions are built to improve payments for for everyone. Business of all sizes can save up to 85% vs card payment fees, reduce fraud, and improve the user experience with technology designed for the modern day. Some example use cases include: FinTechs: Fena provides payment APIs for instant payments. Payments can be initiated within the fintech’s app or website using Open Banking payments with bank level security. No cards, reduced fraud, low fees. eCommerce: Easy to install solutions requiring only a few lines of code, or plug-ins for solutions like WooCommerce, merchants can quickly add open banking payments to their checkout to reduce their costs, remove chargebacks, and minimise fraud. Small Retailers: In-store or in-person payments using our merchant app. Removes the need for a card terminal, instead using a mobile and QR code. Retailers can accept bank transfers as seamlessly as card payments for a fraction of the cost. Invoice Payments: Users can insert a QR code or payment link onto invoices to ensure they receive the right amount, every time. Generate these payment requests manually, or connect your account via API to automatically generate requests.

We’re an ecommerce enablement software platform built on top of Shopify that helps small online merchants grow their add to cart rate by up to 38%. We help them do this by integrating their back end data into their front end site experience to drive the most accurate and up to date content for their site visitors. Our automation platform merges the front end of ecommerce website design with a store’s back end data infrastructure (ecommerce platforms like Shopify and WooCommerce + merchant tools like Shippo and Yotpo) to provide for a fully automated experience. headline: AI for Corporate Debt
about: martini.ai uses deep learning to reimagine corporate debt REMOTE< 10 EMPLOYEES< 10 ENGINEERS$5M - $10M FUNDINGPRE-SERIES Amartini.ai is focused on bringing the power of deep learning and quant modeling to the fixed-income world. Our differentiating edge is the use of machine learning and quantitative techniques to model the pricing of illiquid assets (specifically, corporate bonds and credit spreads). By dramatically improving the pricing of credit, we aim to better match credit liquidity providers to companies and businesses that are great credit risks. In particular, CFOs and corporate finance professionals can use our deep learning models to understand their company's risk profile and benchmark against peers. This can help lenders understand the business better and unlock cheaper credit. The co-founders, Rajiv Bhat and Rohit Singh, are repeat entrepreneurs with backgrounds in deep learning and quant trading. Rajiv was co-founder at social intelligence startup Mertado (YC W202) through its acquisition by Groupon. Later, he led data science at ad tech unicorn InMobi. He also worked at McKinsey and Kosmix and has a Ph.D. in Physics from Boulder. Rohit was co-founder and CEO at Tech Square Trading, a quant hedge fund trading up to ~$300M daily. He is a research scientist at MIT and is affiliated with the Computer Science and AI Lan (CSAIL) there. He is the recipient of MIT's George M. Sprowls Award for Best CS PhD Theses and of Stanford's Christopher Stephenson Memorial Award for Masters Research in CS.

Couples, separated family members, digital nomads, and distributed teams, those people who need to create unique and immutable online memories are our customers. headline: Bankuish helps gig workers & freelancers in Latin America access affordable banking
about: Our product is an app where gig workers and freelancers leverage their work history data to demonstrate their creditworthiness. The company helps banks gain new customers, manage risk, and improve customer relationships. The Bankuish Score has been used to de-risk thousands of individuals while maintaining a default rate well below the industry standard. We are expanding the offerings on our platform to include investment options, insurance and more.

headline: Pod is the only smart productivity workspace for account executives
about: Pod is a fast-growing enterprise software start-up, based in the heart of Silicon Valley. Today, account executives spend 60-80% of their day on other things than selling. This is mostly due to the fact that rpes have to navigate a web of disconnected tools on the daily. Pod is an integrated system of action for sales teams. We connect to our users' existing sales tools and provide them with the tools & insights to work better, faster, and smarter. Pod is a more intuitive way for reps to update, organize, and prioritize their pipeline. Every day, we strive to help account executives save time and hit their quota more consistently. Pod was founding in 2021 by Patrick Monnot (McKinsey, Zinier) and Shrivant Bhartia (Amount, Inhabitr)

headline: We help doctor’s offices in India automate and run their business online

Our tools help both clinics & large hospitals to work efficiently. We are looking for committed individuals to build our passionate team, who can further head the important positions in the company through their technical and leadership skills.

headline: We help nurses find jobs they love

There are tens of thousands of healthcare facilities (such as hospitals, nursing homes, rehab centers) who need nurses. We bring them together by working with our healthcare facility clients to find the nurses they need.

headline: Learn how to become an exceptional developer
about: Rithm’s full-stack web development program is a four-month accelerated learning experience. We take independent and thoughtful students and turn them into confident and creative full-stack developers. We value an intimate learning community and therefore our class sizes are capped at 20 students. Our curriculum is centered around JavaScript and Python, and also features three weeks for students to work as interns for companies in the Bay Area. Our team of instructors all have previous teaching and industry experience and with small class sizes, experienced instructors, and real world projects, we've had over 85% of students hired within six months of graduating with a median salary of $110,000.

headline: Comprehensive care to restore gut health
about: Salvo Health helps millions of Americans who face chronic health conditions through specialty medicine and innovative virtual-first clinics. Salvo Health members receive support with a coordinated care team, customized care plan, and async, on-app, communication through a direct-to-consumer subscription model, no insurance required. Salvo Health is backed by leading health care investors from innovators like Livongo, Ro, Ginger, Forward, Brightline, Tia, and others. Salvo Health care will draw on expertise from board-certified specialty physicians, registered dietitians, psychologists, and health coaches who will deliver wraparound support on a multi-month journey to better health. Salvo Health is the first to bring a scalable, tech-enabled “functional medicine” approach to chronic disorders. We go beyond masking symptoms to identifying the root causes for each person, so conditions can be managed.

headline: Helping our members navigate the uncertainty of modern life with smarter insurance
about: Surround emerged from one simple idea: all of the amazing choices that the go-getters and doers of the modern economy enjoy also creates a pervasive feeling of uncertainty. Neither age-old insurance products based on the things we (used to) own nor a customer experience relying on too many questions and a carrier pigeon serve these new consumers. We believe this is a problem that properly designed insurance can solve. We’re attacking a $1.2 trillion-dollar market that needs a beautifully crafted user experience matched with a new approach to insurance product design. We’re angel and venture capital-backed and advised by insurance and technology veterans who share our vision and believe in our mission. Come join us!

headline: Make better use of your ever-growing knowledge
tags: Connect your repository, and we will import and then update any kind of digital content, automatically.
Ask complex questions in natural language and get a clear-cut answer: the exact portion of text that answers your question, no need to read the whole document.
As the knowledge gets created Pigro updates itself in the background without any human intervention, without changing employees' habits.
about: 41% of managers rank as the top one problem to solve the content findability. This happens because inside an enterprise there are several repositories, each one with its own search feature. Users jump from repository to repository to find what they are looking for, struggling with poor search experiences. Search results are so poor that 13% of the employee's time is wasted in creating content that already exists because they are not able to find it. Pigro is an AI search engine for large corporates working on their internal knowledge base. Anyone can ask questions in natural language and receive a straight answer or data, instead of having to search for the answer inside each document. How it works:

about: Eliminate stock outs and excess inventory with customisable forecasts and recommended purchase orders.

headline: We grow small businesses
about: Small and Medium Business (SMB) are the backbone of our economy, yet they struggle to get capital essential to grow their business as the current financial system determines capital eligibility based on the ability to jump application hoops rather than the health of the business. We at Parafin want to change this. We want to enable businesses that serve these SMBs and are in a unique position to help these SMBs to offer them growth capital. We abstract away all the complexity of offering growth capital into easy to integrate APIs and SDKs. About the founders:Ralph, Vineet and Sahill met at Robinhood in early 2016 and were amongst the first 35 employees. They helped scale the Robinhood user base by 40x, took two of the biggest revenue sources from zero to one and built a lot of the core data infrastructure, risk and fraud mitigation and machine learning systems. Between them they have a Pure Math PhD from Stanford, Particle Physics PhD from CERN, the title of Putnam Fellow, discovered the Higgs-Boson and have opened sourced Faust.

headline: Instant access to real devices and browsers for testing
about: BrowserStack is the most reliable web and mobile app testing platform on the market, used by more than 2 million developers across 135 countries. We empower teams to speed up release cycles and deploy websites and mobile applications that work seamlessly on any user interface. Users can choose from more than 2,000 on-demand real mobile devices, browsers and operating systems and rely on a secure, stable and scalable infrastructure to support thousands of concurrent manual and automated tests. By reducing the time, cost and maintenance overhead associated with testing, we help software teams keep focus on what matters most - building better products and services with amazing experiences. More than 25,000 global companies rely on BrowserStack, including industry-leaders like Microsoft, ING, Mastercard, Dow Jones, Garmin, National Geographic, Volvo, HubSpot, Walt Disney and AngularJS. With offices in San Francisco, Mumbai and Dublin, BrowserStack is privately held and backed by Accel.

headline: Scribe is a data platform for company information, powered by research-based AI
about: From Private Equity to Banking, thousands of Finance Analysts review and analyse companies every day. However, company data is stuck in the past, updated weeks after publication and usually needing lengthy intervention. Scribe is setting out to tackle this problem with their data platform for company information. The company's research-led approach to AI means analysts can uncover deep insights about private companies and end data entry from PDFs. In doing so, Scribe can take significant administrative work out of the lending and investment process.

headline: Corporate wellness benefits for modern companies
about: IncentFit is a health and wellness benefits company. Our nine corporate wellness benefits products are designed to reward your employees for making healthy choices all year round. Since 2013, we’ve helped hundreds of other businesses figure out what their employees really need from a wellness program, whether that's motivation to exercise or an easier way to pay for gym memberships. We serve small-and-mid-sized businesses and health insurance providers, across diverse industries—from major financial firms to manufacturing powerhouses, to public universities and nonprofits. Simply put, we make it simple to reward your team for living well.

headline: The least boring app to master a language
about: PingoLearn is a mobile-first micro-learning app. We offer language courses with mini video lessons inspired by real-life conversations.

headline: World's first social beauty platform. Find beauty content, artists and answers to your questions
about: Our platform is made of 2 mobile apps:B2C: the customer facing lifestyle app allows users to seamlessly browse through beauticians' work examples, ask community beauty questions, find existing answers, pin their favourite styles (social posts), interact with other users, as well as find and book services all in one place completely FREE. B2B: the artists’ app allows service providers to share their work examples with anyone on the platform but also list their services, manage bookings, answer people’s questions, & handle payments. In the future they will have an option to write and upload their key service specific guides, blogs, add certifications/diplomas and schedule virtual video appointments with their customers. B2B Target Segment comprises of Beauty & Wellness professionals that will operate as service providers on our platform. Our B2C Segment comprises of females whose age is between 15 - 54, and males 15 - 34. Total Audience 11 – 18.67 million in the UK.

headline: Co-ownership based shared consumption of yachts, planes, cars, homes, vacation homes, hotels, etc
about: We provide a meeting platform to offer listing and matching services of potential co-owners for buying and owning together yachts, jets, pleasure aircraft, luxury cars, race horses, artworks, office buildings, hotels, land parcels, vacation homes, single family homes, etc. In addition, we also provide a co-ownership SaaS property management services to co-owners to manage and schedule the use of their co-owned properties via PBMS. We use the state of the art blockchain and smart contract technologies to track the provenance of the fractional shares of the co-ownership and for the transaction records management. The reward token WCX is currently listed on a few exchanges.

headline: Cutting-edge logistics for e-commerce
about: Ninja Van is on a mission to dominate e-commerce logistics in Southeast Asia. We are one of the fastest growing startups in the region - founded in mid-2014, we have already won over 6,000 merchants and deliver more than 2 million parcels a month across six countries. In Jan 2018, we raised one of the largest Series C rounds ever in Southeast Asia and are well-positioned for our next phase of rapid growth. At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimization, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers. But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry.

headline: Highest performance smart contract blockchain

We are on a mission to enable the next generation of decentralized apps for the next generation of blockchain users—more complex apps requiring higher compute budgets, which provide utility to many more people.

headline: Bring life back to power
about: We believe that technology should be humane and thus our projects whether client-based or proprietary are selected with a view of creating a -positive- impact on society.

headline: Machine Intelligence for Precision Care Delivery
about: Health at Scale is the market leader in precision health -- digital health programs that offer smart, hyper-personalized insights to help individuals choose the best providers, treatments, care settings and lifestyle choices for their unique healthcare needs. Founded by leading machine learning and clinical faculty from MIT, Stanford, Harvard and the University of Michigan, we work with some of the largest payers, employers and providers in the U.S. to improve outcomes, costs, access, and equity for their members. Health at Scale operates some of the largest deployments of AI in healthcare to date, covering millions of lives in production settings. We have been recognized for our innovation and as one of the fastest growing private companies by Forbes, Fast Company, Inc 500, UCSF Digital Health, Becker's, TechCrunch, Bloomberg and MIT News. For more information, please visit our website.

headline: Health navigation infrastructure that powers entry into health ecosystems
about: Clinia enables organizations to leverage first-party health and demographic data to deliver ultra-personalized health navigation, connecting patients into trusted pathways within the health ecosystems of care providers, health systems, insurers, employers, and other health tech startups.

headline: We power high-performance logistics companies with Machine Learning and Computer Vision
about: Logistics contributes to approximately 12% of global GDP. It's a massive industry run on legacy technology, pen and paper, and human intuition. Over the past 4 years, our lean and resourceful team has built a state-of-the-art Machine Vision platform that delivers real improvements in safety, productivity, and quality across our customers. Armed with patience and a laser focus on ROI, we are growing based on revenue from expansions across major logistics organizations in the U.S. Today, our sensors have tracked over 4.4M hours of warehouse activity and processed over 1 Trillion images. We're not a moonshot for a future 15 years from now - we're a business that delivers a valuable solution to an industry that needs us today and our work is already impacting the supply chains of major global corporations. With our business as a foundation and a highly scalable vision platform, we are expanding into new markets, industries, and use cases on our terms and timelines and we're just getting started!

headline: All-in-one CRM for B2B businesses. Easy-to-use and flexible like Excel
about: Orgzit is an enterprise CRM with the flexibility of Excel. Orgzit provides a highly customizable no-low code self-service CRM solution for business managers who find themselves stuck using complex, expensive, and difficult to use software solutions or relying on spreadsheets for various business applications and/or collaboration. All of this is offered as a SaaS solution, so you don't have to install any hardware or software and can go from account creation to using Orgzit CRM in less than 5 minutes.
