headline: A social media platform tailored for gamers to share their short clips
about: Our product is a social media platform that will be available on all mobile and desktop devices. We have designed our platform so that the user experience is as simple as possible for all, no matter the technical expertise, device or console being used. We realise that a large amount of the die hard gamers enjoy live streaming their gameplay on platforms such as Twitch, but there is no home for casual gamers to share their moments quickly and conveniently. This doesn't mean we will be dismissing streamers, we offer a number of features for them to leverage to help them grow their audience and gain more exposure. The Zuvvii platform meets the need of all gamers no matter their experience or expectations. We are currently in the private beta phase.

headline: Search. Find. Hold your place in line with immediate care
about: Quick'rCare is a website that allows patients to find and hold their place in line at an ER, Urgent Care, and Convenient Care facility. The platform allows patients to wait at home when in need of immediate care. The platform also allows healthcare professionals better serve their community with easy access to their facilities and no headache waiting in the waiting room.

about: Tortoise is a mobile application where you can discover, explore, and subscribe to savings plans offered by some of the best brands. E.g. Apple, OnePlus, Canon, etc.

headline: Voice for everyone
about: We developed state of the art text-to-speech technology that creates life-like synthetic voice, from the voices of real people. Our patent-pending technology allows us to recreate any voice imaginable and generate speech with the same pitch, emphasis and intonation as the source speaker - As if they’d spoken it themselves.

headline: Monitor airborne pathogens in real-time
about: Sensio Air is a healthcare analytics company using patented technologies to identify airborne pathogens in real-time. Our devices are used by some of the world's largest companies to detect and identify particles like mold, pollen, dander, dust-mites and also inorganic particles. Paired with a dashboard or mobile application, Sensio Air allows people with allergies, asthma or individuals at risk to understand the air they breathe and to predict, prevent and manage their symptoms.

headline: GlobeSisters is the first safe homestay for women travelers
about: Technology: We have a platform to connect trusted hosts and travelers. We are building a website as well as a mobile application. We are also developing an AI algorithm to match the perfect travelers.

headline: Scaling word of mouth for any business
about: Referral Rock is a referral marketing software service that helps online and offline businesses get more customers by using the power of their own network. We are a scrappy self-funded company that has built up a book of over 1000 paying customers by building a customer driven product. Every successful business knows that relationships are one of a business’s most valuable assets. Our vision is that businesses should nurture all their relationships (not just ones driving towards a sale) and make word of mouth a channel for growth.

headline: ZuPay is India’s Premier Investing & Learning Platform for Teens
about: ZuPay is India’s premier investing and banking platform for teenagers, helping them to understand personal finance at an early age. We achieve this by allowing them to learn, invest, save, and spend, all under parental oversight when in their adolescence. Then provides a complete personalised banking and investing experience once their customers turn 18 years of age. Zupay believes that teaching teenagers at an early stage can change the nature of investing forever. Their vision is to establish a community of educated retail investors within the next-gen India.

headline: Powering public mobility
about: At Via, we're on the cutting edge of mobility. We’re building revolutionary technology that’s changing the way people get around. It's on-demand transit on a mass scale, a smarter transportation that’s friendly to our planet. From on-demand autonomous shuttles in Australia to dynamically routed bus fleets in Singapore, our sophisticated operating system is powering transportation in the world’s biggest cities and is sought after by prominent transportation players globally. We’ve provided more than 50 million shared rides already, and we’re growing at an astonishing rate. We have offices in more than 15 countries and deployments in more than 50 markets, with a goal of hundreds of deployments within the next two years. If you’re someone who relishes wearing multiple hats, never backs down from a challenge, and loves getting things done, we’d love to hear from you!

headline: Next-gen wearable for active older adults
about: Silvertree is on a mission to inspire the world’s aging population. We are developing next-gen wearable technology that provides the right form of safety and connection for active older adults. Aging is a personal experience, yet aging with dignity and independence so often includes the caring involvement of family and loved ones. That is why we are designing a stylish, wrist-worn wearable that is built for safety and deeply rooted in human connection, across generations. We aim to be the consumer brand associated with vitality, style, and independence for the growing population of fifty-five million Americans ages sixty-five and beyond.

headline: Bringing high-quality veterinary professionals together at the click of a button
about: Roo's technology platform enables hospitals to fulfill short-term veterinary staffing needs in real time, while allowing high-quality veterinary professionals to secure relief work at the click of a button. Each member provides information on service needs, skills and personal preferences, ensuring full transparency and the most accurate matching of users. Beyond the platform, Roo represents a growing community of smart, trustworthy, agile, and resilient vet industry professionals who value flexibility and work-life balance in addition to providing the best possible outcomes for clients and their pets.

headline: A data engine, which provides businesses high quality data for ad platforms
about: The mable data engine, which provides advertisers high quality data for ad platforms and data warehouses. The mable data engine enables our customers to have 100% correct numbers in Your Facebook Ad Manager. Our customers are everyone who is running ads online.

headline: Mobile Hiring Community
about: Apploi is the first ever hiring community focused on the retail, service and support industries. We have a mobile-first solution that makes it easy for job seekers to apply to jobs directly from a mobile device, the web, or any of our public and private tablet Kiosks, where candidates can showcase their personality via video and audio application questions. We believe that for retail and services jobs, the traditional resume & cover letter is irrelevant – but what is truly important is the jobseeker's personality, loyalty, and passion for the job. We work with over 6,000 companies ranging in size from Fortune 500 brands to hundreds of small and medium sized businesses, reducing the cost and increasing the efficiency and quality of their hourly hiring. Apploi sits at the point of initial capture, making it easy for both active and passive job seekers to connect with employers. Along with different filters and screening tools, brands can also use video and audio questions upfront.

We’re also available at Amazon, Flipkart, eBay, Wayfair and SE Asia’s largest company, Shopee. Cover Genius’ vision is to protect all the customers of the world’s largest online companies through XCover, an award-winning global distribution platform for any line of insurance or warranty, with an API for instant claims payments that holds an industry-leading NPS of +65‡. headline: Connecting blockchain to state and federal courts
about: Jurat (or JTC) is a consumer protection version of Bitcoin that provides additional transaction versatility under the auspices of a court. When you transact in JTC, you can recover your funds in the event of fraud or mistake, similarly to using a credit card. Jurat Escrow Wrappers let you safely escrow coins without a custodian. The coins stay put until both parties agree and, if they cannot agree, the court takes over to decide everyone’s legal rights. The best part is that no one has to give up their private key.

headline: To offer Green Alternatives to Bath & Kitchen products made from plastic

We then split that commission with our users, sending bitcoin to their Lolli wallets. Lolli is on a mission to make bitcoin more accessible to all.

headline: Redefining How We Manage the Built Environment
about: Welcome to Cyvl! We are a fast-paced, venture-backed tech company based in Somerville, MA, just a few minutes from downtown Boston, that is growing at an incredible rate. We are always looking for passionate, curious, and talented individuals to join our growing team. Check out our open positions below and feel free to shoot us a note with any questions at careers@cyvl.ai.

headline: Reversing Metabolic Diseases with Lifestyle Medicine
about: Metabolic disease caused by insulin resistance is responsible for millions of deaths by diseases like heart disease, type 2 diabetes, hypertension, and more. The latest CDC estimates that there are over 100 million people in the US who are type 2 diabetic, or pre-diabetic. Most of these cases are preventable and reversible through what the medical industry is calling lifestyle medicine—prescribed lifestyle changes which improve medical outcomes. After our CEO saw the power of lifestyle medicine first-hand, we decided to build Blueberry an application which helps people reverse their metabolic disease through key lifestyle changes. There's over 50 years of solid science in the field which supports our protocol, and our challenge is to solve the adherence problem. Our mission is to reverse 1 million cases of metabolic disease by 2025. If you're passionate about health, saving lives, and doing work that truly matters, then we encourage you to join Blueberry.

headline: Building the Operating System for Renewable Energy
about: Almost everyone who will buy a solar plant in the 21st century has never bought one before. An average user does not have the past experience, the technical know how or even the financial support required to make this once in a lifetime purchase. Once the purchase has been made, this lack of experience and know how makes it difficult for the user to then get the maximum value out of their power plant. SafEarth has been built to bridge this gap. We operate an online platform that digitises the entire lifecycle of a solar plant - allowing users to get the best possible value out of their shift to clean energy. Our platform hand holds a user through the procurement, installation and maintenance phases of a solar project. This allows a user to get the highest possible return on investment from these assets while reducing the challenges and hassles faced by users. Our users are also able to raise low cost finance for their projects on our platform. Till date (May 2021), SafEarth platform has completed nearly 40MWs of solar projects for industries around the country. Today, these plants are saving nearly 70,000 Tonnes of Carbon emissions every year and saving our customers over Rs 12cr. in annual electricity expenditures.

RacerX has solved this problem by creating the Snap4that app. Snap4that replaces the pile of paper that accompanies these products (owners guides, setup guides, warranty cards, parts & accessories catalogs) with a simple app. All the consumer needs to do is to download the app and use it to scan a barcode included with the product. The consumer benefits by getting a better ownership experience by having up-to-date multimedia content where they need it, when they need it with no need to search a junk drawer or on google. The brand benefits by capturing consumer contact info, what they bought while also saving money and the environment by reducing paper waste.

headline: Conversational Data Cloud
about: We are on a mission to decipher language, which is the most complex type of data that ever existed. Dashbot is a data platform that ingests, cleans, stores, and processes any type of Conversation Data, such as speaking to Alexa, talking to a customer service rep over the phone, or typing to a chatbot on a website. While virtually every other field/application of A.I. is trying to understand the world around us (e.g. computer vision), Dashbot is a data platform that is harnessing the power of Conversational AI to understand the world within us (i.e. intention). Today, we’re using our platform to help businesses automate, analyze and optimize their conversation channels — but in the future, we see a world where we can help enrich conversations any time any human (or machine) says any thing to any one.

headline: Secure communications software company
about: Blinkly is a technology company focused on privatizing the basic utilities of the internet. Our flagship product is a quantum-resistant, end-to-end encrypted, email service that allows users to communicate securely in vulnerable environments without the risk of Microsoft or Google reading your email, creating psychometric profiles, and selling your data to third parties. Blinkly is a stand-alone web application that communicates with all other email systems enabling users to have full control of their email with innovative features such as: quantum-resistant encryption of all data including attachments, secure reply-all, custom password protection, expiration timer, and the option to expunge sent emails preventing the recipient from viewing the email. Moreover, Blinkly email never lives on third-party servers regardless of the recipient’s email service provider.

headline: Making NFTs safe, secure and legal
about: Monax Labs is a web3 studio on a mission to ensure that NFT infrastructure is safe, secure, and legal. We are a company that builds at the intersection of NFT infrastructure and legal technology. Our unique solutions address the legal gaps associated with NFTs. Aspen - NFT's your way Unlock Web3 with Aspen, a revolutionary NFT minting, management and transactional platform with integrated legal contracting.Built by web3 infrastructure studio Monax Labs, Aspen provides new pathways for individuals and organizations to protect and enforce digital property rights by synthesizing existing IP and legal contracts into NFT transactions.Aspen’s robust tech stack delivers an unparalleled collection of enterprise-grade NFT and legal tech tools to empower brands, enterprises, creators and enthusiasts to engage with NFTs on their own terms — legal or otherwise. The Open Legal Layer Monax Labs is pioneering a set of technical standards for NFTs that address legal issues. By addressing these issues, the standards will be able to extend many traditional property rights into digital domains. The standards will be open for anyone to utilize within their platforms. The initial effort is focused on three areas: IP protection, possession versus ownership, and the ability to assert title over NFTs.

headline: Developing Technology to Create Net-Zero Concrete
tags: 5% by CO2 sequestration using our process,
20% CO2 mitigation by cement reduction (our concrete is 100% stronger so less cement is needed)
about: Our innovation is the new process of CO2 sequestration into concrete. The innovative and novel part of our technology are the carriers, the loading, transfer and reaction methodology in concrete to enhance its properties by permanently storing CO2 in concrete. In our process the CO2 chemically reacts (is mineralised) with concrete - calcium hydroxide converts to calcium carbonate. This process occurs naturally, however, it takes 100 years to saturate, and we reduce it to 100 hours. C4C’s technology locks down the CO2 in concrete permanently even after demolition of buildings. Technology innovation lies in the CO2 carriers that are made from waste materials that are currently landfilled or burnt. For our Gen I technology, we reduce the concrete CO2 emission by 25%: Long term goal - 70% cheaper and 100% greener concrete.

But unlike other SMBs, they lack the tools and systems needed to understand the ins and outs of their business. Instead, they're forced to work with a disparate array of expensive services or contractors to manage their finances, their taxes, their payroll, their savings and more. Not only is this outside their area of expertise — every hour spent wrangling finances or filling out forms is one less hour spent providing care. By creating the financial back office for therapists, we empower them with the clarity needed to be a successful business, allowing them to better serve their clients. headline: Collective intelligence to fight financial crime
about: VeraDAT develops expertise-driven solutions to combat fraud, money laundering and financing of terrorism. Currently, financial institutions have limited access to the information needed to tackle financial crime. Data silos make client-risk assessments both difficult and time-consuming as key data is scattered between financial institutions. This can be clearly seen in the example of private watchlists, whose non-public nature allows financial criminals to migrate between institutions even after being detected by one. To address this problem VeraDAT introduces VeraHIT - a collaborative platform that enables privacy-friendly data matching for financial institutions. VeraHIT enables financial institutions to access clients’ background information that before would have remained undetected due to fear of revealing its source or exposing sensitive data. Our matching process uses the latest cryptographic protocols to keep the source of the information private.

headline: Looking for a Technical Co-founder for Stealth Cybersecurity SaaS Startup
about: For what it's worth, I have started, grown, and sold two cybersecurity businesses. We are building a stealth cybersecurity SaaS B2B product to compete in the GRC (Governance, Risk Management & Compliance) automation space. With digital transformation on the rise, the attack surface continues to broaden. Because everyone knows there is no such thing as 100% secure, businesses have to be able to tell their cybersecurity program "story", and make certain that their "story" is defensible. When you combine the $3.4T (yes trillion) digital transformation space with the problem of the cybersecurity talent shortage, the opportunity is immense, to say the least. In addition to this opportunity, the current incumbent products leave lots of room for improvement. While they battle to become the biggest unicorn, we intend to fly under the radar, building a better product and targeting clients we've been working with for years that are willing to pilot the MVP. Our intent is to exit within 3 to 5 years.

headline: KYC and fraudulent document detection. Detecting and monitoring deepfakes
about: Our MissionFounded in late 2018, Sensity is the world’s first visual threat intelligence company. Our mission is to defend individuals and organizations against the threats posed by deepfakes and other forms of malicious visual media. What Are Visual Threats?Our digital world is saturated with visual media. New forms of synthetic media, such as deepfakes, as well as sophisticated tools for manipulating images and videos present malicious actors with powerful new capabilities for deploying cyber, disinformation, and reputation attacks. These new visual threats present serious risks to individuals, brands, and organizations. Our TechnologySensity’s AI technologies provide our customers with a powerful defence against weaponised deepfakes and other visual threats by combining deepfake detection with advanced monitoring capabilities. MonitoringOur monitoring technology intercepts visual threats targeting individuals and organizations in real-time, with instant customer alerts providing detailed threat analysis and severity assessments. DetectionOur proprietary detection API combines the latest advances in computer vision and video forensics to provide customers with accurate and scalable deepfake detection capabilities for a wide range of critical applications.

The US has the worst maternal health outcomes and highest cost of care of any developed country, and we’re on a mission to change that. When families join June, they get paired with 5-7 other families in their June Circle. Our group matching algorithm is designed to drive connection and encourage peer-to-peer support, especially important in a time when families feel more isolated than ever. We’ve supported hundreds of families to date and have an NPS of 86, 10x better than the average NPS of a healthcare provider. We’ve made major traction in the healthcare ecosystem and have a growing relationship with a health system with access to 6.5M patients and conversations underway with payors. We’re excited to build a revolutionary digital platform for maternal health just as Noom, Omada, and Livongo built digital tools for weight loss, diabetes, and behavior change. headline: With our flagship product Kubecost, we empower teams to optimize their Kubernetes at scale
about: Kubecost is built by a team of ex-Google cloud engineers / product managers that came together after seeing the challenges from managing microservice-based infrastructure at scale. Our team is committed to open source, and loves creating software and advising teams directly. Reach out if you want to talk shop! Stackwatch has expanded the capabilities of its Kubecost tool beyond the management and monitoring of cost and capacity in Kubernetes environments. Kubecost, launched last year, has now gained the capacity to give visibility into spending on cloud services outside of Kubernetes clusters, the company announced. With this step, Kubecost gives users a single view into both Kubernetes and “out of cluster” spending on cloud resources. “Kubecost’s new unified cost view allows users to see the complete picture, combining in-cluster spend on nodes, disks, and more with out-of-cluster spend on external services like AWS S3 and RDS,” said Webb Brown, CEO and co-founder of Stackwatch. “For the first time, engineering, finance, and leadership can get complete visibility across their infrastructure in less than five minutes.”

headline: Behavior-based, dynamic pricing for healthcare
about: Sempre Health is bringing dynamic pricing to healthcare, beginning with medications. Today, we work with health plans and pharma manufacturers to dynamically adjust copays based on individual adherence and behavior, seamlessly at the point of fill. Patients who take their medications regularly cost the health system significantly less. Sempre shares these savings with patients by allowing them to pay less when they do the right things for their health. This means you can bring your own costs down over time. Sempre enables long-term behavior change and saves healthcare dollars, while addressing affordability in a unique way. We parse millions of prescription records to predict the right price, for the right patient, at the right time. Then our data integrations deliver that price at any pharmacy in the US. Via SMS, patients have access to their discounts, why they got those discounts and guidance on how to improve their health. Be aware of recruiter fraud- only apply directly here!

headline: A millimeter wave wireless product company

We are pioneers of millimeter wave phased array technology with international patents granted on our technology. Our key offering in satcom is a multi-beam ground terminal that operates in Ku/Ka-band with complete electronic steerability. GigaSat will serve the need for low-cost user terminals required by LEO/MEO satellite constellations and for mobility terminals for GEO satellites. We are also pioneering the W-band satellite communication payload technology to help significantly reduce the CAPEX cost of LEO/MEO constellations. Astrome’s products is being deployed by Indian Army, Indian Navy and the Department of Telecommunication for the BharatNet project. At Astrome, we develop hardware and software from scratch. headline: Our Vision: To enable a sustainable food system
about: The global food system connects 570M farms to 8B consumers and is the most important, complex structure on earth. But with growing populations and no system alignment or technology, it's under extreme stress. To cope, intermediary players (brokers, importers, etc.) manage only their part of the supply chain. These silos lead to a wasteful food system - a driver of climate change. Choco's here to provide the technology required for a connected, wasteless, data-driven, and innovative food system. We’re here to lead a change in one of the oldest industries on the planet, not just take part in it. We’re here to shape, not to observe. The problem we’re solving is complex with many moving parts, the work we’re doing is difficult and ambitious. But we’re here to win. That’s why we need the absolute best people to help us get there. Choco was founded by serial entrepreneurs Daniel Khachab, Julian Hammer, and Grégoire Ambroselli. Since its founding in 2018, the company has grown rapidly and is now active in markets such as the U.S., Germany, France, Spain, Austria, and Belgium. In February 2022, the total value of goods traded through Choco exceeded $1.2 billion. In April of 2022, we gained another $111 million in Series B2 funding with a valuation of $1.2 billion - earning us unicorn status just a few years in.

headline: Serverless Cloud Operating System
about: Convex's mission is to fundamentally change how software is built on the Internet and who gets to build it. We aim to empower teams, large or small, to build fast, reliable, and dependable dynamic systems at scale. Developers shouldn't have to form an opinion on Alpine Linux vs. Ubuntu or have the slightest idea how to configure Kafka. We believe with the right abstractions, it's possible to develop sophisticated apps entirely on your laptop, deploy them seamlessly on managed backends, and head out to dinner—confident your application will run identically in production at scale. No DevOps. This is the fulfillment of the exciting new serverless movement, and we're going to make it happen. Our team includes Principal Engineers and Engineering Directors who have led exabyte-scale storage projects, built custom global databases with trillions of records, and shipped desktop and mobile software onto billions of devices. All of us have deep experience with managing critical shared user state in large, successful services. Now, together at Convex, we've reflected on those collective lessons, and we have asked, listened, and learned about the needs of modern web and mobile teams. We've started to create something we believe is an entirely new and substantially better platform for teams of the future. We're eager to create the solution we wished we'd had for all those tricky frontend and backend problems we've wrestled to the ground over the years. We're motivated by the prospect of a new wave of teams using Convex and excited to empower them to solve challenges that only recently were quite daunting.

headline: We Step in When Robots Get Confused
about: At Cognicept, we provide hybrid robotics AI with our Smart+ telerobotic intervention technology and remote robot pilots. Our supervised autonomy products make unpredictable applications reliable and enable use cases that were previously impossible.Cognicept solves reliability issues for robotic systems. Reliability of machine intelligence, which is at the heart of robotic systems, is poor when applied in unstructured environments and loosely defined processes. This requires users to either employ onsite staff to oversee failure-correction or forgo the desired solution entirely. Customer applications are often abandoned due to these low reliabilities. This results in end users forfeiting the value robots provide and system integrators avoiding large segments of the potential market. Cognicept is a service enabled by a middleware solution which is offered via system integrators and OEMs.

headline: Share your life journey and help accelerate the world progress
about: Before i got my actual name 'Journey' the actual journey of how my name evolved and how i developed an identity is an interesting story. I was going to be named Uplift, Mutually, United, Together and what not. But when my actual mission was being ideated upon, Journey was something which resonated the most. Because i'm all about that; About connecting people who are on this life's journey together, trying out new things, exploring themselves. While i was growing up, many people questioned how was i different than others. And my answer was always the same - that i was about the process. The goal is the outcome of the process, and while my fellow friends (Facebook and Instagram) were about sharing your achievements, showcase your life at best - i was about showcasing your life as it goes through, with the people who could understand. I was more real. I was about the journey, and my mission was to bring people in this journey together, give them an environment which motivates them to pursue their interests and move forward. I am on a mission to bring this connected but still disconnected world closer. Because i believe that when people collaborate & connect, it gives birth to new ideas and innovation. I aim to create journeys for us humans to advance forward faster, while bringing out the best in all.

headline: We are building a supercomputer-on-chip for next-gen AI & robotic workloads
about: We are in the midst of a massive shift in how we write software, from human-driven to data-driven. Data-driven software, or software 2.0, will allow us to realize the true benefits of intelligent robots through deep learning, continual learning, and #reinforcement learning approaches. However, to fully realize these benefits we need a ground up reimagining of computer hardware to make them data & AI centric, and deliver super-computer level performance in the power envelope of the edge. At Lemurian Labs our purpose is to create better hardware and systems using a software-first approach that enables roboticists and ML engineers to do more, to free them from their computational burdens, and make it easier to get models into production so that society can benefit from more capable & intelligent robots sooner. We are developing the SPU (Spatial Processing Unit), an affordable AI inference accelerator uniquely designed from the ground up to deliver unprecedented performance/watt (up to 20X that of a GPU) and enable the next generation of AI workloads at the edge, ranging from autonomous vehicles, unmanned aerial vehicles, industrial robots, healthcare robots, search and rescue robots, to space robots. The SPU utilizes our patent pending novel arithmetic to speed up matrix-vector computations - which are core to modern day AI - beyond the capabilities of ordinary fixed point cores. Our diverse team of technologists have decades of experience at the frontiers of asic design, high performance computing, digital arithmetic, cryptography, artificial intelligence, robotics, and networking. If you want to be a part of bringing the powers of deep learning to the masses, join us. We look forward to hearing from you soon! :)

headline: We are defining the future of ADHD treatment using data, game design and medical excellence
about: At Eachday, our mission is to transform the mental health space by providing people with the tools and education necessary to self-manage their ADHD, along with destigmatizing how we perceive neurological disorders. To achieve this, we are building an app at the nexus of psychology, personalization, and engaging digital product design. Our team has a deeply personal relationship with mental health. Pair this with the lack of successful digital self-management tools publicly available, and we are determined to create something meaningful that would improve the lives of millions struggling with ADHD. We're eager to show the world that, when successfully managed, ADHD is not a hindrance, but instead a potential asset to professional and creative environments. We want to transform the narrative from self-doubt to self-empowerment, tackling the stigma behind ADHD. The following values steer every step of how we build our products, engage with the ADHD community, and grow our team of ADHD experts: • Education Over Medication: Help people understand their disorder and teach skills that cause lasting change, with or without medication. • Challenge The Status Quo: Find ways to make it better, cheaper, more fun, and accessible, despite what the industry is doing or telling us to do. • Break Financial Barriers: Provide solutions that are affordable and relevant for people of all socioeconomic backgrounds. • Your Data, Not Ours: While data is necessary to provide relevant services, we provide people with the ability to easily govern their private information. • Work Can Be Fun: We enjoy building products, strategies, and relationships, and believe joy comes from the journey. • Embrace Diversity: We believe diverse perspectives lead to better products and yearn for diversity of all kinds. After all, neurodiversity is core to our mission!

In Q3 2021, we closed a US$27 million Series A funding round led by Valar Ventures, and we’re currently looking to double our team to over 150 members by the end of Q2 2022. headline: AI-powered air quality platform
about: WHO reports that last year alone 7 million people died all over the world as a result of air pollution exposure. Air quality can be dramatically different in a few kilometeres from you and it can change rapidly throughout the day.Airly builds networks of air quality sensors that can be deployed across entire cities or counties. The technology enables real-time monitoring of air quality via an online map.Our mission is to build a dense network of sensors that will increase people’s awareness of what we breathe in everyday. It will also help identify sources of problems and their exact locations.The Airly platform allows you to monitor air quality for each location equipped with a sensor. The application presents real-time data, so the information about the air in a specific location is easily accessible and always up to date.

headline: Scaling E2E encryption with personal, private servers

headline: To offer the most intuitive user interface for generating complex data-driven charts and slides
about: think-cell is the leading developer of graphics software to improve professional slide production in Microsoft PowerPoint. Our software automates the creation of charts and layouts to make working with PowerPoint easier, faster, and more enjoyable. More than 750,000 users worldwide at 15,000 companies rely on our software for their daily business, because it allows them to produce perfectly placed great-looking charts within minutes. Among our customers are not only 8 of the top 10 consulting companies, but also 65 of the top 100 US blue chip companies and 9 of the top 10 business schools. Without the think-cell software, creating slides in Microsoft PowerPoint is painstaking. Frequently used chart types and graphical elements are missing and there is nearly no automatic placement. Usually, you end up manually updating numbers and pushing around shapes. think-cell puts an end to this. While users comfortably work in your familiar PowerPoint environment it brings them 40+ chart types like Waterfall, Gantt, Marimekkos and Agenda. It also comes with dozens of data-driven visual enhancements and other unique features. Meanwhile, our software is smoothly integrated within the PowerPoint ribbon and 100% compatible. Charts created with our software and shared with pure PowerPoint users remain data-driven and changeable as if they had been created with standard PowerPoint. And it saves time: A study with one of the leading consulting firms proved that using the think-cell software saves you 70% of your net working time. "Thank you, think-cell, for sponsoring the Standard C++ Foundation and challenging our Microsoft compiler team with complex C++ code"​, says Herb Sutter, President of the Standard C++ Foundation. think-cell is based in the heart of Germany’s capital, Berlin. Computer Science PhDs Markus Hannebauer and Arno Schödl founded the company in 2002 and are still managing it today.

headline: Building the first consumer driven auction to sell cars directly to dealerships

Our mission is to enable people to get the best price for their vehicle and give dealers access to an entirely new, improved way of acquiring cars and customers. The average price difference between highest and lowest offer for cars is over 35%, which means consumers need to have an easy way to get competitive bids while saving them tons of time. The difference can mean thousands of dollars. And dealerships need ways to acquire more cars and customers in a new way. Our solution enables them to set the prices, compete for customers in any location, close with the highest rate in the market, and only pay when a deal is done. This is not your usual startup trying to solve Silicon Valley problems — we are focused on providing elegant solutions to an outdated and underserved $2T+ market that is ripe for disruption. We’ve raised a seed round from Crosslink Capital, a top tier investor behind companies like Chime, Casper, Pandora, and Postmates. headline: ChargeLab builds an open software platform for managing EV charging stations

Electric vehicles are a breakthrough exponential technology. But our electric grid is not ready for the mass adoption of EVs. EVs will double electricity consumption around the world in the next two decades. This is a billion dollar problem. While others focus on electric vehicle charging hardware, we are focused entirely on software and data. Our software connects to EV chargers to gather usage data, manage electricity loads, and act as a platform for payments and transactions. We are the common language spoken between charging stations, vehicles, and the grid. In the future, when all energy is renewable and all vehicles are connected, we will be the hub for communication, transactions, and data.

headline: THE WORLD'S RELIABLE DATABASE
about: We accelerate our customers' DX with our reliable data management.To achieve that, we provide two core general-purpose database middleware, Scalar DB and Scalar DL, and several domain-specific applications/middleware that directly solves customers' pain points. Scalar DB is a universal transaction manager that addresses the transaction consistency challenges that arise when multiple separate databases need to interact. Scalar DB is open-sourced under Apache 2 license and is now listed in the database category of CNCF Landscape. Scalar DL is Byzantine-fault detection middleware that addresses the accountability challenges when digitizing data. Scalar DL is available under a commercial license; however, its internal mechanism is explained in an academic paper (VLDB'22).

headline: Inviting the world to celebrate the legacy of soju

An embodiment of Korean culture, then and now. Soju has been the #1 selling spirit in the world over the past two decades. Yet they have been predominantly distributed in Koreatowns (i.e. kbbq restaurants) and consumed in the affordable 13-24% ABV form of soju. Xoju is here to redefine what a Korean spirit is by bringing a top shelf, 40% ABV product to a western world, where there is zero representation of eastern spirits in liquor. Our mission is to bring Eastern representation in liquor to the West, celebrate the legacy of our heritage, and bridge the gap in both cultures. We're led by former founders, creatives and media personalities and backed by a stellar group of angels, strategics and operators. To learn more, visit xoju.com

headline: We're a 100% free apartment locating service. We help people find a space to be themselves
about: We are a free apartment locating service. How exactly is it free? Here’s the breakdown—apartment management companies are looking for qualified renters to live at their property. Empty units cost them a TON of money. Enter: Smart City Locating. Our job as an apartment locating service is to help clients find the perfect place to live. Properties pay locators a commission out of their marketing budget for referring renters their way. We need an income, clients need a place to live, and properties need tenants. It’s a win-win-win! What is an Apartment Locator? An apartment locator is a licensed real estate agent that specializes in finding apartments for renters. Renting is a quicker process than buying and a renter will likely ask for help finding their next place when their lease ends. This pipeline-building process is a great first step into residential real estate— Smart City provides the opportunity to build your client network, to be ready when your renter is ready to buy a home. How It All Started:Smart City started in 2013 as a small apartment locating service in Dallas, Texas. In the early days, our founder and CEO Cassie Brown just wanted to help her friends find great places to live, but her innate drive to offer an amazing client experience quickly set Smart City apart from the competition. Since then, Smart City has taken big strides to disrupt the real estate industry by becoming a trusted and preferred partner for property management companies. We've cultivated a highly targeted lead generation engine that generates qualified rental leads to our team of licensed real estate agents across eight markets. Our agents put clients' needs first, delivering a personalized list of apartments to bring highly-interested and qualified traffic through the doors of our property partners. We are growing and looking for more agents to join our team to launch their real estate careers and grow their client-base into residential real estate.

headline: Decentralized Social media and ecommerce of the metaverse
about: We're working on a decentralized social media network that combines the best elements of Instagram, Tiktok, and Reddit, as well as a tip-based system that allows users to reward content creators directly with crypto. As a result, unlike centralized networks like Facebook and Twitter, activity on these platforms is stored in an irreversible way on a decentralized system that no central authority can administer or monitor. There is also a Web3 e-commerce store, like Amazon, and implementing crypto purchases that allow users to buy different products from books, electronics, clothing to footwear using their crypto all the payment is done on the blockchain which allows users not just to use their cryptos for investment but also to buy different products with it that will in return increase the usability of cryptocurrency globally as a currency to buy sell goods. We've also introduced NFTs, as well as a marketplace where they can create and sell NFTs that aren't available on any other social networking sites. There will also be a flurry of blockchain-based games in which players may earn crypto and NFTS just by playing. As a result of these steps, our platform's engagement will increase, distinguishing us from other web2 social media sites. In Vennverse, users have more authority and autonomy Because conventional social platforms place a premium on generating revenue, they have complete control over not just what users write, but also what they see. As a result, they show customers attention-getting advertising content, rather than educating them. Users on Vennverse, on the other hand, have complete freedom to link whatever they want because developers often just provide guiding parameters, leaving the rest to a distributed community of users. While reactionary and hostile remarks are discouraged, features encourage intelligent content, charity, and self-awareness.

We are looking to fast-track this change with our SaaS-based application, tailor-made to address the needs of modern and sustainable farms with soilless and precision farming techniques like Hydroponics, Aquaponics and Aeroponics. headline: Data science to drive clean mobility uptake
about: Green Light Labs (GLL) is an early stage startup working to prevent a gigaton of carbon emissions from entering the atmosphere (that’s a lot!). We are developing consumer- and fleet-facing software solutions to help individuals choose the greenest mobility options for their lifestyles and budgets. Our team believes that our society is at a crossroads and we must choose to take a strong stance against climate change now. At GLL we want to empower every car buyer, driver, and traveller with the tools and technology necessary to be a part of the solution. GLL is a spin-out from the US Department of Energy’s Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, which is home to over 13 Nobel prizes and is one of the most prestigious research institutions in the US. headline: Buy Now, Pay Later

When you pay with Sezzle, your purchase is split into four equal, interest-free installments automatically scheduled over the next six weeks. It's a financially responsible way to pay over time and build credit. Because 67% of consumers under the age of 30 have sub- or non-prime credit scores, we use a proprietary algorithm over traditional credit checks to determine credit worthiness, enabling more consumers to get approved.

(This is not an actual currency or an NFT, but simply a brand for financial amounts.) What does it help customers do? The platform also helps businesses struggling with in-store sales gain more transactions by allowing them to register and track their deliveries in a similar fashion to what food delivery couriers do for restaurants. Though the majority of our Mates use their own vehicles for deliveries, we offer the resources to train first-timers on how to act independently and rent their vehicles and equipment. Mates are hired on a contractual basis and accept jobs based on their availability through MoveMate’s specialized Mate platform, which grants them significant work flexibility. MoveMate’s platform was launched in late April 2019 and has since helped over 380 customers in Montréal and generated close to $100K in revenue. headline: AI Assisted Automated Security Incident Response
about: DTonomy solves a critical problem facing Security teams today: too many alerts and incidents that exceed the capacity of skilled professionals to investigate and resolve them. Organizations today have hundreds to thousands of daily alerts from hundreds of sources and these numbers will only continue to grow. Most organizations are short staffed which results in inconsistent investigation processes, high mean time to response, increased risk and analyst burnout. DTonomy’s Assisted Incident Response platform (AIR) orchestrates hundreds of internal and external data sources and tools into a single platform, and leverages automation and artificial intelligence to enable analysts to triage all alarms and threats, not just the highest rated or most critical, without additional investment in resource. AIR’s unique adaptive learning engine continuously learns, provides contextual insights that are not easily discoverable, and makes relevant recommendations and automated workflows to guide IT teams through steps and procedures, resulting in up to 10 times quicker resolution of incidents, decreased downtime, and reduced alert fatigue for staff.

headline: Full-stack Identity platform: Authentication, Verification, Fraud prevention
about: Bureau is a first-of-its-kind trust network that delivers unprecedented trust and security to businesses and consumers. Think of us as a one-stop platform that helps businesses automate their decisions, prevent fraud, and power seamless user experiences. With Bureau, onboarding good customers, starting a new e-commerce business, setting up a gaming company and transacting in cryptocurrencies is as easy as shopping on Amazon. Bureau provides an accurate and comprehensive picture of each of your customers, so that you can confidently transact without fear of fraud. The ramifications of online fraud can be devastating for both businesses and the consumers they serve. Businesses add more friction points which leads to a frustrating user experience for consumers which in turn leads to lower conversions and more dropouts. It’s a vicious cycle. We believe that good customers should never be made to jump through verification hoops. We make it easy for companies to remove friction and serve their customers, while keeping bad actors out. Our platform takes the complexity out of identity verification and can easily be integrated with your backend. By combining ease of integration with a depth of functionality, we are able to provide a solution that can overcome the challenges of sophisticated online frauds. Whether you are a big fintech firm or a small e-commerce startup, our solution simplifies identity verification and fraud prevention so that you can focus on what matters: growth.

headline: Funding the millennial generation
about: Pave is a marketplace lender focused on providing credit to the millennial generation. We allow individuals to borrow money to fund their career and financial development. Our loans are 2 and 3 year installment loans and range from $3,000 to $25,000 with interest rates starting as low as 6%. Millennial's, those aged 20 - 35 years old account for the largest segment of the US population and number approximately 80mm. Since 2008 and the financial crisis a huge amount of these individuals have been unable to access affordable credit due to the regulatory changes and due to having a "thin credit file". Its therefore not surprising that this generation has a fundamental mistrust of the banking system. We've developed a unique algorithm that lets us lend to these thin files on an attractive risk adjusted basis. Further, by personalizing the user experience, adding transparency to the process and a heightened sense of customer service we're already seeing a great reaction to our product.

headline: Hyre is a digital HR platform moving the industry to the 21st century
about: Our mission is to help managers of shift workers with their daily HR needs. These managers struggle with internal and external staffing issues that are extremely costly to their businesses. So, as HR professionals ourselves, we decided to do something! Hyre is a comprehensive HR platform that helps businesses of all sizes, across different industries, manage their shift-based workforce by providing the tools that enable them to thrive, including employee shift scheduling, automated timesheets, digital time clocks, team messaging, and a built-in temp staffing pool. But how did we get here?? Well... Hyre started as a hospitality platform aimed at transforming how event organizers (hotels and event venues) staff their events. Traditionally, when event organizers are short-staffed (which is 30-50% of the time), they call a traditional staffing agency that charges them an arm and a leg for staff who are getting paid minimum wage. These agencies operate in a manual fashion that results in poor quality, high costs, and unreliability to the event organizers. This is just 1 example of how the hospitality world is currently riddled with mundane processes that cost end users billions in inefficiencies, time, and human error. By creating a platform that allowed hospitality professionals to take control of their own staffing, Hyre was able to reduce our clients' costs by a minimum of 50%! But we didn't want to stop there... So, we expanded into new verticles (internal scheduling software) and industries (healthcare, logistics, etc). **Who do we work with? We currently work with high-end clients such as the Hilton, Delta, Westin, Marriott, Ritz Carleton, Compass Group, Sodexo, Extendicare, etc., across Ontario. And... how big is this problem? HUGEOur temp-staffing solution is tackling a $300 Billion problem, our extended solution is tackling an additional $30 Billion problem. **We are building a suite of products that are taking on giants like ADP and Ceridian.

That’s why we’re on a mission to build an on-demand healthcare ecosystem for the global transgender and non-binary community, so that they can start when they’re ready, be more in control of their gender journey from the start, and no one acts as the gatekeepers of their gender identity. GenderGP Business Values: // Customer-obsessed: We design, develop and deliver extraordinary services, content & communications to help our patients, clients, readers, subscribers and listeners achieve their goals. // Growth-focused: We are committed to learning and developing both professionally and personally so we show up as the best in the world as what we do. // Resourceful: We know that our ability to succeed depends on our resourcefulness, not our resources.// Fearless: We are bold, brave, and fearless in pursuit of our mission.

headline: Growing delicious fruit by pushing the boundaries of indoor vertical farming
about: At Oishii, we grow the best fruit in the world by deploying ground-breaking vertical farming technology that pushes the boundaries of agriculture. We’re the first in the world to grow fruit in an indoor vertical farm at commercial scale. We started with strawberries, which we debuted at Chef’s Table at Brooklyn Fare, the three star Michelin restaurant considered by critics to be among the best in the world. Since then, we have supplied our strawberries to food-loving consumers, world-class restaurants, and specialty retailers across NYC. Our proprietary technology, developed through years of intensive research in Japan and the US, enables us to grow the very best produce year-round, at the same high level of quality, all without using any pesticides. We have rapidly expanded our farm facilities and assembled a world-class team with backgrounds spanning vertical farming, industrial automation, farm operations, and data analysis. Oishii has been profiled in Eater, NPR, Time, and Fortune. If you’re interested in building the farm of the future with us, we look forward to hearing from you!

headline: Improving football performance with data-driven actionable insights

Leveraging cutting-edge machine learning and software engineering techniques, SciSports transforms the huge volumes of complexly-structured data that are collected during football matches into actionable insights that drive value for football professionals and fans. By computing state-of-the-art football metrics for over 2,000 matches each week, SciSports provides actionable insights for over 180,000 football players around the world via a multitude of interfaces, including a web platform and APIs. In the coming years we are planning to deliver our solutions for other sports too including E-sports. The SciSports Application is pivotal in exposing our award-winning, in-house-developed football metrics and insights to football organisations, media companies and betting companies. The data pipeline involves ingesting large amounts of football data from a diversity of sources, enriching and serving the data after intense data crunching using machine-learning techniques, and delivering the data and resulting insights to a web platform and customer-facing APIs.

headline: Truly decentralized oracle network. Connecting Smart Contracts with real world data
about: A truly decentralized oracle network. Razor network is the first oracle network, which is both fast AND secure. We will also be building apps to showcase the power of the oracle and to bootstrap user adoption.We are solving the Oracle problem.Oracle problem is a well-known problem in space and is one of the hardest to solve. The problem is that the smart contracts cannot access external data.Seven of the top 10 DeFi apps (according to defipulse) require an oracle. And due to the lack of a reliable decentralized oracle, they are relying on centralized oracles.Razor network will create the first truly decentralized, general-purpose oracle network, which is both fast and secure. The network is designed from the ground up to be robust and resistant to various game-theoretical vulnerabilities.

With our deep cybersecurity expertise, commitment to innovation, and game-changing Next-Generation Security Platform, customers can confidently pursue a digital-first strategy and embark on new technology initiatives, such as cloud and mobility. This kind of thinking and know-how helps customer organizations grow their business and empower employees all while maintaining complete visibility and the control needed to protect their critical control systems and most valued data assets. Our platform was built from the ground up for breach prevention, with threat information shared across security functions system-wide, and designed to operate in increasingly mobile, modern networks. By combining network, cloud and endpoint security with advanced threat intelligence in a natively integrated security platform, we safely enable all applications and deliver highly automated, preventive protection against cyberthreats at all stages in the attack lifecycle without compromising performance. Customers benefit from superior security to what legacy or point products provide and realize a better total cost of ownership.

Health advocates work directly with patients and providers to ensure people have access to the information they need to make the right decisions about their personal health. They're medically-savvy, but not tech-savvy—most advocates today don't have websites, and the ones that do are straight out of web 1.0. Solace is a marketplace for healthcare advocates that provides Americans with access to experts who can help them understand and take charge of their personal health.

headline: Tech for the future of 3D printing
about: For years, there has been demand for FFF 3D printing in manufacturing environments - Recently, Mosaic Manufacturing launched its Array Product Ecosystem, for the first time enabling scalable output from FFF 3D printers. The infrastructure of today means that cost scales linearly with output. If a part costs $5 to make at a volume of 10, it costs $5 to make at a volume of 10,000. This is due to the fact that 3D printing systems were never designed to scale - a fact that the team at Mosaic has been working to change. Mosaic’s Array Product Ecosystem includes Array, Array Production, Element, Element HT, Palette 3, Palette 3 Pro, Canvas, and Mosaic’s 3D Printing Material line.

headline: Planters Without Borders
about: Treejer is an open protocol connecting donors to rural planters worldwide. The project leverages cutting-edge concepts such as decentralized finance (DeFi), non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and smart contracts to unlock new opportunities in financing forest conservation and rural development. Treejer acts as a seamless, transparent bridge empowering local communities through crypto donations even in unbanked and remote areas. Treejer's approach incentivizes not only forest plantation but also conservation by locking up the funds in a smart contract and releasing it over time as planters and other data providers continue providing updates from forest status. The protocol also provides proof-of-impact to donors in the form of dynamic tree NFTs that have real-world attributes. These NFTs are linked to each tree and are minted on Polygon network. Treejer protocol has several smart contracts and two main interfaces: a payment and forest tracking interface offered to donors on " " and a dedicated mobile app for tree planters and rural ambassadors. They use it to submit new trees, provide updates and unlock conservation rewards. Besides using official interfaces, builders can integrate the tree planting plugin with their existing products.

headline: Creating the world's first molecular wines and spirits
about: We're Endless West. Our first product, Glyph, is the only whiskey made at the molecular level. Whiskeys owe their flavor, aroma, and mouthfeel to hundreds, sometimes thousands, of molecules that develop during distillation and barrel aging. These are the building blocks of all spirits. To make Glyph, we source these molecules directly from plants and yeasts, rather than obtaining them through distilling and aging. By using the same building blocks as conventional distillers, we create fine spirits through a process we’ve developed called note-by-note production. Our process is different, but our commitment to quality rivals the best in the business. Each component is meticulously tested for purity. Glyph is biochemically equivalent to the finest aged whiskies.

headline: Cryptocurrency for World Consciousness
about: Energi (NRG) is a next-generation Proof of Stake (PoS) cryptocurrency, combining Ethereum-compatible smart contracts with on-chain governance, a self-funding treasury, and a layer 2 Masternode network, enabling powerful DeFi applications.Energi is a fully remote company with no fixed headquarters, and the team is spread throughout the Americas, Europe, Africa, Asia, and Oceania. With more than 60 contributors, the team forms a well-linked network across plenty of locations, lifestyles, and backgrounds.Energi’s culture is driven by integrity, high-performance, strategic thinking, and leadership. While our differences make us adaptable and versatile, it’s our shared values that give us the strength and drive to become the cryptocurrency for world consciousness.” We see Bitcoin’s massive mining reward as overkill and believe Bitcoin could be about as secure with only a fraction of that mining reward (as seen by Bitcoin having great network security with no corresponding problems even when the market cap and mining reward was 1/10 as it is now). If Bitcoin had a system in place similar to Energi, Bitcoin would currently have BILLIONS OF DOLLARS worth per year to allocate to development and growth. This is an enormous missed value, a gap that Energi seeks to fill. Combining this with governance and smart contract capabilities is what we see as major features of the most powerful cryptocurrencies of the future. Global Talent Acquisitions Manager: Shawn.Brooks@Team.Energi

headline: Visit is a 360° integrated, highly engaging Health Benefits Platform

Traditionally, the term Employee Health Benefits was synonymous with insurance / hospitalisation benefits only; ie, Secondary Care. Whereas today, 90% of individual healthcare and wellness related expenses in India are out of pocket on Primary Care; be it Mental Wellness, Fitness, Nutrition, Diagnostics, Medicines, and most of all, regular doctor appointments. The Covid-19 Pandemic has not only caused such expenses to increase multi fold, but also created a need for accessible systems. In a professional setting, such offerings are either lacking, or provided in an ad hoc, broken manner through various individual platforms. As a result, the experience for an employee is disconnected, with limited utilisation and engagement. This is where Visit Health comes in - a one stop solution for all employee health benefits needs. We help Companies build a Customized Wellness solution focused on Primary Care aspects such as Fitness, Mental Health, Doctor Teleconsultation, OPD programs, etc. for employees and their families, thereby reducing out of pocket expenses and creating healthier workforces. We have stitched up the broken pieces of employee health benefits in India to make one streamlined platform while increasing employee engagement through gamification. Visit Health has raised in total of $9million & is backed by renowned investors such as PolicyBazaar, Twitter Co-founder Biz Stone and Kunal Bahl of Snapdeal. Don't just take take our word. headline: Reduce IT costs by 90%. Replace 120 servers by one rackmount cluster-in-a-box
about: We produce a server that replaces 60 Intel based servers on Machine Learning, Big Data, and other compute intensive tasks. It runs the same code, but costs 1/7 to purchase and consumes 1/25 as much energy. It pays for itself in one year of electricity savings alone. We achieve this 60x by focusing on the 1% of server customers who have compute intensive workloads, like Machine Learning. We invented a new micro-architecture that "breaks the rules" -- it gives little advantage on most kinds of workload, but 60x on our $7B segment.(12 patents so far) We will offer it both as a rack mount server, and also as an AWS compatible Cloud offering, via our partners Stratoscale and Rackspace. We supply the hardware and split the revenues. Because 100 of our machines is equivalent to 6000 Intel servers, we cut our customer's AWS bill in half. Response has been overwhelming. In year 5 we will close a sale of 2000 or more machines into top tier. That's $150M of profit for $3B valuation.

headline: Accurate & user friendly wearable medical devices intended to be used by patients at home
about: Acurable is a fast-growing, venture backed MedTech start-up with offices in London and Seville. We create accurate and user-friendly wearable medical devices intended to be used by patients at home. Our award-winning, patented technology enables for the first time the automated diagnosis and management of respiratory conditions. It is the product of more than 10 years’ research at Imperial College London by Acurable’s founder, Professor Esther Rodriguez Villegas, and has been recognised as a breakthrough in respiratory medicine, winning some of the most respected awards in the industry, among them XPrize and several Innovate UK grants. Our first product, AcuPebble SA100, is the first medical device in the world to obtain the CE mark for the automated diagnosis of obstructive sleep apnoea at home. Meanwhile we continue our research to develop new products that will fundamentally improve the lives of millions of people suffering from serious chronic conditions such as COPD, Asthma and Epilepsy. We’re a small but fast-growing team with big ambitions. To achieve them, we’re building a team of exceptional people who are inspired by our vision, share our values, and who have the attitude and skills required to help Acurable succeed. In return, we provide a fun and entrepreneurial working environment within an exciting business where you can make a huge difference to the life of millions of people worldwide.

Their patients are under served and face long waiting times before starting an intervention. That's why we leverage our digital platform to give SLPs super powers so that they: 1/ Can focus on where they add the most value: time with their patients (and less time spent on session prep and admin, incl. clinical note and invoicing) and 2/ Exponentially increase their caseload (from an average of 40 in person caseload to 100+ monitored caseload)
